 shiru yhoh shir Hadash; shiru yhoh kal ha’arez. shiru yhoh barakhu shemo; baseru miyom leyom, yeshu‘ato. saperu wagoyim kewodo; bekhal ha‘amim, nifle’otaw. ki gadol yhoh umehulal me’od; nora hu, ‘al kal ’elohim. ki kal ’elohei ha‘amim ’elilim; yhoh shamayim ‘asah. hod wehadar lefanaw; ‘oc wetif’eret, bemiqdasho. hawu yhoh mishpeHot ‘amim; hawu yhoh kawod wa‘oc. hawu yhoh kewod shemo; se’u minHah, uwo’u leHazrotaw. hishtaHawu yhoh behadrat qodesh; Hilu mipanaw, kal ha’arez. ’imru wagoyim yhoh malakh, ’af tikon teiweil bal timoT; yadin ‘amim, bemeisharim. yismeHu hashamayim wetageil ha’arez; yir‘am hayam, umelo’o. ya‘aloc day wekhal ’asher bo; ’ac yeranenu, kal ‘azei ya‘ar. lifnei yhoh ki wa, ki wa lishpoT ha’arez yishpoT teiweil bezedeq; we‘amim, be’emunato.

97

 yhoh malakh tageil ha’arez; yismeHu, ’iyim rabim. ‘anan wa‘arafel sewiwaw; zedeq umishpaT, mekhon kis’o. ’eish lefanaw teileikh; utelaheiT sawiw zaraw. hei’iru weraqaw teiweil; ra’atah wataHeil ha’arez. harim, kadonag, namassu milifnei yhoh; milifnei, ’adon kal ha’arez. higidu hashamayim zidqo; wera’u khal ha‘amim kewodo. yeiwoshu kal ‘owedei fesel, hamithalim ba’elilim; hishtaHawu lo kal ’elohim. shame‘ah watismaH ziyon, watageilenah benot yehudah; lema‘an mishpaTekha yhoh. ki ’atah yhoh ‘elyon ‘al kal ha’arez; me’od na‘aleita, ‘al kal ’elohim. ’ohawei yhoh sin’u ra‘ meir nafshot Hasidaw; miyad resha‘im, yazileim. ’or carua‘ lazadiq; uleyishrei leiw simHah. simHu zadiqim yhoh; wehodu, leceikher qadesho.

98

 micmor shiru yhoh shir Hadash ki nifla’ot ‘asah; hoshi‘ah lo yemino, uceroa‘ qadesho. hodia‘ yhoh yeshu‘ato; le‘einei hagoyim, gilah zidqato. cakhar Hasdo we’emunato leweit yisra’eil ra’u khal ’afsei ’arez; ’eit, yeshu‘at ’eloheinu. hari‘u yhoh kal ha’arez; pizHu weranenu wecameiru. cameru yhoh bekhinor; bekhinor, weqol cimrah. baHazozerot weqol shofar; hari‘u, lifnei hamelekh yhoh. yir‘am hayam umelo’o; teiweil, weyoshewei wah. neharot yimHa’u khaf; yaHad, harim yeraneinu. lifnei yhoh ki wa lishpoT ha’arez yishpoT teiweil bezedeq; we‘amim, bemeisharim.

99

 yhoh malakh yirgecu ‘amim; yosheiw keruwim, tanuT ha’arez. yhoh beziyon gadol; weram hu, ‘al kal ha‘amim. yodu mekha gadol wenora, qadosh hu. we‘oc melekh mishpaT ’aheiw ’atah konanta meisharim; mishpaT uzedaqah, beya‘aqow ’atah ‘asita. romu yhoh ’eloheinu, wehishtaHawu lahadom raglaw, qadosh hu. mosheh we’aharon bekhohanaw, ushemu’eil beqore’ei shemo; qorim ’el yhoh wehu ya‘aneim. be‘amud ‘anan yedabeir ’aleihem; shameru ‘eidotaw, weHoq natan lamo. yhoh ’eloheinu ’atah ‘anitam ’eil nosei hayita lahem; wenoqeim, ‘al ‘alilotam. romu yhoh ’eloheinu, wehishtaHawu lehar qadesho; ki qadosh, yhoh ’eloheinu.

100

 micmor letodah; hari‘u yhoh kal ha’arez. ‘iwdu ’et yhoh besimHah; bo’u lefanaw, birnanah. de‘u, ki yhoh hu ’elohim hu ‘asanu welo welo ’anaHnu; ‘amo, wezon mar‘ito. bo’u she‘araw betodah, Hazeirotaw bithilah; hodu lo, barakhu shemo. ki Tow yhoh le‘olam Hasdo; we‘ad dor wador, ’emunato.

101

 ledawid, micmor Hesed umishpaT ’ashirah; lekha yhoh ’acameirah. ’askilah bederekh tamim, matay tawo ’eilay; ’ethaleikh betam lewawi, beqerew beiti. lo ’ashit leneged ‘einay, dewar beliya‘al ‘asoh seiTim saneiti; lo yidbaq bi. leiwaw ‘iqeish yasur mimeni; ra‘, lo ’eida‘. melosheni melasheni wasseiter rei‘eihu ’oto ’azmit gewah ‘einayim ureHaw leiwaw; ’oto, lo ’ukhal. ‘einay bene’emnei ’erez lashewet ‘imadi holeikh bederekh tamim; hu, yeshareteini. lo yeisheiw beqerew beiti ‘oseih remiyah doweir sheqarim; lo yikon, leneged ‘einay. labeqarim, ’azmit kal rish‘ei ’arez; lehakhrit mei‘ir yhoh kal po‘alei ’awen.

102

 tefilah le‘ani khi ya‘aTof; welifnei yhoh yishpokh siHo. yhoh shim‘ah tefilati; weshaw‘ati, ’eilekha tawo. ’al tasteir panekha mimeni beyom zar li haTeih ’eilay ’acenekha; beyom ’eqra, maheir ‘aneini. ki khalu we‘ashan yamay; we‘azmotay, kemo qeid niHaru. hukah kha‘eisew wayiwash libi; kisha khaHti, mei’akhol laHmi. miqol ’anHati; daweqah ‘azmi, liwsari. damiti liq’at midbar; hayiti, kekhos Horawot. shaqadti wa’ehyeh; kezipor, bodeid ‘al gag. kal hayom Heirefuni ’oyway; meholalay, bi nishba‘u. ki ’eifer kaleHem ’akhaleti; weshiquway, biwkhi masakheti. mipenei ca‘amkha weqizpekha; ki nesatani, watashlikheini. yamay kezeil naTui; wa’ani, ka‘eisew ’iwash. we’atah yhoh le‘olam teisheiw; wecikhrekha, ledor wador. ’atah taqum teraHeim ziyon; ki ‘eit leHenah, ki wa mo‘eid. ki razu ‘awadekha ’et ’awaneha; we’et ‘afarah yeHoneinu. weyire’u goyim ’et sheim yhoh; wekhal malkhei ha’arez, ’et kewodekha. ki wanah yhoh ziyon; nir’ah, bikhwodo. panah ’el tefilat ha‘ar‘ar; welo wacah, ’et tefilatam. tikatew cot ledor ’aHaron; we‘am niwra, yehalel yah. ki hishqif mimerom qadesho; yhoh mishamayim ’el ’erez hibiT. lishmoa‘ ’enqat ’asir; lefateiaH, benei temutah. lesapeir beziyon sheim yhoh; utehilato, birushalim. behiqaweiz ‘amim yaHdaw; umamlakhot, la‘awod ’et yhoh. ‘inah waderekh koHo koHi, qizar yamay. ’omar, ’eili, ’al ta‘aleini baHazi yamay; bedor dorim shenotekha. lefanim ha’arez yasadta; uma‘aseih yadekha shamayim. heimah yoweidu we’atah ta‘amod wekhulam kabeged yiwlu; kalewush taHalifeim weyaHalofu. we’atah hu; ushenotekha, lo yitamu. benei ‘awadekha yishkonu; wecar‘am, lefanekha yikon.

103

 ledawid barakhi nafshi ’et yhoh; wekhal qeraway, ’et sheim qadesho. barakhi nafshi ’et yhoh; we’al tishkeHi, kal gemulaw. hassoleiaH lekhal ‘awoneikhi; harofei, lekhal taHalu’ayekhi. hago’eil mishaHat Hayayekhi; ham‘aTereikhi, Hesed weraHamim. hamasbiya‘ baTow ‘edyeikh; titHadeish kanesher ne‘urayekhi. ‘oseih zedaqot yhoh; umishpaTim, lekhal ‘ashuqim. yodia‘ derakhaw lemosheh; liwnei yisra’eil, ‘alilotaw. raHum weHanun yhoh; ’erekh ’apayim weraw Hased. lo lanezaH yariw; welo le‘olam yiTor. lo khaHaTa’einu ‘asah lanu; welo kha‘awonoteinu, gamal ‘aleinu. ki khigwoah mayim ‘al ha’arez; gawar Hasdo, ‘al yerei’aw. kirHoq micraH mima‘araw; hirHiq mimenu, ’et pesha‘einu. keraHeim ’aw ‘al banim; riHam yhoh ‘al yerei’aw. ki hu yada‘ yizreinu; cakhur, ki ‘afar ’anaHenu. ’enosh keHazir yamaw; keziz hasadeh, kein yaziz. ki ruaH ‘awerah bo we’einenu; welo yakirenu ‘od meqomo. weHesed yhoh mei‘olam we‘ad ‘olam ‘al yerei’aw; wezidqato, liwnei wanim. leshomerei werito; ulecokherei fiqudaw, la‘asotam. yhoh bashamayim heikhin kis’o; umalkhuto, bakol mashalah. barakhu yhoh mal’akhaw giborei khoaH ‘osei dewaro; lishmoa‘, beqol dewaro. barakhu yhoh kal zewa’aw; mesharetaw, ‘osei rezono. barakhu yhoh kal ma‘asaw, bekhal meqomot memshalto; barakhi nafshi, ’et yhoh.

104

 barakhi nafshi, ’et yhoh yhoh ’elohay gadalta me’od; hod wehadar lawasheta. ‘oTeh ’or kasalmah; noTeh mayim, kayri‘ah. hamqareh wamayim, ‘aliyotaw hasam ‘awim rekhuwo; hamhaleikh, ‘al kanfei ruaH. ‘oseh mal’akhaw ruHot; mesharetaw, ’eish loheiT. yasad ’erez ‘al mekhoneha; bal timoT, ‘olam wa‘ed. tehom kalewush kissito; ‘al harim, ya‘amdu mayim. min ga‘aratekha yenusun; min qol ra‘amkha, yeiHafeicun. ya‘alu harim yeiredu weqa‘ot; ’el meqom, ceh yasadta lahem. gewulsa meta bal ya‘aworun; bal yeshuwun, lekhassot ha’arez. hamshaleiaH ma‘yanim baneHalim; bein harim, yehaleikhun. yashqu kal Hayto saday; yishberu fera’im zema’am. ‘aleihem ‘of hashamayim yishkon; mibein ‘ofayim, yitenu qol. mashqeh harim mei‘aliyotaw; miperi ma‘asekha, tisba‘ ha’arez. mazmiaH Hazir labeheimah, we‘eisew la‘awodat ha’adam; lehozi leHem, min ha’arez. weyayin yesamaH lewaw ’enosh, lehazhil panim mishamen; weleHem, lewaw ’enosh yis‘ad. yisbe‘u ‘azei yhoh; ’arcei lewanon, ’asher naTa‘. ’asherosha m ziporim yeqaneinu; Hasidah, beroshim beitah. harim hagewohim laye‘eilim; sela‘im, maHseh lashfanim. ‘asah yareiaH lemo‘adim; mesh yada‘ mewo’o. tashet Hoshekh wihi layelah; bo tirmos, kal Hayto ya‘ar. hakefirim sho’agim laTaref; ulewaqeish mei’eil ’akhelam. ticraH hashemesh yei’aseifun; we’el me‘onotam, yirbazun. yeizei ’adam lefa‘olo; wela‘awodato ‘adei ‘arew. mah rabu ma‘asekha yhoh kulam beHakhemah ‘asita; male’ah ha’arez, qinyanekha. ceh hayam gadol ureHaw yadayim sham remes we’ein mispar; Hayot qeTanot, ‘im gedolot. m ’oniyot yehaleikhun; liwyatan, ceh yazarta lesaHeq bo. kulam ’eilekha yesabeirun; lateit ’akhelam be‘ito. titein lahem yilqoTun; tiftaH yadekha, yisbe‘un Tow. tastir panekha yibaheilun toseif ruHam yigwa‘un; we’el ‘afaram yeshuwun. teshalaH ruHakha yibarei’un; uteHadeish, penei ’adamah. yehi khewod yhoh le‘olam; yismaH yhoh bema‘asaw. hamabiT la’arez watir‘ad; yiga‘ beharim weye‘eshanu. ’ashirah yhoh beHayay; ’acamerah leilohay be‘odi. ye‘eraw ‘alaw siHi; ’anokhi, ’esmaH yhoh. yitamu HaTa’im min ha’arez uresha‘im ‘od ’einam, barakhi nafshi ’et yhoh halu yah.

105

 hodu yhoh qir’u bishmo; hodi‘u wa‘amim, ‘alilotaw. shiru lo cameru lo; Hu bekhal nifle’otaw. hithalu besheim qadesho; yismaH, leiw mewaqshei yhoh. dirshu yhoh we‘ucco; baqeshu fanaw tamid. cikhru, nifle’otaw ’asher ‘asah; mofetaw, umishpeTei fiw. cera‘ ’awraham ‘awdo; benei ya‘aqow beHiraw. hu yhoh ’eloheinu; bekhal ha’arez, mishpaTaw. cakhar le‘olam berito; dawar ziwwah, le’elef dor. ’asher karat ’et ’awraham; ushewu‘ato leyisHaq. waya‘amideha leya‘aqow leHoq; leyisra’eil, berit ‘olam. leimor, lekha, ’etein ’et ’erez kena‘an; Hewel, naHalatkhem. bihyotam metei mispar; kim‘aT, wegarim bah. wayithalekhu migo ’el go; mimamlakhah, ’el ‘am ’aHeir. lo hiniaH ’adam le‘asheqam; wayokhaH ‘aleihem melakhim. ’al tige‘u wimshiHay; welinwi’ay ’al tarei‘u. wayiqra ra‘aw ‘al ha’arez; kal maTeih leHem shawar. shalaH lifneihem ’ish; le‘ewed, nimkar yoseif. ‘inu wakewel raglaw raglo; barcel, ba’ah nafsho. ‘ad ‘eit bo dewaro; ’imrat yhoh zerafatehu. shalaH melekh wayatireihu; mosheil ‘amim, wayfateHeihu. samo ’adon leweito; umosheil, bekhal qinyano. le’sor saraw benafsho; uceqeinaw yeHakeim. wayawo yisra’eil mizrayim; weya‘aqow, gar be’erez Ham. wayefer ’et ‘amo me’od; waya‘azimeihu mizaraw. hafakh libam lisno ‘amo; lehitnakeil, ba‘awadaw. laH mosheh ‘awdo; ’aharon, ’asher baHar bo. samu wam diwrei ’ototaw; umofetim, be’erez Ham. shalaH Hoshekh wayaHshikh; welo maru, ’et dewaraww dewaro. hafakh ’et meimeihem ledam; wayamet, ’et degatam. sharaz ’arzam zefarde‘im; beHadrei, malkheihem. ’amar wayawo ‘arow; kinim, bekhal gewulam. natan gishmeihem barad; ’eish lehawot be’arzam. wayakh gafnam ute’einatam; wayshabeir, ‘eiz gewulam. ’amar wayawo ’arbeh; weyeleq, we’ein mispar. wayokhal kal ‘eisew be’arzam; wayokhal, peri ’admatam. wayakh kal bekhor be’arzam; reishit, lekhal ’onam. wayozi’eim bekhesef wecahaw; we’ein bishwaTaw kosheil. samaH mizrayim bezeitam; ki nafal paHdam ‘aleihem. paras ‘anan lemasakh; we’eish, leha’ir layelah. sha’al wayawei selaw; weleHem mayim, yasbi‘eim. pataH zur wayacuwu mayim; halekhu, baziyot nahar. ki cakhar ’et dewar qadesho; ’et ’awraham ‘awdo. wayozi ‘amo wesason; berinah, ’et beHiraw. wayitein lahem ’arzot goyim; wa‘amal le’umim yirashu. ba‘awur yishmeru Huqaw wetorotaw yinzoru, halu yah.

106

 haluyah hodu yhoh ki Tow; ki le‘olam Hasdo. mi, yemaleil gewurot yhoh; yashmia‘, kal tehilato. ’ashrei shomerei mishpaT; ‘oseih zedaqah wekhal ‘eit. cakhereini yhoh birzon ‘amekha; paqedeini, bishu‘atekha. lir’ot beTowat beHirekha, lismoaH besimHat goyekha; lehithaleil, ‘im naHalatekha. HaTanu ‘im ’awoteinu, he‘ewinu hirsha‘enu. ’awoteinu wemizrayim lo hiskilu nifle’otekha, lo cakheru ’et row Hasadekha; wayamru ‘al yam beyam suf. wayoshi‘eim lema‘an shemo; lehodia‘, ’et gewurato. wayig‘ar beyam suf wayeHeraw; wayolikheim batehomot, kamidbar. wayoshi‘eim miyad sonei; wayig’aleim, miyad ’oyeiw. waykhassu mayim zareihem; ’eHad meihem, lo notar. waya’aminu widwaraw; yashiru, tehilato. miharu shakheHu ma‘asaw; lo Hiku, la‘azato. wayit’awwu ta’awah bamidbar; waynassu ’eil, bishimon. wayitein lahem she’elatam; wayshalaH racon benafsham. wayqan’u lemosheh bamaHaneh; le’aharon, qedosh yhoh. tiftaH ’erez watiwla‘ datan; watekhas, ‘al ‘adat ’awiram. watiw‘ar ’eish ba‘adatam; lehawah, telaheiT resha‘im. ya‘asu ‘eigel beHoreiw; wayishtaHawu, lemasseikhah. wayamiru ’et kewodam; betawnit wr ’okheil ‘eisew. kheHu ’eil moshi‘am; ‘oseh gedolot bemizrayim. nifla’ot be’erez Ham; nora’ot, ‘al yam suf. wayomer, lehashmidam lulei mosheh weHiro, ‘amad baperez lefanaw; lehashiw Hamato, meihashHit. wayim’asu be’erez Hemdah; lo he’eminu, lidwaro. wayeiragenu we’aholeihem; lo me‘u, beqol yhoh. wayisa yado lahem; lehapil ’otam, bamidbar. ulehapil car‘am bagoyim; ulecarotam, ba’arazot. wayizamedu lewa‘al pe‘or; wayokhelu, ciwHei meitim. wayakh‘isu bema‘aleihem; watifraz bam, mageifah. waya‘amod pineHas wayfaleil; watei‘azar, hamageifah. wateiHashew lo lizdaqah; ledor wador, ‘ad ‘olam. wayaqzifu ‘al mei meriwah; wayeira‘ lemosheh, ba‘awuram. ki himru ’et ruHo; waywaTei, bisfataw. lo hishmidu ’et ha‘amim; ’asher ’amar yhoh lahem. wayit‘arewu wagoyim; wayilmedu, ma‘aseihem. waya‘awdu ’et ‘azabeihem; wayihyu lahem lemoqeish. wayicbeHu ’et beneihem we’et benoteihem, lasheidim. wayishpekhu dam naqi dam beneihem uwenoteihem, ’asher cibeHu la‘azabei khena‘an; wateHenaf ha’arez, badamim. wayiTme’u wema‘aseihem; wayicnu, bema‘aleihem. wayiHar ’af yhoh be‘amo; wayta‘eiw, ’et naHalato. wayiteneim beyad goyim; wayimshelu wahem, sone’eihem. wayilHazum ’oyweihem; wayikane‘u, taHat yadam. pe‘amim rabot, yazileim weheimah yamru wa‘azatam; wayamoku, ba‘awonam. wayar bazar lahem; beshame‘o, ’et rinatam. wayickor lahem berito; wayinaHeim, kerow Hasdo Hasadaw. wayitein ’otam leraHamim; lifnei kal showeihem. hoshi‘einu yhoh ’eloheinu, weqabezeinu min hagoyim lehodot lesheim qadshekha lehishtabeiaH, bithilatekha. barukh yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil min ha‘olam we‘ad ha‘olam, we’amar kal ha‘am ’amein, halu yah.

107

 hodu yhoh ki Tow; ki le‘olam Hasdo. yomeru ge’ulei yhoh; ’asher ge’alam, miyad zar. umei’arazot, qibezam mimicraH umima‘araw; mizafon umiyam. ta‘u wamidbar bishimon darekh; ‘ir moshaw, lo maza’u. re‘eiwim gam zemei’im; nafsham, bahem tit‘aTaf. wayiz‘aqu ’el yhoh bazar lahem; mimezuqoteihem, yazileim. wayadrikheim bederekh yesharah; lalekhet, ’el ‘ir moshaw. yodu yhoh Hasdo; wenifle’otaw, liwnei ’adam. ki hisbia‘ nefesh shoqeiqah; wenefesh re‘eiwah milei Tow. yoshewei Hoshekh wezalmawet; ’asirei ‘oni uwarcel. ki himru ’imrei ’eil; wa‘azat ‘elyon na’azu. wayakhna‘ be‘amal libam; kashelu, we’ein ‘oceir. wayic‘aqu ’el yhoh bazar lahem; mimezuqoteihem, yoshi‘eim. yozi’eim meiHoshekh wezalmawet; umosroteihem yenateiq. yodu yhoh Hasdo; wenifle’otaw, liwnei ’adam. kishi bar daltot neHoshet; uweriHei warcel gideia‘. ’ewilim miderekh pish‘am; umei‘awonoteihem, yit‘anu. kal ’okhel teta‘eiw nafsham; wayagi‘u, ‘ad sha‘arei mawet. wayic‘aqu ’el yhoh bazar lahem; mimezuqoteihem, yoshi‘eim. yishlaH dewaro weyirpa’eim; wimaleiT, misheHitotam. yodu yhoh Hasdo; wenifle’otaw, liwnei ’adam. weyicbeHu ciwHei todah; wisaperu ma‘asaw berinah. yordei hayam ba’oniyot; ‘osei melakhah, bemayim rabim. heimah ra’u ma‘asei yhoh; wenifle’otaw, bimzulah. wayomer, waya‘ameid ruaH se‘arah; wateromeim galaw. ya‘alu mayim yeiredu tehomot; nafsham, bera‘ah titmogag. yaHogu weyanu‘u kashikor; wekhal Hakhematam, titbala‘. wayiz‘aqu ’el yhoh bazar lahem; umimezuqoteihem, yozi’eim. yaqeim se‘arah lidmamah; wayeHeshu, galeihem. wayismeHu khi yishtoqu; wayanHeim, ’el meHoc Hefzam. yodu yhoh Hasdo; wenifle’otaw, liwnei ’adam. wiromemuhu biqhal ‘am; uwemoshaw ceqeinim yehaluhu. yaseim neharot lemidbar; umoza’ei mayim, lezima’on. ’erez peri limleiHah; meira‘at, yoshewei wah. yaseim midbar la’agam mayim; we’erez ziyah, lemoza’ei mayim. wayoshew sham re‘eiwim; waykhonu, ‘ir moshaw. wayicre‘u dot wayiTe‘u kheramim; waya‘asu, peri tewu’ah. waywarakheim wayirbu me’od; uwehemtam, lo yam‘iT. wayim‘aTu wayashoHu; mei‘ozer ra‘ah weyagon. shofeikh buc ‘al nediwim; wayat‘eim, betohu lo darekh. waysageiw ’ewyon mei‘oni; wayasem kazon, mishpaHot. yir’u yesharim weyismaHu; wekhal ‘awlah, qafezah piha. mi Hakham weyishmar ’eileh; weyitbonu, Hasdei yhoh.

108

 shir micmor ledawid. nakhon libi ’elohim; ’ashirah wa’acamerah, ’af kewodi. ‘urah haneiwel wekhinor, ’a‘irah shaHar. ’odkha wa‘amim yhoh; wa’acamerkha, bal ’umim. ki gadol mei‘al shamayim Hasdekha; we‘ad sheHaqim ’amitekha. rumah ‘al shamayim ’elohim; we‘al kal ha’arez kewodekha. lema‘an yeiHalezun yedidekha; hoshi‘ah yeminekha wa‘aneini. ’elohim diber beqadesho, ’e‘locah ’aHaleqah shekhem; we‘eimeq sukot ’amadeid. li gil‘ad li menasheh, we’efrayim ma‘oc roshi; yehudah, meHoqeqi. mo’aw sir raHzi, ‘al ’edom ’ashlikh na‘ali; ‘alei feleshet, ’etro‘a‘. mi yowileini ‘ir miwzar; mi naHani ‘ad ’edom. halo ’elohim cenaHtanu; welo teizei ’elohim, beziw’oteinu. hawah lanu ‘ecrat mizar; weshaw, teshu‘at ’adam. beilohim na‘aseh Hayil; wehu, yawus zareinu.

109

 lamnazeiaH ledawid micmor; ’elohei tehilati, ’al teHerash. ki fi rasha‘ ufi mirmah ‘alay pataHu; diberu ’iti, leshon shaqer. wediwrei sin’ah sewawuni; wayilaHamuni Hinam. taHat ’ahawati yisTenuni, wa’ani tefilah. wayasimu ‘alay ra‘ah taHat Towah; wesin’ah, taHat ’ahawati. hafqeid ‘alaw rasha‘; wesaTan, ya‘amod ‘al yemino. behishafeTo yeizei rasha‘; utefilato, tihyeh laHaTa’ah. yihyu yamaw me‘aTim; pequdato, yiqaH ’aHeir. yihyu wanaw yetomim; we’ishto ’almanah. wenoa‘ yanu‘u wanaw weshi’eilu; wedareshu, meiHarewoteihem. yenaqeish nosheh lekhal ’asher lo; weyawoccu carim yegi‘o. ’al yehi lo mosheikh Hased; we’al yehi Honein, litomaw. yehi ’aHarito lehakhrit; bedor ’aHeir, yimaH shemam. yiccakheir ‘awon ’awotaw ’el yhoh; weHaTat ’imo, ’al timaH. yihyu neged yhoh tamid; weyakhreit mei’erez cikhram. ya‘an, ’asher lo cakhar ‘asot Hased wayirdof ’ish ‘ani we’ewyon wenikh’eih leiwaw lemoteit. waye’ehaw qelalah watewo’eihu; welo Hafeiz biwrakhah, watirHaq mimenu. wayilbash qelalah, kemado watawo khamayim beqirbo; wekhashemen, be‘azmotaw. tehi lo keweged ya‘Teh; ulemeicaH, tamid yaHgereha. cot pe‘ulat Tenay mei’eit yhoh; wehadowerim ra‘, ‘al nafshi. we’atah yhoh ’adonay, ‘aseih ’iti lema‘an shemekha; ki Tow Hasdekha, hazileini. ki ‘ani we’ewyon ’anokhi; welibi, Halal beqirbi. kezeil kinToto nehelakheti; nin‘arti, ka’arbeh. birkay kashelu mizom; uwesari, kaHash mishamen. wa’ani hayiti Herpah lahem; yir’uni, yeni‘un rosham. ‘acereini yhoh ’elohay; hoshi‘eini kheHasdekha. weyeide‘u ki yadekha cot; ’atah yhoh ‘asitah. yeqalu heimah we’atah tewareikh qamu wayeiwoshu, we‘awdekha yismaH. yilbeshu soTnay kelimah; weya‘aTu kham‘il bashetam. ’odeh yhoh me’od befi; uwetokh rabim ’ahalenu. ki ya‘amod limin ’ewyon; lehoshia‘, mishofeTei nafsho.

110

 ledawid, micmor ne’um yhoh ladoni, sheiw limini; ‘ad ’ashit ’oyewekha, hadom leraglekha. maTeih ‘uccekha, yishlaH yhoh miziyon; redeih, beqerew ’oyewekha. ‘amekha nedawot beyom Heilekha behadrei qodesh meireHem mishHar; lekha, Tal yaldutekha. nishba‘ yhoh welo yinaHeim, ’atah khohein le‘olam; ‘al diwrati, malki zedeq. ’adonay ‘al yeminekha; maHaz beyom ’apo melakhim. yadin bagoyim malei gewiyot; maHaz rosh, ‘al ’erez rabah. minaHal baderekh yishteh; ‘al kein, yarim rosh.

111

 halu yah ’odeh yhoh bekhal leiwaw; besod yesharim we‘eidah. gedolim ma‘asei yhoh; derushim, lekhal Hefzeihem. hod wehadar pa‘olo; wezidqato, ‘omedet la‘ad. ceikher ‘asah lenifle’otaw; Hanun weraHum yhoh. Teref natan lirei’aw; yickor le‘olam berito. koaH ma‘asaw higid le‘amo; lateit lahem, naHalat goyim. ma‘asei yadaw ’emet umishpaT; ne’emanim, kal piqudaw. semukhim la‘ad le‘olam; ‘asuyim, be’emet weyashar. pedut shalaH le‘amo, ziwwah le‘olam berito; qadosh wenora shemo. reishit Hakhmah yir’at yhoh seikhel Tow lekhal ‘oseihem; tehilato, ‘omedet la‘ad.

112

 halu yah ’ashrei ’ish yarei ’et yhoh; bemizwotaw, Hafeiz me’od. gibor ba’arez yihyeh car‘o; dor yesharim yeworakh. hon wa‘osher beweito; wezidqato, ‘omedet la‘ad. caraH baHoshekh ’or laysharim; Hanun weraHum wezadiq. Tow ’ish Honein umalweh; yekhalkeil dewaraw bemishpaT. ki le‘olam lo yimoT; leceikher ‘olam, yihyeh zadiq. mishemu‘ah ra‘ah lo yira; nakhon libo, baTuaH yhoh. samukh libo lo yira; ‘ad ’asher yir’eh wezaraw. piccar natan la’ewyonim, zidqato ‘omedet la‘ad; qarno, tarum bekhawod. rasha‘ yir’eh wekha‘as, shinaw yaHaroq wenamas; ta’awat resha‘im toweid.

113

 halu yah halu ‘awdei yhoh; halu ’et sheim yhoh. yehi sheim yhoh meworakh; mei‘atah, we‘ad ‘olam. mimicraH shemesh ‘ad mewo’o; mehulal, sheim yhoh. ram ‘al kal goyim yhoh; ‘al hashamayim kewodo. mi yhoh ’eloheinu; hamagbihi lashawet. hamashpili lir’ot; bashamayim uwa’arez. meqimi mei‘afar dal; mei’ashpot, yarim ’ewyon. lehoshiwi ‘im nediwim; ‘im, nediwei ‘amo. moshiwi ‘aqeret habayit, ’eim habanim semeiHah, halu yah.

114

 bezeit yisra’eil mimizrayim; beit ya‘aqow, mei‘am lo‘eic. hayetah yehudah leqadesho; yisra’eil, mamshelotaw. hayam ra’ah wayanos; hayardein, yissow le’aHor. heharim raqedu khe’eilim; gewa‘ot, kiwnei zon. mah lekha hayam ki tanus; hayardein, tissow le’aHor. heharim tirqedu khe’eilim; gewa‘ot, kiwnei zon. milifnei ’adon Huli ’arez; milifnei, ’eloah ya‘aqow. hahofekhi hazur ’agam mayim; Halamish, lema‘yeno mayim.

115

 lo lanu yhoh lo lanu ki leshimkha tein kawod; ‘al Hasdekha, ‘al ’amitekha. lamah yomeru hagoyim; ’ayeih na, ’eloheihem. weiloheinu washamayim; kol ’asher Hafeiz ‘asah. ‘azabeihem kesef wecahaw; ma‘aseih, yedei ’adam. peh lahem welo yedabeiru; ‘einayim lahem, welo yir’u. ’acenayim lahem welo yishma‘u; ’af lahem, welo yeriHun. yedeihem welo yemishun, ragleihem welo yehaleikhu; lo yehgu, bigronam. kemohem yihyu ‘oseihem; kol ’asher boTeiaH bahem. yisra’eil beTaH yhoh; ‘ecram umaginam hu. beit ’aharon biTHu yhoh; ‘ecram umaginam hu. yir’ei yhoh biTHu yhoh; ‘ecram umaginam hu. yhoh cekharanu yewareikh yewareikh ’et beit yisra’eil; yewareikh, ’et beit ’aharon. yewareikh yir’ei yhoh; haqeTanim, ‘im hagedolim. yoseif yhoh ‘aleikhem; ‘aleikhem, we‘al beneikhem. berukhim ’atem yhoh; ‘oseih, shamayim wa’arez. hashamayim mayim yhoh; weha’arez, natan liwnei ’adam. lo hameitim yehalu yah; welo, kal yoredei dumah. wa’anaHnu newareikh yah, mei‘atah we‘ad ‘olam, halu yah.

116

 ’ahawti ki yishma‘ yhoh; ’et qoli, taHanunay. ki hiTah ’aceno li; uweyamay ’eqra. ’afafuni Hewlei mawet, umezarei she’ol meza’uni; zarah weyagon ’emza. uwesheim yhoh ’eqra; ’anah yhoh maleTah nafshi. Hanun yhoh wezadiq; weiloheinu meraHeim. shomeir petayim yhoh; daloti, weli yehoshia‘. shuwi nafshi limnuHayekhi; ki yhoh gamal ‘alayekhi. ki Hilazta nafshi, mimawet ’et ‘eini min dim‘ah; ’et ragli mideHi. ’ethaleikh lifnei yhoh; be’arzot, haHayim. he’emanti ki ’adabeir; ’ani, ‘aniti me’od. ’ani ’amarti weHafeci; kal ha’adam koceiw. mah ’ashiw yhoh; kal tagmulohi ‘alay. kos yeshu‘ot ’esa; uwesheim yhoh ’eqra. nedaray yhoh ’ashaleim; negdah na, lekhal ‘amo. yaqar be‘einei yhoh; hamawetah, laHasidaw. ’anah yhoh ki ’ani ‘awdekha ’ani ‘awdekha ben ’amatekha; pitaHta, lemoseiray. lekha ’ecbaH cewaH todah; uwesheim yhoh ’eqra. nedaray yhoh ’ashaleim; negdah na, lekhal ‘amo. beHazrot beit yhoh betokheikhi yerushalim, halu yah.

117

 halu ’et yhoh kal goyim; beHuhu, kal ha’umim. ki gawar ‘aleinu Hasdo, we’emet yhoh le‘olam, halu yah.

118

 hodu yhoh ki Tow; ki le‘olam Hasdo. yomar na yisra’eil; ki le‘olam Hasdo. yomeru na weit ’aharon; ki le‘olam Hasdo. yomeru na yir’ei yhoh; ki le‘olam Hasdo. min hameizar qarati yah; ‘anani wamerHaw yah. yhoh li lo ’ira; mah ya‘aseh li ’adam. yhoh li be‘oceray; wa’ani, ’er’eh wesone’ay. Tow, laHasot yhoh; mibeToaH, ba’adam. Tow, laHasot yhoh; mibeToaH, bindiwim. kal goyim sewawuni; besheim yhoh ki ’amilam. sabuni gam sewawuni; besheim yhoh ki ’amilam. sabuni khidworim, do‘akhu ke’eish qozim; besheim yhoh ki ’amilam. daHoh deHitani linpol; yhoh ‘acarani. ‘acci wecimrat yah; wayhi li, lishu‘ah. qol rinah wishu‘ah, be’aholei zadiqim; yemin yhoh ‘osah Hayil. yemin yhoh romeimah; yemin yhoh ‘osah Hayil. lo ’amut ki ’eHyeh; wa’asapeir, ma‘asei yah. yassor yisserani yah; welamawet, lo netanani. pitHu li sha‘arei zedeq; ’awo wam ’odeh yah. ceh hasha‘ar yhoh; zadiqim, yawo’u wo. ’odkha ki ‘anitani; watehi li, lishu‘ah. ’ewen ma’asu habonim; hayetah, lerosh pinah. mei’eit yhoh hayetah cot; hi niflat be‘eineinu. ceh hayom ‘asah yhoh; nagilah wenismeHah wo. ’ana yhoh hoshi‘ah na; ’ana yhoh hazliHah na. barukh haba besheim yhoh; beirakhnukhem, mibeit yhoh. ’eil yhoh waya’er lanu ’isru Hag ba‘awotim; ‘ad qarnot, hamicbeiaH. ’eili ’atah we’odeka; ’elohay, ’aromeka. hodu yhoh ki Tow; ki le‘olam Hasdo.

119

 ’ashrei temimei darekh; haholekhim, betorat yhoh. ’ashrei nozerei ‘eidotaw, bekhal leiw yidreshuhu. ’af lo fa‘alu ‘awlah; bidrakhaw halakhu. ’atah ziwwitah fiqudekha, lishmor me’od. ’aHalay yikonu derakhay, lishmor Huqekha. ’ac lo ’eiwosh; behabiTi, ’el kal mizwotekha. ’odkha beyosher leiwaw; belamedi, mishpeTei zidqekha. ’et Huqekha ’eshmor; ’al ta‘acweini ‘ad me’od. bameh yecakeh na‘ar ’et ’areHo; lishmor, kidwarekha. bekhal libi derashtikha; ’al tashgeini, mimizwotekha. belibi zafanti ’imratekha; lema‘an, lo ’eHeTa lakh. barukh ’atah yhoh lamedeini Huqekha. bisfatay siparti; kol, mishpeTei fikha. bederekh ‘eidewotekha sasti, ke‘al kal hon. befiqudekha ’asiHah; we’abiTah, ’oreHotekha. beHuqotekha ’eshta‘asha‘; lo ’eshkaH dewarekha. gemol ‘al ‘awdekha ’eHyeh, we’eshmerah dewarekha. gal ‘einay we’abiTah; nifla’ot, mitoratekha. geir ’anokhi wa’arez; ’al tasteir mimeni, mizwotekha. garesah nafshi leta’awah; ’el mishpaTekha wekhal ‘eit. ga‘arta ceidim ’arurim; hashogim mimizwotekha. gal mei‘alay Herpah wawuc; ki ‘eidotekha nazareti. gam yashewu rim bi nidbaru; ‘awdekha, yasiaH beHuqekha. gam ‘eidotekha sha‘ashu‘ay, ’anshei ‘azati. daweqah le‘afar nafshi; Hayeini, kidwarekha. derakhay siparti wata‘aneini, lamedeini Huqekha. derekh piqudekha hawineini; we’asiHah, benifle’otekha. dalefah nafshi mitugah; qayemeini, kidwarekha. derekhoshe qer haseir mimeni; wetoratekha Haneini derekh ’emunah waHareti; mishpaTekha shiwwiti. dawaqti we‘eidewotekha; yhoh ’al tewisheini. derekh mizwotekha ’aruz; ki tarHiw libi. horeini yhoh derekh Huqekha, we’ezerenah ‘eiqew. hawineini we’ezerah toratekha, we’eshmerenah wekhal leiw. hadrikheini bintiw mizwotekha; ki wo Hafazeti. haT libi ’el ‘eidewotekha, we’al ’el baza‘. ha‘aweir ‘einay meire’ot shaw; bidrakhekha Hayeini. haqeim le‘awdekha ’imratekha; ’asher, leyir’atekha. ha‘aweir Herpati ’asher yagoreti; ki mishpaTekha Towim. hineih ta’awti lefiqudekha; bezidqatekha Hayeini. wiwo’uni Hasadekha yhoh; teshu‘atekha, ke’imratekha. we’e‘eneh Horefi dawar; ki waTaHti bidwarekha. we’al tazeil mipi dewar ’emet ‘ad me’od; ki lemishpaTekha yiHaleti. we’eshmerah toratekha tamid, le‘olam wa‘ed. we’ethalekhah wareHawah; ki fiqudekha darasheti. wa’adaberah we‘eidotekha neged melakhim, welo ’eiwosh. we’eshta‘asha‘ bemizwotekha, ’asher ’ahaweti. we’esa khapay, ’el mizwotekha ’asher ’ahaweti, we’asiHah weHuqekha. cekhor dawar le‘awdekha; ‘al, ’asher yiHaltani. cot neHamati we‘aneyi; ki ’imratekha Hiyateni. ceidim helizuni ‘ad me’od; mitoratekha, lo naTiti. cakharti mishpaTekha mei‘olam yhoh wa’etneHam. cal‘afah ’aHacatni meiresha‘im; ‘ocewei, toratekha. cemirot hayu li Huqekha, beweit meguray. cakharti walaylah shimkha yhoh; wa’eshmerah, toratekha. cot hayetah li; ki fiqudekha nazareti. Helqi yhoh ’amarti, lishmor dewarekha. Hiliti fanekha wekhal leiw; Haneini ke’imratekha. Hishawti derakhay; wa’ashiwah raglay, ’el ‘eidotekha. Hashti welo hitmahmaheti; lishmor, mizwotekha. Hewlei resha‘im ‘iwweduni; toratekha, lo shakhaHeti. Hazot laylah, ’aqum lehodot lakh; ‘al, mishpeTei zidqekha. Haweir ’ani lekhal ’asher yerei’ukha; uleshomerei, piqudekha. Hasdekha yhoh male’ah ha’arez, Huqekha lamedeini. Tow ‘asita ‘im ‘awdekha; yhoh kidwarekha. Tuw Ta‘am wada‘at lamedeini; ki wemizwotekha he’emaneti. Terem ’e‘eneh ’ani shogeig; we‘atah, ’imratekha shamareti. Tow ’atah umeiTiw, lamedeini Huqekha. Tafelu ‘alay sheqer ceidim; ’ani, bekhal leiw ’ezor piqudekha. Tafash kaHeilew libam; ’ani, toratekha shi‘asha‘eti. Tow li khi ‘uneiti; lema‘an, ’elmad Huqekha. Tow li torat pikha; mei’alfei, cahaw wakhasef. yadekha ‘asuni waykhonuni; hawineini, we’elmedah mizwotekha. yerei’ekha yir’uni weyismaHu; ki lidwarekha yiHaleti. yada‘ti yhoh ki zedeq mishpaTekha; we’emunah, ‘initani. yehi na Hasdekha lenaHameini; ke’imratekha le‘awdekha. yewo’uni raHamekha we’eHyeh; ki toratekha, sha‘ashu‘ay. yeiwoshu ceidim ki sheqer ‘iwwetuni; ’ani, ’asiaH befiqudekha. yashuwu li yerei’ekha; weyade‘u weyode‘ei, ‘eidotekha. yehi libi tamim beHuqekha; lema‘an, lo ’eiwosh. kaletah litshu‘atekha nafshi; lidwarekha yiHaleti. kalu ‘einay le’imratekha; leimor, matay tenaHameini. ki hayiti kenod beqiTor; Huqekha, lo shakhaHeti. kamah yemei ‘awdekha; matay ta‘aseh werodefay mishpaT. karu li ceidim shiHot; ’asher, lo khetoratekha. kal mizwotekha ’emunah; sheqer redafuni ‘acereini. kim‘aT kiluni wa’arez; wa’ani, lo ‘acawti fiquwdekha keHasdekha Hayeini; we’eshmerah, ‘eidut pikha. le‘olam yhoh; dewarekha, nizaw bashamayim. ledor wador ’emunatekha; konanta ’erez, wata‘amod. lemishpaTekha ‘amedu hayom; ki hakol ‘awadekha. lulei toratekha sha‘ashu‘ay; ’ac, ’awadti we‘aneyi. le‘olam lo ’eshkaH piqudekha; ki wam, Hiyitani. lekha ’ani hoshi‘eini; ki fiqudekha darasheti. li qiwwu resha‘im le’abedeini; ‘eidotekha, ’etbonan. lekhal tikhlah ra’iti qeiz; reHawah mizwatekha me’od. mah ’ahawti toratekha; kal hayom, hi siHati. mei’oyeway teHakemeini mizwotekha; ki le‘olam hi li. mikal melameday hiskalti; ki ‘eidewotekha, siHah lyi. micceqeinim ’etbonan; ki fiqudekha nazareti. mikal ’oraH ra‘ kaliti raglay; lema‘an, ’eshmor dewarekha. mimishpaTekha lo sareti; ki ’atah, horeitani. mah nimlezu leHiki ’imratekha, midewash lefi. mipiqudekha ’etbonan; ‘al kein, saneiti kal ’oraH shaqer. neir leragli dewarekha; we’or, lintiwati. nishba‘ti wa’aqayeimah; lishmor, mishpeTei zidqekha. na‘aneiti ‘ad me’od; yhoh Hayeini khidwarekha. nidwot pi rezeih na yhoh; umishpaTekha lamedeini. nafshi wekhapi tamid; wetoratekha, lo shakhaHeti. natenu resha‘im paH li; umipiqudekha, lo ta‘iti. naHalti ‘eidewotekha le‘olam; ki seson libi heimah. naTiti libi la‘asot Huqekha, le‘olam ‘eiqew. sei‘afim saneiti; wetoratekha ’ahaweti. sitri umagini ’atah; lidwarekha yiHaleti. suru mimeni merei‘im; we’ezerah, mizwot ’elohay. samekheini khe’imratekha we’eHyeh; we’al tewisheini, misiwri. se‘adeini we’iwwashei‘ah; we’esh‘ah weHuqekha tamid. salita kal shogim meiHuqekha; kishe, qer tarmitam. sigim, hishbata khal rish‘ei ’arez; lakhein, ’ahawti ‘eidotekha. samar mipaHdekha wesari; umimishpaTekha yareiti. ‘asiti mishpaT wazedeq; bal taniHeini, le‘osheqay. ‘arow ‘awdekha leTow; ’al ya‘ashquni ceidim. ‘einay kalu lishu‘atekha; ule’imrat zidqekha. ‘aseih ‘im ‘awdekha kheHasdekha, weHuqekha lamedeini. ‘awdekha ’ani hawineini; we’eide‘ah, ‘eidotekha. ‘eit la‘asot yhoh; heifeiru, toratekha. ‘al kein ’ahawti mizwotekha; miccahaw umipac. ‘al kein kal piqudei khol yishareti; kal ’oraH sheqer saneiti. pela’ot ‘eidewotekha; ‘al kein, nezaratam nafshi. peitaH dewarekha ya’ir, meiwin petayim. pi fa‘arti wa’esh’afah; ki lemizwotekha ya’aweti. peneih ’eilay weHaneini kemishpaT, le’ohawei shemekha. pe‘amay hakhein be’imratekha; we’al tashleT bi khal ’awen. pedeini mei‘osheq ’adam; we’eshmerah, piqudekha. panekha ha’eir be‘awdekha; welamedeini, ’et Huqekha. palgei mayim yaredu ‘einay; ‘al, lo shameru toratekha. zadiq ’atah yhoh; weyashar, mishpaTekha. ziwwita zedeq ‘eidotekha; we’emunah me’od. zimetatni qin’ati; ki shakheHu dewarekha zaray. zerufah ’imratekha me’od, we‘awdekha ’aheiwah. za‘ir ’anokhi weniwceh; piqudekha, lo shakhaHeti. zidqatekha zedeq le‘olam; wetoratekha ’emet. zar umazoq meza’uni; mizwotekha, sha‘ashu‘ay. zedeq ‘eidewotekha le‘olam, hawineini we’eHyeh. qarati wekhal leiw ‘aneini yhoh Huqekha ’ezorah. qeratikha hoshi‘eini; we’eshmerah, ‘eidotekha. qidamti waneshef wa’ashawwei‘ah; lidwarekha lidwarekha yiHaleti. qidemu ‘einay ’ashmurot; lasiaH, be’imratekha. qoli shim‘ah kheHasdekha; yhoh kemishpaTekha Hayeini. qarewu rodefei cimah; mitoratekha raHaqu. qarow ’atah yhoh; wekhal mizwotekha ’emet. qedem yada‘ti mei‘eidotekha; ki le‘olam yesadtam. re’eih ‘aneyi weHalezeini; ki toratekha, lo shakhaHeti. riwah riwi uge’aleini; le’imratekha Hayeini. raHoq meiresha‘im yeshu‘ah; ki Huqekha lo darashu. raHamekha rabim yhoh; kemishpaTekha Hayeini. rabim rodefay wezaray; mei‘eidewotekha, lo naTiti. ra’iti wogedim wa’etqoTaTah; ’asher ’imratekha, lo shamaru. re’eih ki fiqudekha ’ahaweti; yhoh keHasdekha Hayeini. rosh dewarekha ’emet; ule‘olam, kal mishpaT zidqekha. rim redafuni Hinam; umidewarekha umidewarekha, paHad libi. sas ’anokhi ‘al ’imratekha; kemozei, shalal raw. sheqer neiti wa’ata‘eiwah; toratekha ’ahaweti. shewa‘ bayom hilaltikha; ‘al, mishpeTei zidqekha. shalom raw le’ohawei toratekha; we’ein lamo mikhshol. sibarti lishu‘atekha yhoh; umizwotekha ‘asiti. shamerah nafshi ‘eidotekha; wa’ohaweim me’od. shamarti fiqudekha we‘eidotekha; ki khal derakhay negdekha. tiqraw rinati lefanekha yhoh; kidwarekha hawineini. tawo teHinati lefanekha; ke’imratekha, hazileini. taba‘nah sefatay tehilah; ki telamedeini Huqekha. ta‘an leshoni ’imratekha; ki khal mizwotekha zedeq. tehi yadekha le‘acereini; ki fiqudekha waHareti. ta’awti lishu‘atekha yhoh; wetoratekha, sha‘ashu‘ay. teHi nafshi utehaleka; umishpaTekha ya‘acruni. ta‘iti, keseh ’oweid baqeish ‘awdekha; ki mizwotekha, lo shakhaHeti.

120

 shir, hama‘alot ’el yhoh bazaratah li; qarati, waya‘aneini. yhoh hazilah nafshi misefat sheqer; milashon remiyah. mah yitein lekha umah yosif lakh, lashon remiyah. Hizei gibor shenunim; ‘im, gaHalei retamim. ’oyah li ki garti meshekh; khanti, ‘im ’aholei qeidar. rabat shakhenah lah nafshi; ‘im, sonei shalom. ’anisha lom wekhi ’adabeir; heimah, lamilHamah.

121

 shir, lama‘alot ’esa ‘einay ’el heharim; mei’ayin, yawo ‘ecri. ‘ecri mei‘im yhoh; ‘oseih, shamayim wa’arez. ’al yitein lamoT raglekha; ’al yanum, shomerekha. hineih lo yanum welo yishan; wmeir, yisra’eil. yhoh shomerekha; yhoh zilekha, ‘al yad yeminekha. yomam, hashemesh lo yakekah, weyareiaH balayelah. yhoh yishmarekha mikal ra‘; yishmor, ’et nafshekha. yhoh yishmar zeitekha uwo’ekha; mei‘atah, we‘ad ‘olam.

122

 shir hama‘alot, ledawid maHti be’omerim li; beit yhoh neileikh. ‘omedot hayu ragleinu; bish‘arayikh, yerushalim. yerushalim habenuyah; ke‘ir, sheHuberah lah yaHdaw. shesham ‘alu shewaTim shiwTei yah ‘eidut leyisra’eil; lehodot, lesheim yhoh. ki shamah yashewu khis’ot lemishpaT; kis’ot, leweit dawid. ’alu shelom yerushalim; yishlayu, ’ohawayikh. yehi shalom beHeileikh; lewah, be’armenotayikh. lema‘an ’aHay werei‘ay; ’adaberah na shalom bakh. lema‘an beit yhoh ’eloheinu; ’awaqshah Tow lakh.

123

 shir, hama‘alot ’eilekha nasati ’et ‘einay; hayoshewi, bashamayim. hineih khe‘einei ‘awadim ’el yad ’adoneihem, ke‘einei shifHah ’el yad gewirtah kein ‘eineinu ’el yhoh ’eloheinu; ‘ad, sheyeHaneinu. Haneinu yhoh Haneinu; ki raw, sawa‘nu wuc. rabat sawe‘ah lah nafsheinu hala‘ag hasha’ananim; habuc, lig’eiyonim

124

 shir hama‘alot, ledawid lulei yhoh shehayah lanu; yomar na yisra’eil. lulei yhoh shehayah lanu; bequm ‘aleinu ’adam. ’acay Hayim bela‘unu; baHarot ’apam banu. ’acay hamayim sheTafunu; naHlah, ‘awar ‘al nafsheinu. ’acay ‘awar ‘al nafsheinu; hamayim, hacceidonim. barukh yhoh; shelo netananu Teref, leshineihem. nafsheinu, kezipor nimleTah mipaH yoqshim hapaH nishbar, wa’anaHnu nimlaTenu. ‘ecreinu besheim yhoh; ‘oseih, shamayim wa’arez.

125

 shir, hama‘alot haboTeHim yhoh; kehar ziyon lo yimoT, le‘olam yeisheiw. yerushalim, harim sawiw lah yhoh sawiw le‘amo; mei‘atah, we‘ad ‘olam. ki lo yanuaH sheiweT haresha‘, ‘al goral hazadiqim lema‘an lo yishleHu hazadiqim be‘awlatah yedeihem. heiTiwah yhoh laTowim; welisharim, belibotam. wehamaTim ‘aqalqalotam, yolikheim yhoh ’et po‘alei ha’awen; lom, ‘al yisra’eil.

126

 shir, hama‘alot beshuw yhoh ’et shiwat ziyon; hayinu, keHolemim. ’ac yimalei seHoq pinu uleshoneinu rinah ’ac yomeru wagoyim; higdil yhoh la‘asot ‘im ’eileh. higdil yhoh la‘asot ‘imanu, hayinu semeiHim. shuwah yhoh ’et shewuteinu shewiteinu; ka’afiqim banegew. haccore‘im bedim‘ah, berinah yiqzoru. halokh yeileikh uwakhoh nosei meshekh haccara‘ bo yawo werinah; nosei, ’alumotaw.

127

 shir hama‘alot, lishlomoh ’im yhoh lo yiwneh wayit, shaw ‘amelu wonaw bo; ’im yhoh lo yishmar ‘ir, shaw shaqad shomeir. shaw lakhem mashkimei qum me’aHarei shewet, ’okhelei leHem ha‘azawim; kein yitein lidido sheina. hineih naHalat yhoh banim; khar, peri habaTen. keHizim beyad gibor; kein, benei hane‘urim. ’ashrei hagewer, ’asher milei ’et ’ashpato, meihem lo yeiwoshu; ki yedaberu ’et ’oywim basha‘ar.

128

 shir, hama‘alot ’ashrei kal yerei yhoh; haholeikh, bidrakhaw. yegia‘ kapekha ki tokheil; ’ashrekha, weTow lakh. ’eshtekha kegefen poriyah beyarketei weitekha banekha kishtilei ceitim; sawiw, leshulHanekha. hineih khi khein yeworakh gawer, yerei yhoh. yewarekhkha yhoh miziyon ure’eih beTuw yerushalim; kol, yemei Hayekha. ure’eih wanim lewanekha; lom, ‘al yisra’eil.

129

 shir, hama‘alot rabat zeraruni mine‘uray; yomar na yisra’eil. rabat zeraruni mine‘uray; gam lo yakhelu li. ‘al gabi Hareshu Horeshim; he’erikhu, lema‘anotam lema‘anitam. yhoh zadiq; qizeiz, ‘awot resha‘im. yeiwoshu weyissogu ’aHor; kol, sone’ei ziyon. yihyu kaHazir gagot; sheqadmat shalaf yaweish. shelo milei khapo qozeir, weHizno me‘ameir. welo ’ameru ha‘owerim, birkat yhoh ’aleikhem; beirakhnu ’etkhem, besheim yhoh.

130

 shir hama‘alot; mima‘amaqim qeratikha yhoh. ’adonay shim‘ah weqoli tihyenah ’acenekha qashuwot; leqol, taHanunay. ’im ‘awonot tishmar yah; ’adonay, mi ya‘amod. ki ‘imekha hasseliHah; lema‘an, tiwwarei. qiwwiti yhoh qiwwetah nafshi; welidwaro hoHaleti. nafshi ladonay; mishomerim laboqer, shomerim laboqer. yaHeil yisra’eil, ’el yhoh ki ‘im yhoh haHesed; weharbeih ‘imo fedut. wehu yifdeh ’et yisra’eil; mikol, ‘awonotaw.

131

 shir hama‘alot, ledawid yhoh lo gawah libi welo ramu ‘einay; welo hilakhti bigdolot uwenifla’ot mimeni. ’im lo shiwwiti wedomamti, nafshi kegamul ‘alei ’imo; kagamul ‘alay nafshi. yaHeil yisra’eil ’el yhoh; mei‘atah, we‘ad ‘olam.

132

 shir, hama‘alot cekhor yhoh ledawid; ’eit kal ‘unoto. ’asher nishba‘ yhoh; nadar, la’awir ya‘aqow. ’im ’awo be’ohel beiti; ’im ’e‘eleh, ‘al ‘eres yezu‘ay. ’im ’etein shenat le‘einay; le‘af‘apay tenumah. ‘ad ’emza maqom yhoh; mishkanot, la’awir ya‘aqow. hineih shema‘anuha we’efratah; mezanuha, bisdei ya‘ar. nawo’ah lemishkenotaw; nishtaHaweh, lahadom raglaw. qumah yhoh limnuHatekha; ’atah, wa’aron ‘uccekha. kohanekha yilbeshu zedeq; waHasidekha yeraneinu. ba‘awur dawid ‘awdekha; ’al tasheiw, penei meshiHekha. nishba‘ yhoh ledawid ’emet lo yashuw mimenah miperi wiTnekha; ’ashit, lekhissei lakh. ’im yishmeru wanekha beriti we‘eidoti co, ’alamedeim gam beneihem ‘adei ‘ad; yeishewu, lekhissei lakh. ki waHar yhoh beziyon; ’iwwah, lemoshaw lo. cot menuHati ‘adei ‘ad; poh ’eisheiw, ki ’iwwitiha. zeidah bareikh ’awareikh; ’ewyoneha, ’asbia‘ laHem. wekhohaneha ’albish yesha‘; waHasideha, ranein yeraneinu. sham ’azmiaH qeren ledawid; ‘arakhti neir, limshiHi. ’oywaw ’albish boshet; we‘alaw, yaziz nicro.

133

 shir hama‘alot, ledawid hineih mah Tow umah na‘im; shewet ’aHim gam yaHad. kashemen haTow ‘al harosh, yoreid, ‘al haccaqan ceqan ’aharon; yoreid, ‘al pi midotaw. keTal Hermon, sheyoreid ‘al harei ziyon ki sham ziwwah yhoh ’et haberakhah; Hayim, ‘ad ha‘olam.

134

 shir, hama‘alot hineih barakhu ’et yhoh kal ‘awdei yhoh; ha‘omedim beweit yhoh baleilot. se’u yedeikhem qodesh; uwarakhu ’et yhoh. yewarekhkha yhoh miziyon; ‘oseih, shamayim wa’arez.

135

 halu yah halu ’et sheim yhoh; halu ‘awdei yhoh. ‘omedim beweit yhoh; beHazrot, beit ’eloheinu. halu yah ki Tow yhoh; cameru lishmo, ki na‘im. ki ya‘aqow, baHar lo yah; yisra’eil, lisgulato. ki ’ani yada‘ti ki gadol yhoh; wa’adoneinu, mikal ’elohim. kol ’asher Hafeiz yhoh ‘asah bashamayim uwa’arez; bayamim, wekhal tehomot. ma‘aleh nesi’im miqzeih ha’arez beraqim lamaTar ‘asah; mozei ruaH mei’ozrotaw. hikah bekhorei mizrayim; mei’adam, ‘ad beheimah. shalaH ’otot umofetim betokheikhi mizrayim; befar‘oh, uwekhal ‘awadaw. hikah goyim rabim; weharag, melakhim ‘azumim. lesiHon melekh ha’emori, ule‘og melekh habashan; ulekhol, mamlekhot kena‘an. wenatan ’arzam naHalah; naHalah, leyisra’eil ‘amo. yhoh shimkha le‘olam; yhoh cikhrekha ledor wador. ki yadin yhoh ‘amo; we‘al ‘awadaw, yitneHam. ‘azabei hagoyim kesef wecahaw; ma‘aseih, yedei ’adam. peh lahem welo yedabeiru; ‘einayim lahem, welo yir’u. ’acenayim lahem welo ya’acinu; ’af, ’ein yesh ruaH befihem. kemohem yihyu ‘oseihem; kol ’asher boTeiaH bahem. beit yisra’eil barakhu ’et yhoh; beit ’aharon, barakhu ’et yhoh. beit haleiwi barakhu ’et yhoh; yir’ei yhoh barakhu ’et yhoh. barukh yhoh miziyon, shokhein yerushalim, halu yah.

136

 hodu yhoh ki Tow; ki le‘olam Hasdo. hodu leilohei ha’elohim; ki le‘olam Hasdo. hodu la’adonei ha’adonim; ki le‘olam Hasdo. le‘oseih nifla’ot gedolot lewado; ki le‘olam Hasdo. le‘oseih hashamayim bitwunah; ki le‘olam Hasdo. leroqa‘ ha’arez ‘al hamayim; ki le‘olam Hasdo. le‘oseih ’orim gedolim; ki le‘olam Hasdo. ’et hashemesh lememshelet bayom; ki le‘olam Hasdo. ’et hayareiaH wekhokhawim lememshelot balayelah; ki le‘olam Hasdo. lemakeih mizrayim biwkhoreihem; ki le‘olam Hasdo. wayozei yisra’eil mitokham; ki le‘olam Hasdo. beyad Hacaqah uwicroa‘ neTuyah; ki le‘olam Hasdo. legoceir yam suf ligcarim; ki le‘olam Hasdo. wehe‘ewir yisra’eil betokho; ki le‘olam Hasdo. weni‘eir par‘oh weHeilo weyam suf; ki le‘olam Hasdo. lemolikh ‘amo bamidbar; ki le‘olam Hasdo. lemakeih melakhim gedolim; ki le‘olam Hasdo. wayaharog melakhim ’adirim; ki le‘olam Hasdo. lesiHon melekh ha’emori; ki le‘olam Hasdo. ule‘og melekh habashan; ki le‘olam Hasdo. wenatan ’arzam lenaHalah; ki le‘olam Hasdo. naHalah leyisra’eil ‘awdo; ki le‘olam Hasdo. beshifleinu cakhar lanu; ki le‘olam Hasdo. wayifreqeinu mizareinu; ki le‘olam Hasdo. notein leHem lekhal basar; ki le‘olam Hasdo. hodu le’eil hashamayim; ki le‘olam Hasdo.

137

 ‘al naharot bawel, sham yashawnu gam bakhinu; becakhereinu, ’et ziyon. ‘al ‘arawim betokhah; talinu, kinoroteinu. ki sham she’eilunu showeinu diwreishi r wetolaleinu simHah; shiru lanu, mishir ziyon. ’eikh, nashir ’et shir yhoh; ‘al, ’admat neikhar. ’im ’eshkaHeikh yerushalim, tishkaH yemini. tidbaq leshoni leHiki ’im lo ’eckereikhi ’im lo ’a‘aleh ’et yerushalim; ‘al, rosh simHati. cekhor yhoh liwnei ’edom, ’eit yom yerushalim ha’omerim ‘aru ‘aru; ‘ad, haysod bah. bat bawel, hashedudah ’ashrei sheyshalem lakh; ’et gemuleikh, shegamalt lanu. ’ashrei sheyoHeic wenipeiz ’et ‘olalayikh, ’el hassala‘.

138

 ledawid ’odkha wekhal libi; neged ’elohim ’acamereka. ’eshtaHaweh ’el heikhal qadshekha we’odeh ’et shemekha, ‘al Hasdekha we‘al ’amitekha; ki higdalta ‘al kaloshi mekha, ’imratekha. beyom qarati wata‘aneini; tarhiweini wenafshi ‘oc. yodukha yhoh kal malkhei ’arez; ki me‘u, ’imrei fikha. weyashiru bedarkhei yhoh; ki gadol, kewod yhoh. ki ram yhoh weshafal yir’eh; wegawoah, mimerHaq yeyeida‘. ’im ’eileikh beqerew zarah, teHayeini ‘al ’af ’oyeway tishlaH yadekha; wetoshi‘eini yeminekha. yhoh yigmor ba‘adi yhoh Hasdekha le‘olam; ma‘asei yadekha ’al teref.

139

 lamnazeiaH ledawid micmor; yhoh Haqartani, wateida‘. ’atah yada‘ta shiwti wequmi; bantah lerei‘i, meiraHoq. ’areHi weriw‘i ceirita; wekhal derakhay hiskantah. ki ’ein milah bilshoni; hein yhoh yada‘ta khulah. ’aHor waqedem zartani; watashet ‘alay kapekhah. pil’iyah peli’ah da‘at mimeni; nisgewah, lo ’ukhal lah. ’anah ’eileikh meiruHekha; we’anah, mipanekha ’ewraH. ’im ’essaq mayim sham ’atah; we’azi‘ah she’ol hineka. ’esa khanfei shaHar; ’eshkenah, be’aHarit yam. gamosha m yadekha tanHeini; wetoHaceini yeminekha. wa’omar ’akh Hoshekh yeshufeini; welaylah, ’or ba‘adeini. gam Hoshekh lo yaHshikh mimekha welaylah kayom ya’ir; kaHasheikhah, ka’orah. ki ’atah qanita khilyotay; tesukeini, beweTen ’imi. ’odkha, ‘al ki nora’ot, nifleiti nifla’im ma‘asekha; wenafshi, yoda‘at me’od. lo nikhHad ‘azemi, mimeka ’asher ‘useiti wasseiter; ruqamti, betaHtiyot ’arez. galemi ra’u ‘einekha, we‘al sifrekha kulam yikateiwu yamim yuzaru; welo welo ’eHad bahem. weli, mah yaqeru rei‘ekha ’eil; meh ‘azemu rasheihem. ’espereim meiHol yirbun; heqizoti, we‘odi ‘imakh. ’im tiqTol ’eloah rasha‘; we’anshei damim, suru meni. ’asher yomerukha limcimah; nasu lashaw ‘arekha. halo mesan’ekha yhoh ’esna; uwitqomekha, ’etqoTaT. takhlit sin’ah seneitim; le’oywim, hayu li. Haqereini ’eil weda‘ lewawi; beHaneini, weda‘ sar‘apay. ure’eih, ’im derekh ‘ozew bi; uneHeini, bederekh ‘olam.

140

 lamnazeiaH, micmor ledawid. Halezeini yhoh mei’adam ra‘; mei’ish Hamasim tinzereini. ’asher Hashewu ra‘ot beleiw; kal yom, yaguru milHamot. shananu leshonam kemo naHash Hamat ‘akhshuw; taHat sefateimo selah. shamereini yhoh midei rasha‘, mei’ish Hamasim tinzereini; ’asher Hashewu, lidHot pe‘amay. Tamenu gei’im paH li, waHawalim, paresu reshet leyad ma‘gal; moqeshim shatu li selah. ’amarti yhoh ’eili ’atah; ha’acinah yhoh qol taHanunay. yhoh ’adonay ‘oc yeshu‘ati; sakotah leroshi, beyom nasheq. ’al titein yhoh ma’awayei rasha‘; cemamo ’al tafeiq, yarumu selah. rosh mesibay; ‘amal sefateimo yekhassumo yekhasseimo yamiTu yimoTu ‘aleihem, geHalim ba’eish yapileim; bemahamorot, bal yaqumu. ’ish lashon bal yikon ba’arez ’ish Hamas ra‘; yezudenu, lemadHeifot. yada‘ta yada‘ti, ki ya‘aseh yhoh din ‘ani; mishpaT, ’ewyonim. ’akh zadiqim yodu lishmekha; yeishewu yesharim, ’et panekha.

141

 micmor, ledawid yhoh qeratikha Hushah li; ha’acinah qoli, beqare’i lakh. tikon tefilati qeToret lefanekha; mas’at kapay, minHat ‘arew. shitah yhoh shamerah lefi; nizerah, ‘al dal sefatay. ’al taT libi ledawar ra‘ lehit‘oleil ‘alilot beresha‘, ’et ’ishim po‘alei ’awen; uwal ’elHam, beman‘ameihem. yehelmeini zadiq Hesed weyokhiHeini, shemen rosh ’al yani roshi; ki ‘od utefilati, bera‘oteihem. nishmeTu widei sela‘ shofeTeihem; weshame‘u ’amaray, ki na‘eimu. kemo foleiaH uwoqeia‘ ba’arez; nifceru ‘azameinu, lefi she’ol. ki ’eilekha yhoh ’adonay ‘einay; bekhah Hasiti, ’al te‘ar nafshi. shamereini, midei faH yaqeshu li; umoqeshot, po‘alei ’awen. yipelu wemakhmoraw resha‘im; yaHad ’anokhi, ‘ad ’e‘ewor.

142

 maskil ledawid; bihyoto wame‘arah tefilah. qoli ’el yhoh ’ec‘aq; qoli, ’el yhoh ’etHanan. ’eshpokh lefanaw siHi; zarati, lefanaw ’agid. behit‘aTeif ‘alay ruHi, we’atah yada‘ta netiwati be’oraH cu ’ahaleikh; Tamenu faH li. habeiT yamin ure’eih we’ein li makir ’awad manos mimeni; ’ein doreish lenafshi. ca‘aqti ’eilekha, yhoh ’amarti ’atah maHsi; Helqi, be’erez haHayim. haqshiwah ’el rinati ki daloti me’od hazileini meirodefay; ki ’amezu mimeni. hozi’ah mimasgeir nafshi lehodot ’et shemekha bi yakhtiru zadiqim; ki tigmol ‘alay.

143

 micmor, ledawid yhoh shema‘ tefilati, ha’acinah ’el taHanunay; be’emunatekha ‘aneini, bezidqatekha. we’al tawo wemishpaT ’et ‘awdekha; ki lo yizdaq lefanekha khal Hay. ki radaf ’oyeiw nafshi, dika la’arez Hayati; hoshiwani wemaHashakim, kemeitei ‘olam. watit‘aTeif ‘alay ruHi; betokhi, yishtomeim libi. cakharti yamim miqedem, hagiti wekhal pa‘olekha; bema‘aseih yadekha ’asoHeiaH. peirasti yaday ’eilekha; nafshi ke’erez ‘ayeifah lekha selah. maheir ‘aneini yhoh kaletah ruHi ’al tasteir panekha mimeni; wenimshalti, ‘im yoredei wor. hashmi‘eini waboqer Hasdekha ki wekha waTaHeti hodi‘eini, derekh cu ’eileikh; ki ’eilekha nasati nafshi. hazileini mei’oyeway yhoh ’eilekha khissiti. lamedeini la‘asot rezonekha ki ’atah ’elohay ruHakha Towah; tanHeini, be’erez mishor. lema‘an shimkha yhoh teHayeini; bezidqatekha tozi mizarah nafshi. uweHasdekha tazmit ’oyeway weha’awadta kal zorarei nafshi; ki, ’ani ‘awdekha.

144

 ledawid barukh yhoh zuri, hamlameid yaday laqraw; ’ezbe‘otay, lamilHamah. Hasdi umezudati misgabi umefalTi li magini uwo Hasiti; harodeid ‘ami taHtay. yhoh mah ’adam wateida‘eihu; ben ’enosh, wateHasheweihu. ’adam lahewel damah; yamaw, kezeil ‘oweir. yhoh haT shamekha weteireid; ga‘ beharim weye‘eshanu. beroq baraq utefizeim; shelaH Hizekha, utehumeim. shelaH yadekha, mimarom pezeini wehazileini mimayim rabim; miyad, benei neikhar. ’asher pihem diber shaw; wiminam, yemin shaqer. ’elohim, shir Hadash ’ashirah lakh; beneiwel ‘asor, ’acamerah lakh. hanotein teshu‘ah, lamelakhim hapozeh ’et dawid ‘awdo, meiHerew ra‘ah. pezeini wehazileini miyad benei neikhar ’asher pihem diber shaw; wiminam, yemin shaqer. ’asher baneinu kinTi‘im megudalim bin‘ureihem benoteinu khecawiyot; meHuTawot, tawnit heikhal. mecaweinu melei’im mefiqim miccan, ’el can zoneinu ma’alifot merubawot, beHuzoteinu. ’alufeinu, mesubalim ’ein perez we’ein yozeit; we’ein zewaHah, birHowoteinu. ’ashrei ha‘am shekakhah lo; ’ashrei ha‘am, yhoh ’elohaw.

145

 tehilah, ledawid ’aromimkha ’elohay hamelekh; wa’awarakhah mekha, le‘olam wa‘ed. bekhal yom ’awarakheka; wa’ahalah mekha, le‘olam wa‘ed. gadol yhoh umehulal me’od; weligdulato, ’ein Heiqer. dor ledor yeshabaH ma‘asekha; ugewurotekha yagidu. hadar kewod hodekha; wediwrei nifle’otekha ’asiHah. we‘ecuc nor’otekha yomeiru; ugedulotekha ugedulatekha ’asaperenah. ceikher raw Tuwekha yabi‘u; wezidqatekha yeraneinu. Hanun weraHum yhoh; ’erekh ’apayim, ugedal Hased. Tow yhoh lakol; weraHamaw, ‘al kal ma‘asaw. yodukha yhoh kal ma‘asekha; waHasidekha, yewarakhukhah. kewod malkhutekha yomeiru; ugewuratekha yedabeiru. lehodia‘ liwnei ha’adam gewurotaw; ukhewod, hadar malkhuto. malkhutekha, malkhut kal ‘olamim; umemsheltekha, bekhal dor wador. someikh yhoh lekhal hanofelim; wecoqeif, lekhal hakefufim. ‘einei khol ’eilekha yesabeiru; we’atah notein lahem ’et ’akhelam be‘ito. poteiaH ’et yadekha; umasbia‘ lekhal Hay razon. zadiq yhoh bekhal derakhaw; weHasid, bekhal ma‘asaw. qarow yhoh lekhal qore’aw; lekhol ’asher yiqra’uhu we’emet. rezon yerei’aw ya‘aseh; we’et shaw‘atam yishma‘, weyoshi‘eim. shomeir yhoh ’et kal ’ohawaw; we’eit kal haresha‘im yashmid. tehilat yhoh yedaber pi wiwareikh kal basar sheim qadesho, le‘olam wa‘ed.

146

 halu yah hali nafshi, ’et yhoh. ’ahalah yhoh beHayay; ’acamerah leilohay be‘odi. ’al tiwTeHu windiwim; bewen ’adam she’ein lo teshu‘ah. teizei ruHo yashuw le’admato; bayom hahu, ’awedu ‘eshtonotaw. ’ashrei, she’eil ya‘aqow be‘ecro; wero, ‘al yhoh ’elohaw. ‘oseh shamayim wa’arez, ’et hayam we’et kal ’asher bam; hashomeir ’emet le‘olam. ‘oseh mishpaT la‘ashuqim, notein leHem lare‘eiwim; yhoh matir ’asurim. yhoh poqeiaH ‘iwrim, yhoh coqeif kefufim; yhoh ’oheiw zadiqim. yhoh shomeir ’et geirim, yatom we’almanah ye‘odeid; wederekh resha‘im ye‘awweit. yimlokh yhoh le‘olam, ’elohayikh ziyon ledor wador, halu yah.

147

 halu yah ki Tow camerah ’eloheinu; ki na‘im nawah tehilah. boneih yerushalim yhoh; nidHei yisra’eil yekhaneis. harofei lishwurei leiw; umeHabeish, le‘azewotam. moneh mispar lakokhawim; lekhulam, sheimot yiqra. gadol ’adoneinu weraw koaH; litwunato, ’ein mispar. me‘odeid ‘anawim yhoh; mashpil resha‘im ‘adei ’arez. ‘enu yhoh betodah; cameru leiloheinu wekhinor. hamkhasseh shamayim be‘awim, hameikhin la’arez maTar; hamazmiaH harim Hazir. notein liwheimah laHmah; liwnei ‘oreiw, ’asher yiqra’u. lo wigwurat hassus yeHpaz; lo weshoqei ha’ish yirzeh. rozeh yhoh ’et yerei’aw; ’et hamyaHalim leHasdo. shabeHi yerushalim ’et yhoh; hali ’elohayikh ziyon. ki Hiccaq beriHei she‘arayikh; beirakh banayikh beqirbeikh. hasam gewuleikh shalom; Heilew HiTim, yasbi‘eikh. hasholeiaH ’imrato ’arez; ‘ad meheirah, yaruz dewaro. hanotein sheleg kazamer; kefor, ka’eifer yefacceir. mashlikh qarHo khefitim; lifnei qarato, mi ya‘amod. yishlaH dewaro weyamseim; yasheiw ruHo, yiccelu mayim. magid dewaro dewaraw leya‘aqow; Huqaw umishpaTaw, leyisra’eil. lo ‘asah khein lekhal go, umishpaTim bal yeda‘um, halu yah.

148

 halu yah halu ’et yhoh min hashamayim; haluhu, bameromim. haluhu khal mal’akhaw; haluhu, kal zewa’o zewa’aw. haluhu shemesh weyareiaH; haluhu, kal kokhwei ’or. haluhu shemei hashamayim; wehamayim, ’asher mei‘al hashamayim. yehalu ’et sheim yhoh; ki hu ziwwah weniwra’u. waya‘amideim la‘ad le‘olam; Haq natan, welo ya‘awor. halu ’et yhoh min ha’arez; taninim, wekhal tehomot. ’eish uwarad sheleg weqiTor; ruaH se‘arah, ‘osah dewaro. heharim wekhal gewa‘ot; ‘eiz peri, wekhal ’aracim. haHayah wekhal beheimah; remes, wezipor kanaf. malkhei ’erez wekhal le’umim; rim, wekhal shofeTei ’arez. baHurim wegam betulot; ceqeinim, ‘im ne‘arim. yehalu ’et sheim yhoh ki nisgaw shemo lewado; hodo, ‘al ’erez weshamayim. wayarem qeren le‘amo tehilah lekhal Hasidaw, liwnei yisra’eil ‘am qerowo, halu yah.

149

 halu yah shiru yhoh shir Hadash; tehilato, biqhal Hasidim. yismaH yisra’eil be‘osaw; benei ziyon, yagilu wemalkam. yehalu shemo wemaHol; betof wekhinor, yecameru lo. ki rozeh yhoh be‘amo; yefa’eir ‘anawim, bishu‘ah. ya‘lecu Hasidim bekhawod; yeranenu, ‘al mishkewotam. romot ’eil bigronam; weHerew pifiyot beyadam. la‘asot neqamah bagoyim; tokheiHot, bal ’umim. le’sor malkheihem beciqim; wenikhbedeihem, bekhawlei warcel. la‘asot bahem mishpaT katuw, hadar hu lekhal Hasidaw, halu yah.

150

 halu yah halu ’eil beqadesho; haluhu, birqia‘ ‘ucco. haluhu wigwurotaw; haluhu, kerow gudlo. haluhu beteiqa‘ shofar; haluhu, beneiwel wekhinor. haluhu wetof umaHol; haluhu, beminim we‘ugaw. haluhu wezilzelei shama‘; haluhu, bezilzelei teru‘ah. kol haneshamah tehaleil yah, halu yah.

proverbs

1

 mishlei shelomoh wen dawid; melekh, yisra’eil. lada‘at Hakhmah umusar; lehawin, ’imrei winah. laqaHat musar haskeil; zedeq umishpaT, umeisharim. lateit liftayim ‘aremah; lena‘ar, da‘at umecimah. yishma‘ Hakham weyosef leqaH; wenawon, taHbulot yiqneh. lehawin mashal umelizah; diwrei Hakhamim, weHidotam. yir’at yhoh reishit da‘at; Hakhmah umusar, ’ewilim bacu. shema‘ beni musar ’awikha; we’al tiTosh, torat ’imekha. ki liwyat Hein heim leroshekha; wa‘anaqim, legargerotekha. beni ’im yefatukha HaTa’im, ’al towei. ’im yomeru lekhah ’itanu ne’erwah ledam; nizpenah lenaqi Hinam. niwla‘eim kish’ol Hayim; utemimim, keyordei wor. kal hon yaqar nimza; nemalei wateinu shalal. goralekha tapil betokheinu; kis ’eHad, yihyeh lekhulanu. beni, ’al teileikh bederekh ’itam; mena‘ raglekha, minetiwatam. ki ragleihem lara‘ yaruzu; wimaharu, lishpakh dam. ki Hinam mecorah harashet; be‘einei, khal ba‘al kanaf. weheim ledamam ye’erowu; yizpenu, lenafshotam. kein, ’areHot kal bozeia‘ baza‘; ’et nefesh be‘alaw yiqaH. Hakhemot baHuz taronah; bareHowot, titein qolah. berosh homiyot, tiqra befitHei she‘arim ba‘ir, ’amareha tomeir. ‘ad matay petayim te’eihawu feti weleizim, lazon Hamedu lahem; ukhesilim, yisne’u da‘at. tashuwu, letokhaHti hineih ’abi‘ah lakhem ruHi; ’odi‘ah dewaray ’etkhem. ya‘an qarati watema’einu; naTiti yadi, we’ein maqshiw. watifre‘u khal ‘azati; wetokhaHti, lo ’awitem. gam ’ani be’eidekhem ’esHaq; ’el‘ag, bewo faHdekhem. bewo khesha’awah khesho’ah paHdekhem, we’eidekhem kesufah ye’eteh; bewo ‘aleikhem, zarah wezuqah. ’ac yiqra’uni welo ’e‘eneh; yeshaHaruni, welo yimza’uni. taHat ki sane’u da‘at; weyir’at yhoh lo waHaru. lo ’awu la‘azati; na’azu, kal tokhaHti. weyokhelu miperi darkam; umimo‘azoteihem yisba‘u. ki meshuwat petayim tahargeim; weshalwat kesilim te’abedeim. weshomeia‘ li yishkan beTaH; wesha’anan, mipaHad ra‘ah.

2

 beni ’im tiqaH ’amaray; umizwotay, tizpon ’itakh. lehaqshiw laHakhemah ’acenekha; taTeh libekha, latewunah. ki ’im labinah tiqra; latewunah, titein qolekha. ’im tewaqshenah khakasef; wekhamaTmonim taHpesenah. ’ac, tawin yir’at yhoh; weda‘at ’elohim timza. ki yhoh yitein Hakhmah mipiw, da‘at utewunah. wezafan yizpon laysharim tushiyah; magein, leholekhei tom. linzor ’areHot mishpaT; wederekh Hasido Hasidaw yishmor. ’ac, tawin zedeq umishpaT; umeisharim, kal ma‘gal Tow. ki tawo Hakhmah welibekha; weda‘at, lenafshekha yin‘am. mecimah tishmor ‘alekha, tewunah tinzerekah. lehazilekha miderekh ra‘; mei’ish, medabeir tahpukhot. ha‘ocewim ’areHot yosher; lalekhet, bedarkhei Hoshekh. hasemeiHim la‘asot ra‘; yagilu, betahpukhot ra‘. ’asher ’areHoteihem ‘iqeshim; unelocim, bema‘gelotam. lehazilekha mei’ishah carah; minakheriyah, ’amareha heHeliqah. ha‘ocewet ’aluf ne‘ureha; we’et berit ’eloheha shakheiHah. ki shaHah ’el mawet beitah; we’el refa’im, ma‘geloteha. kal ba’eha lo yeshuwun; welo yasigu, ’areHot Hayim. lema‘an, teileikh bederekh Towim; we’areHot zadiqim tishmor. ki yesharim yishkenu ’arez; utemimim, yiwwateru wah. uresha‘im mei’erez yikareitu; uwogdim, yisseHu mimenah.

3

 beni torati ’al tishkaH; umizwotay, yizor libekha. ki ’orekh yamim ushenot Hayim; weshalom, yosifu lakh. Hesed we’emet, ’al ya‘acwukha qashereim ‘al gargerotekha; kateweim, ‘al luaH libekha. umeza Hein weseikhel Tow; be‘einei ’elohim we’adam. beTaH ’el yhoh bekhal libekha; we’el binatekha, ’al tisha‘ein. bekhal derakhekha da‘eihu; wehu, yeyasheir ’oreHotekha. ’al tehi Hakham be‘einekha; yera ’et yhoh wesur meira‘. rif’ut tehi lesharekha; weshiqui, le‘azmotekha. kabeid ’et yhoh meihonekha; umeireishit, kal tewu’atekha. weyimale’u ’asamekha sawa‘; wetirosh, yeqawekha yifrozu. musar yhoh beni ’al tim’as; we’al taqoz, betokhaHto. ki ’et ’asher ye’ehaw yhoh yokhiaH; ukhe’aw, ’et bein yirzeh. ’ashrei ’adam maza Hakhmah we’adam, yafiq tewunah. ki Tow saHrah misseHar kasef; umeiHaruz, tewu’atah. yeqarah hi mipeniyim mipeninim; wekhal Hafazekha, lo yishwu wah. ’orekh yamim biminah; bismolah, ‘osher wekhawod. derakheha darkhei no‘am; wekhal netiwoteha shalom. ‘eiz Hayim hi lamaHaciqim bah; wetomekheha me’ushar. yhoh beHakhemah yasad ’arez; konein mayim, bitwunah. beda‘to tehomot niwqa‘u; usheHaqim, yir‘afu Tal. beni ’al yalucu mei‘einekha; nezor tushiyah, umecimah. weyihyu Hayim lenafshekha; weHein, legargerotekha. ’ac teileikh laweTaH darkekha; weraglekha, lo tigof. ’im tishkaw lo tifHad; weshakhawta, we‘arewah shenatekha. ’al tira mipaHad pit’om; umisho’at resha‘im, ki tawo. ki yhoh yihyeh wekhislekha; weshamar raglekha milakhed. ’al timna‘ Tow mibe‘alaw; bihyot le’eil yadekha yadekha la‘asot. ’al tomar lerei‘ekha lerei‘akha leikh washuw umaHar ’etein, weyeish ’itakh. ’al taHarosh ‘al rei‘akha ra‘ah; wehu yosheiw laweTaH ’itakh. ’al tarow tariw ‘im ’adam Hinam; ’im lo gemalekha ra‘ah. ’al teqanei be’ish Hamas; we’al tiwHar, bekhal derakhaw. ki to‘awat yhoh naloc; we’et yesharim sodo. me’eirat yhoh beweit rasha‘; uneweih zadiqim yewareikh. ’im laleizim hu yaliz; wela‘aniyim wela‘anawim, yiten Hein. kawod Hakhamim yinHalu; ukhesilim, meirim qalon.

4

 shim‘u wanim musar ’aw; wehaqshiwu, lada‘at binah. ki leqaH Tow natati lakhem; torati, ’al ta‘acowu. ki wein hayiti le’awi; rakh weyaHid, lifnei ’imi. wayoreini, wayomer li, yitmakh dewaray libekha; shemor mizwotay weHyeih. qeneih Hakhmah qeneih winah; ’al tishkaH we’al teiT, mei’imrei fi. ’al ta‘acweha wetishmereka; ’ehaweha wetizereka. reishit Hakhmah qeneih Hakhmah uwekhal qinyanekha, qeneih winah. salseleha uteromeka; tekhabeidekha, ki teHabeqenah. titein leroshekha liwyat Hein; ‘aTeret tif’eret temageneka. shema‘ beni weqaH ’amaray; weyirbu lekha, shenot Hayim. bederekh Hakhmah horeitikha; hidrakhtikha, bema‘gelei yosher. belekhtekha lo yeizar za‘adekha; we’im taruz, lo tikasheil. haHaceiq bamusar ’al teref; nizereha, ki hi Hayekha. be’oraH resha‘im ’al tawo; we’al te’asheir, bederekh ra‘im. pera‘eihu ’al ta‘awar bo; seTeih mei‘alaw wa‘awor. ki lo yishnu ’im lo yarei‘u; wenigcelah natam, ’im lo yikhsholu yakhshilu. ki laHamu leHem resha‘; weyein Hamasim yishtu. we’oraH zadiqim ke’or nogah; holeikh wa’or, ‘ad nekhon hayom. derekh resha‘im ka’afeilah; lo yade‘u, bameh yikasheilu. beni lidwaray haqshiwah; la’amaray, haT ’acenekha. ’al yalicu mei‘einekha; mereim, betokh lewawekha. ki Hayim heim lemoze’eihem; ulekhal besaro marpei. mikal mishmar nezor libekha; ki mimenu, toz’ot Hayim. haseir mimekha ‘iqeshut peh; ulecut fatayim, harHeiq mimeka. ‘einekha lenokhaH yabiTu; we‘af‘apekha, yayshiru negdekha. paleis ma‘gal raglekha; wekhal derakhekha yikonu. ’al teiT yamin usemol; haseir raglekha meira‘.

5

 beni leHakhemati haqshiwah; litwunati, haT ’acenekha. lishmor mecimot; weda‘at, sefatekha yinzoru. ki nofet tiTofenah siftei carah; weHalaq mishemen Hikah. we’aHaritah marah khala‘anah; Hadah, keHerew piyot. ragleha yoredot mawet; ’ol, ze‘adeha yitmokhu. ’oraH Hayim pen tefaleis; na‘u ma‘geloteha, lo teida‘. we‘atah wanim shim‘u li; we’al tasuru, mei’imrei fi. harHeiq mei‘aleha darkekha; we’al tiqraw, ’el petaH beitah. pen titein la’aHeirim hodekha; ushenotekha, le’akhcari. pen yisbe‘u carim koHekha; wa‘azawekha, beweit nakheri. wenahamta we’aHaritekha; bikhlot besarekha, ushe’eirekha. we’amarta, ’eikh saneiti musar; wetokhaHat, na’az libi. welosha ma‘ti beqol moray; welimlameday, lo hiTiti ’aceni. kim‘aT hayiti wekhal ra‘; betokh qahal we‘eidah. sheteih mayim miborekha; wenocelim, mitokh be’eirekha. yafuzu ma‘yenotekha Huzah; bareHowot, palgei mayim. yihyu lekha lewadekha; we’ein lecarim ’itakh. yehi meqorkha warukh; usemaH, mei’eishet ne‘urekha. ’ayelet ’ahawim, weya‘alat Hein dadeha yerawwukha wekhal ‘eit; be’ahawatah, tishgeh tamid. welamah tishgeh weni wecarah; uteHabeiq, Heiq nakheriyah. ki nokhaH ‘einei yhoh darkhei ’ish; wekhal ma‘gelotaw mefaleis. ‘awonotaw, yilkeduno ’et harasha‘; uweHawlei HaTato, yitameikh. hu, yamut be’ein musar; uwerow ’iwwalto yishgeh.

6

 beni ’im ‘arawta lerei‘ekha; taqa‘ta laccar kapekha. noqashta we’imrei fikha; nilkadta, be’imrei fikha. ‘aseih cot ’eifo beni wehinazeil, ki wata wekhaf rei‘ekha; leikh hitrapeis, urehaw rei‘ekha. ’al titein sheinah le‘einekha; utenumah, le‘af‘apekha. hinazeil kizwi miyad; ukhezipor, miyad yaqush. leikh ’el nemalah ‘azeil; re’eih derakheha waHakham. ’asher ’ein lah qazin, shoTeir umosheil. takhin baqayiz laHmah; ’agerah waqazir, ma’akhalah. ‘ad matay ‘azeil tishkaw; matay, taqum mishenatekha. me‘aT not me‘aT tenumot; me‘aT Hibuq yadayim lishkaw. uwa khimhaleikh reishekha; umaHsorekha, ke’ish magein. ’adam beliya‘al ’ish ’awen; holeikh, ‘iqeshut peh. qoreiz be‘einaw moleil beraglaw; moreh, be’ezbe‘otaw. tahpukhot belibo, Horeish ra‘ bekhal ‘eit; medanim midyanim yeshaleiaH. ‘al kein, pit’om yawo ’eido; peta‘ yishaweir, we’ein marpei. shesh heinah sanei yhoh; weshewa‘, to‘awot to‘awat nafsho. ‘einayim ramot leshon shaqer; weyadayim, shofekhot dam naqi. leiw, Horeish maHshewot ’awen; raglayim memaharot, laruz lara‘ah. yafiaH kecawim ‘eid shaqer; umeshaleiaH medanim, bein ’aHim. nezor beni mizwat ’awikha; we’al tiTosh, torat ’imekha. qashereim ‘al libekha tamid; ‘anedeim, ‘al gargerotekha. behithalekhkha tanHeh ’otakh, beshakhebekha tishmor ‘alekha; wahaqizota, hi tesiHekha. ki neir mizwah wetorah ’or; wederekh Hayim, tokhHot musar. lishmarekha mei’eishet ra‘; meiHelqat, lashon nakheriyah. ’al taHmod yafeyah bilwawekha; we’al tiqaHakha, be‘af‘apeha. ki we‘ad ’ishah conah, ‘ad kikar laHem we’eishet ’ish; nefesh yeqarah tazud. hayaHteh ’ish ’eish beHeiqo; uwegadaw, lo tisarafnah. ’im yehaleikh ’ish ‘al hageHalim; weraglaw, lo tikawenah. kein, haba ’el ’eishet rei‘eihu; lo yinaqeh, kal hanogeia‘ bah. lo yawucu laganaw ki yignow; lemalei nafsho, ki yir‘aw. wenimza yeshaleim shiw‘atayim; ’et kal hon beito yitein. no’eif ’ishah Hasar leiw; mashHit nafsho, hu ya‘asenah. nega‘ weqalon yimza; weHerpato, lo timaHeh. ki qin’ah Hamat gawer; welo yaHmol, beyom naqam. lo yisa penei khal kofer; welo yoweh, ki tarbeh shoHad.

7

 beni shemor ’amaray; umizwotay, tizpon ’itakh. shemor mizwotay weHyeih; wetorati, ke’ishon ‘einekha. qashereim ‘al ’ezbe‘otekha; kateweim, ‘al luaH libekha. ’emor laHakhemah ’aHoti ’at; umoda‘, labinah tiqra. lishmarekha mei’ishah carah; minakheriyah, ’amareha heHeliqah. ki beHalon beiti; be‘ad ’eshnabi nishqafeti. wa’eire wapetayim, ’awinah wabanim, na‘ar Hasar leiw. ‘oweir bashuq ’eizel pinah; wederekh beitah yiz‘ad. beneshef be‘erew yom; be’ishon laylah, wa’afeilah. wehineih ’ishah liqrato; shit conah, unezurat leiw. homiyah hi wesoraret; beweitah, lo yishkenu ragleha. pa‘am baHuz, pa‘am bareHowot; we’eizel kal pinah te’erow. weheHeciqah bo wenasheqah lo; hei‘eicah faneha, watomar lo. ciwHei shelamim ‘alay; hayom, shilamti nedaray. ‘al kein yazati liqratekha; leshaHeir panekha, wa’emza’eka. marwadim rawadti ‘arsi; HaTuwot, ’eiTun mizrayim. nafti mishkawi; mor ’ahalim, weqinamon. lekhah nirweh dodim ‘ad haboqer; nit‘alesah, ba’ohawim. ki ’ein ha’ish beweito; halakh, bederekh meiraHoq. zeror hakesef laqaH beyado; leyom hakeise, yawo weito. hiTatu berow liqHah; beHeileq fateha, tadiHenu. holeikh ’aHareha, pit’om keshor ’el TawaH yawo; ukhe‘ekhes, ’el musar ’ewil. ‘ad yefalaH Heiz keweido, kemaheir zipor ’el paH; welo yada‘, ki wenafsho hu. we‘atah wanim shim‘u li; wehaqshiwu, le’imrei fi. ’al yeiseT ’el derakheha libekha; ’al teita‘ bintiwoteha. ki rabim Halalim hipilah; wa‘azumim, kal harugeha. darkhei she’ol beitah; yoredot, ’el Hadrei mawet.

8

 halo Hakhmah tiqra; utewunah, titein qolah. berosh meromim ‘alei darekh; beit netiwot nizawah. leyad she‘arim lefi qaret; mewo fetaHim taronah. ’aleikhem ’ishim ’eqra; weqoli, ’el benei ’adam. hawinu fetayim ‘aremah; ukhesilim, hawinu leiw. me‘u ki negidim ’adabeir; umiftaH fatay, meisharim. ki ’emet yehgeh Hiki; weto‘awat sefatay resha‘. bezedeq kal ’imrei fi; ’ein bahem, niftal we‘iqeish. kulam nekhoHim lameiwin; wisharim, lemoze’ei da‘at. qeHu musari we’al kasef; weda‘at, meiHaruz niwHar. ki Towah Hakhmah mipeninim; wekhal Hafazim, lo yishwu wah. ’ani Hakhmah shakhanti ‘aremah; weda‘at mecimot ’emza. yir’at yhoh senot ra‘ gei’ah wega’on wederekh ra‘ ufi tahpukhot saneiti. li ‘eizah wetushiyah; ’ani winah, li gewurah. bi melakhim yimlokhu; werocnim, yeHoqequ zedeq. bi sarim yasoru; unediwim, kal shofeTei zedeq. ’ani ’ohaweha ’ohaway ’eihaw; umeshaHaray, yimza’uni. ‘osher wekhawod ’iti; hon ‘ateiq, uzedaqah. Tow piryi meiHaruz umipac; utewu’ati, mikesef niwHar. be’oraH zedaqah ’ahaleikh; betokh, netiwot mishpaT. lehanHil ’ohaway yeish; we’ozeroteihem ’amalei. yhoh qanani reishit darko; qedem mif‘alaw mei’ac. mei‘olam nissakhti meirosh, miqadmei ’arez. be’ein tehomot Holaleti; be’ein ma‘yanot, nikhbadei mayim. beTerem harim haTeba‘u; lifnei gewa‘ot Holaleti. ‘ad lo ‘asah ’erez weHuzot; werosh, ‘aferot teiweil. bahakhino mayim sham ’ani; beHuqo Hug, ‘al penei tehom. be’amezo sheHaqim mima‘al; ba‘acoc, ‘inot tehom besumo layam Huqo, umayim lo ya‘awru fiw; beHuqo, mosdei ’arez. wa’ehyeh ’ezlo, ’amon wa’ehyeh ‘ashu‘im yom yom; mesaHeqet lefanaw bekhal ‘eit. mesaHeqet beteiweil ’arzo; wesha‘ashu‘ay, ’et benei ’adam. we‘atah wanim shim‘u li; we’ashrei, derakhay yishmoru. shim‘u musar waHakhamu, we’al tifra‘u. ’ashrei ’adam shomeia‘ li lishqod ‘al daltotay yom yom; lishmor, mecucot petaHay. ki moze’i moze’ei maza Hayim; wayafeq razon, yhoh. weHoTe’i Homeis nafsho; kal mesan’ay, ’ahawu mawet.

9

 Hakhemot banetah weitah; Hazewah ‘amudeha shiw‘ah. TaweHah TiwHah masekhah yeinah; ’af, ‘arekhah shulHanah. shaleHah na‘aroteha tiqra; ‘al gapei, meromei qaret. mi feti yasur heinah; Hasar leiw, ’amerah lo. lekhu laHamu welaHami; ushetu, beyayin masakheti. ‘icwu fetayim wiHyu; we’ishru, bederekh binah. yoseir leiz, loqeiaH lo qalon; umokhiaH lerasha‘ mumo. ’al tokhaH leiz pen yisna’eka; hokhaH leHakham, weye’ehaweka. tein leHakham weyeHkam ‘od; hoda‘ lezadiq, weyosef leqaH. teHilat Hakhmah yir’at yhoh; weda‘at qedoshim binah. ki wi yirbu yamekha; weyosifu lekha, shenot Hayim. ’im Hakhamta Hakhamta lakh; welazta, lewadekha tisa. ’eishet kesilut homiyah; petayut, uwal yade‘ah mah. weyashewah lefetaH beitah; ‘al kissei, meromei qaret. liqro le‘owerei darekh; hamyasherim, ’oreHotam. mi feti yasur heinah; waHasar leiw, we’amerah lo. mayim genuwim yimtaqu; weleHem setarim yin‘am. welo yada‘ ki refa’im sham; be‘imqei she’ol qeru’eha.

10

 mishlei, shelomoh f bein Hakham yesamaH ’aw; uwein kesil, tugat ’imo. lo yo‘ilu ’ozrot resha‘; uzedaqah, tazil mimawet. lo yar‘iw yhoh nefesh zadiq; wehawwat resha‘im yehdof. rash, ‘oseh khaf remiyah; weyad Haruzim ta‘ashir. ’ogeir baqayiz bein maskil; nirdam baqazir, bein meiwish. berakhot lerosh zadiq; ufi resha‘im, yekhasseh Hamas. ceikher zadiq liwrakhah; wesheim resha‘im yirqaw. Hakham leiw yiqaH mizwot; we’ewil fatayim, yilaweiT. holeikh batom yeilekh beTaH; ume‘aqeish derakhaw, yiwwadeia‘. qoreiz ‘ayin yitein ‘azawet; we’ewil fatayim, yilaweiT. meqor Hayim pi zadiq; ufi resha‘im, yekhasseh Hamas. ne’ah te‘oreir medanim; we‘al kal pesha‘im, tekhasseh ’ahawah. besiftei nawon timazei Hakhmah wesheiweT, legeiw Hasar leiw. Hakhamim yizpenu da‘at; ufi ’ewil meHitah qerowah. hon ‘ashir qiryat ‘ucco; meHitat dalim reisham. pe‘ulat zadiq leHayim; tewu’at rasha‘ leHaTat. ’oraH leHayim shomeir musar; we‘oceiw tokhaHat mat‘eh. mekhasseh ne’ah siftei shaqer; umozi dibah, hu khesil. berow dewarim lo yeHdal pasha‘; weHoseikh sefataw maskil. kesef niwHar leshon zadiq; leiw resha‘im kim‘aT. siftei zadiq yir‘u rabim; we’ewilim, baHasar leiw yamutu. birkat yhoh hi ta‘ashir; welo yosif ‘ezew ‘imah. kisHoq likhsil ‘asot cimah; weHakhemah, le’ish tewunah. megorat rasha‘ hi tewo’enu; weta’awat zadiqim yitein. ka‘awor sufah we’ein rasha‘; wezadiq, yesod ‘olam. kaHomez lashinayim, wekhe‘ashan la‘einayim; kein he‘azeil, lesholeHaw. yir’at yhoh tosif yamim; ushenot resha‘im tiqzorenah. toHelet zadiqim simHah; wetiqwat resha‘im toweid. ma‘oc latom derekh yhoh; umeHitah, lefo‘alei ’awen. zadiq le‘olam bal yimoT; uresha‘im, lo yishkenu ’arez. pi zadiq yanuw Hakhmah uleshon tahpukhot, tikareit. siftei zadiq yeide‘un razon; ufi resha‘im, tahpukhot.

11

 mocenei mirmah to‘awat yhoh; we’ewen sheleimah rezono. ba cadon wayawo qalon; we’et zenu‘im Hakhmah tumat yesharim tanHeim; weselef bogdim weshadam yeshadeim. lo yo‘il hon beyom ‘ewrah; uzedaqah, tazil mimawet. zidqat tamim teyasheir darko; uwerish‘ato, yipol rasha‘. zidqat yesharim tazileim; uwehawwat, bogedim yilakheidu. bemot ’adam rasha‘ towad tiqwah; wetoHelet ’onim ’awadah. zadiq mizarah neHelaz; wayawo rasha‘ taHtaw. befeh, Haneif yashHit rei‘eihu; uweda‘at, zadiqim yeiHaleizu. beTuw zadiqim ta‘aloz qiryah; uwa’awod resha‘im rinah. bewirkat yesharim tarum qaret; uwefi resha‘im, teihareis. bac lerei‘eihu Hasar leiw; we’ish tewunot yaHarish. holeikh rakhil megaleh sod; wene’eman ruaH, mekhasseh dawar. be’ein taHbulot yipal ‘am; uteshu‘ah, berow yo‘eiz. ra‘ yeiroa‘ ki ‘araw car; wesonei toqe‘im boTeiaH. ’eishet Hein titmokh kawod; we‘arizim, yitmekhu ‘osher. gomeil nafsho ’ish Hased; we‘okheir ’eiro, ’akhcari. rasha‘, ‘oseh fe‘ulat shaqer; wecoreia‘ zedaqah, sekher ’emet. kein zedaqah leHayim; umeradeif ra‘ah lemoto. to‘awat yhoh ‘iqeshei leiw; urezono, temimei darekh. yad leyad lo yinaqeh ra‘; wecera‘ zadiqim nimlaT. necem cahaw be’af Hacir; ’ishah yafah, wesarat Ta‘am. ta’awat zadiqim ’akh Tow; tiqwat resha‘im ‘ewrah. yeish mefacceir wenosaf ‘od; weHoseikh miyosher, ’akh lemaHsor. nefesh berakhah tedushan; umarweh, gam hu yore. moneia‘ bar yiqewuhu le’om; uwerakhah, lerosh mashbir. shoHeir Tow yewaqeish razon; wedoreish ra‘ah tewo’enu. boTeiaH be‘ashero hu yipol; wekhe‘aleh, zadiqim yifraHu. ‘okheir beito yinHal ruaH; we‘ewed ’ewil, laHakham leiw. peri zadiq ‘eiz Hayim; weloqeiaH nefasot Hakham. hein zadiq ba’arez yeshulam; ’af, ki rasha‘ weHoTei.

12

 ’oheiw musar ’oheiw da‘at; wesonei tokhaHat ba‘ar. Tow, yafiq razon yhoh; we’ish mecimot yarshia‘. lo yikon ’adam beresha‘; weshoresh zadiqim, bal yimoT. ’eishet Hayil ‘aTeret ba‘lah; ukheraqaw be‘azmotaw mewishah. maHshewot zadiqim mishpaT; taHbulot resha‘im mirmah. diwrei resha‘im ’eraw dam; ufi yesharim, yazileim. hafokh resha‘im we’einam; uweit zadiqim ya‘amod. lefisi khelo yehulal ’ish; wena‘aweih leiw, yihyeh lawuc. Tow niqleh we‘ewed lo; mimetakabeid, waHasar laHem. yodeia‘ zadiq nefesh behemto; weraHamei resha‘im, ’akhcari. ‘oweid ’admato yisba‘ laHem; umeradeif reiqim Hasar leiw. Hamad rasha‘ mezod ra‘im; weshoresh zadiqim yitein. befesha‘ fatayim moqeish ra‘; wayeizei mizarah zadiq. miperi fi ’ish yisba‘ Tow; ugemul yedei ’adam, yashuw yashiw lo. derekh ’ewil yashar be‘einaw; weshomeia‘ le‘eizah Hakham. ’ewil, bayom yiwwada‘ ka‘so; wekhoseh qalon ‘arum. yafiaH ’emunah yagid zedeq; we‘eid sheqarim mirmah. yeish boTeh kemadqerot Harew; uleshon Hakhamim marpei. sefat ’emet tikon la‘ad; we‘ad ’argi‘ah, leshon shaqer. mirmah belew Horeshei ra‘; uleyo‘azei shalom simHah. lo ye’uneh lazadiq kal ’awen; uresha‘im, male’u ra‘. to‘awat yhoh siftei shaqer; we‘osei ’emunah rezono. ’adam ‘arum koseh da‘at; weleiw kesilim, yiqra ’iwwelet. yad Haruzim timshol; uremiyah, tihyeh lamas. de’agah welew ’ish yashHenah; wedawar Tow yesameHenah. yateir meirei‘eihu zadiq; wederekh resha‘im tat‘eim. lo yaHarokh remiyah zeido; wehon ’adam yaqar Haruz. be’oraH zedaqah Hayim; wederekh netiwah ’al mawet.

13

 bein Hakham musar ’aw; weleiz, lo shama‘ ge‘arah. miperi fi ’ish yokhal Tow; wenefesh bogedim Hamas. nozeir piw shomeir nafsho; poseiq fataw, meHitah lo. mit’awwah wa’ayin nafsho ‘azeil; wenefesh Haruzim tedushan. dewaroshe qer yisna zadiq; werasha‘, yaw’ish weyaHpir. zedaqah tizor tam darekh; werish‘ah, tesaleif HaTat. yeish mit‘asheir we’ein kol; mitrosheish, wehon raw. kofer nefesh ’ish ‘ashero; werash, lo shama‘ ge‘arah. ’or zadiqim yismaH; weneir resha‘im yid‘akh. raq becadon yitein mazah; we’et no‘azim Hakhmah hon meihewel yim‘aT; weqoweiz ‘al yad yarbeh. toHelet memushakhah maHalah leiw; we‘eiz Hayim, ta’awah wa’ah. bac ledawar yeiHawel lo; wirei mizwah, hu yeshulam. torat Hakham meqor Hayim; lasur, mimoqeshei mawet. seikhel Tow yiten Hein; wederekh bogedim ’eitan. kal ‘arum ya‘aseh weda‘at; ukhesil, yifros ’iwwelet. mal’akh rasha‘ yipol bera‘; wezir ’emunim marpei. reish weqalon poreia‘ musar; weshomeir tokhaHat yekhubad. ta’awah nihyah te‘eraw lenafesh; weto‘awat kesilim, sur meira‘. halokh holeikh ’et Hakhamim waHakham yeHkam; wero‘eh khesilim yeiroa‘. HaTa’im teradeif ra‘ah; we’et zadiqim, yeshalem Tow. Tow, yanHil benei wanim; wezafun lazadiq, Heil HoTei. raw ’okhel nir rashim; weyeish nispeh, belo mishpaT. Hoseikh weTo sonei weno; we’ohawo, shiHaro musar. zadiq, ’okheil lesowa‘ nafsho; uweTen resha‘im teHsar.

14

 Hakhmot nashim banetah weitah; we’iwwelet, beyadeha tehersenu. holeikh beyashero yerei yhoh; uneloc derakhaw boceihu. befi ’ewil HoTer ga’awah; wesiftei Hakhamim, tishmureim. be’ein ’alafim ’eiwus bar; weraw tewu’ot, bekhoaH shor. ‘eid ’emunim lo yekhacceiw; weyafiaH kecawim, ‘eid shaqer. biqesh leiz Hakhmah wa’ayin; weda‘at lenawon naqal. leikh mineged le’ish kesil; uwal yada‘ta, siftei da‘at. Hakhemat ‘arum hawin darko; we’iwwelet kesilim mirmah. ’ewilim yaliz ’asham; uwein yesharim razon. leiw, yodeia‘ marat nafsho; uwesimHato, lo yit‘araw car. beit resha‘im yishameid; we’ohel yesharim yafriaH. yeish derekh yashar lifnei ’ish; we’aHaritah, darkhei mawet. gam bisHoq yikh’aw leiw; we’aHaritah simHah tugah. miderakhaw yisba‘ sug leiw; umei‘alaw, ’ish Tow. peti ya’amin lekhal dawar; we‘arum, yawin la’ashuro. Hakham yarei wesar meira‘; ukhesil, mit‘abeir uwoTeiaH. qezar ’apayim ya‘aseh ’iwwelet; we’ish mecimot, yisanei. naHalu fetayim ’iwwelet; wa‘arumim, yakhtiru da‘at. shaHu ra‘im lifnei Towim; uresha‘im, ‘al sha‘arei zadiq. gam lerei‘eihu yisanei rash; we’ohawei ‘ashir rabim. bac lerei‘eihu HoTei; umeHonein ‘anayim ‘anawim ’ashraw. halo yit‘u Horeshei ra‘; weHesed we’emet, Horeshei Tow. bekhal ‘ezew yihyeh motar; udewars fatayim, ’akh lemaHsor. ‘aTeret Hakhamim ‘asheram; ’iwwelet kesilim ’iwwelet. mazil nefashot ‘eid ’emet; weyafiaH kecawim mirmah. beyir’at yhoh miwTaH ‘oc; ulewanaw, yihyeh maHseh. yir’at yhoh meqor Hayim; lasur, mimoqeshei mawet. beraw ‘am hadrat melekh; uwe’efes le’om, meHitat racon. ’erekh ’apayim raw tewunah; uqezar ruaH, meirim ’iwwelet. Hayei wesarim leiw marpei; ureqaw ‘azamot qin’ah. ‘osheiq dal Heireif ‘oseihu; umekhabedo, Honein ’ewyon. bera‘ato yidaHeh rasha‘; weHoseh wemoto zadiq. beleiw nawon tanuaH Hakhmah uweqerew kesilim, tiwwadeia‘. zedaqah teromeim go; weHesed le’umim HaTat. rezon melekh le‘ewed maskil; we‘ewrato, tihyeh meiwish.

15

 ma‘aneh rakh yashiw Heimah; udewar ‘ezew, ya‘aleh ’af. leshon Hakhamim teiTiw da‘at; ufi khesilim, yabia‘ ’iwwelet. bekhal maqom ‘einei yhoh; zofot, ra‘im wTowim marpei lashon ‘eiz Hayim; weselef bah, shewer beruaH. ’ewil, yin’az musar ’awiw; weshomeir tokhaHat ya‘rim. beit zadiq Hosen raw; uwitwu’at rasha‘ ne‘karet. siftei Hakhamim yecaru da‘at; weleiw kesilim lo khein. cewaH resha‘im to‘awat yhoh; utefilat yesharim rezono. to‘awat yhoh derekh rasha‘; umeradeif zedaqah ye’ehaw. musar ra‘ le‘oceiw ’oraH; sonei tokhaHat yamut. she’ol wa’awadon neged yhoh; ’af, ki libot benei ’adam. lo ye’ehaw leiz hokheiaH lo; ’el Hakhamim, lo yeileikh. leiw meiaH yeiTiw panim; uwe‘azewat leiw ruaH nekhei’ah. leiw nawon yewaqesh da‘at; ufenei ufi khesilim, yir‘eh ’iwwelet. kal yemei ‘ani ra‘im; weTow leiw, mishteh tamid. Tow me‘aT beyir’at yhoh; mei’ozar raw, umehumah wo. Tow ’aruHat yaraq we’ahawah sham; mishor ’awus, wesin’ah wo. ’ish Heimah yegareh madon; we’erekh ’apayim, yashqiT riw. derekh ‘azeil kimsukhat Hadeq; we’oraH yesharim selulah. bein Hakham yesamaH ’aw; ukhesil ’adam, boceh ’imo. ’iwwelet simHah laHasar leiw; we’ish tewunah, yeyasher lakhet. hafeir maHashawot be’ein sod; uwerow yo‘azim taqum. simHah la’ish bema‘aneih fiw; wedawar be‘ito mah Tow. ’oraH Hayim lema‘lah lemaskil; lema‘an sur, mishe’ol maTah. beit gei’im yissaH yhoh; weyazeiw, gewul ’almanah. to‘awat yhoh maHshewot ra‘; uTehorim, ’imrei no‘am. ‘okheir beito bozeia‘ baza‘; wesonei matanot yiHyeh. leiw zadiq yehgeh la‘anot; ufi resha‘im, yabia‘ ra‘ot. raHoq yhoh meiresha‘im; utefilat zadiqim yishma‘. me’or ‘einayim yesamaH leiw; shemu‘ah Towah, tedashen ‘azem. ’ocen, shoma‘at tokhaHat Hayim; beqerew Hakhamim talin. poreia‘ musar mo’eis nafsho; weshomeia‘ tokhaHat, qoneh leiw. yir’at yhoh musar Hakhmah welifnei khawod ‘anawah.

16

 le’adam ma‘arkhei leiw; yhoh ma‘aneih lashon. kal darkhei ’ish cakh be‘einaw; wetokhein ruHot yhoh. gol ’el yhoh ma‘asekha; weyikonu, maHshewotekha. kol pa‘al yhoh lama‘aneihu; wegam rasha‘, leyom ra‘ah. to‘awat yhoh kal gewah leiw; yad leyad, lo yinaqeh. beHesed we’emet yekhupar ‘awon; uweyir’at yhoh sur meira‘. birzot yhoh darkhei ’ish; gam ’oywaw, yashlim ’ito. Tow me‘aT bizdaqah; meirow tewu’ot, belo mishpaT. leiw ’adam yeHasheiw darko; yhoh yakhin za‘ado. qesem ‘al siftei melekh; bemishpaT, lo yim‘al piw. peles umocenei mishpaT yhoh; ma‘aseihu, kal ’awnei khis. to‘awat melakhim ‘asot resha‘; ki wizdaqah, yikon kissei. rezon melakhim siftei zedeq; wedoweir yesharim ye’ehaw. Hamat melekh mal’akhei mawet; we’ish Hakham yekhaperenah. be’or penei melekh Hayim; urezono, ke‘aw malqosh. qenoh Hakhmah mah Tow meiHaruz; uqenot binah, niwHar mikasef. mesilat yesharim sur meira‘; shomeir nafsho, nozeir darko. lifnei shewer ga’on; welifnei khishalon, gowah ruaH. Tow shefal ruaH ’et ‘aniyim ‘anawim; meiHaleiq lal, ’et gei’im. maskil ‘al dawar yimza Tow; uwoTeiaH yhoh ’ashraw. laHakham leiw yiqarei nawon; umeteq fatayim, yosif leqaH. meqor Hayim seikhel be‘alaw; umusar ’ewilim ’iwwelet. leiw Hakham yaskil pihu; we‘als fataw, yosif leqaH. zuf dewash ’imrei no‘am; matoq lanefesh umarpei la‘azem. yeish derekh yashar lifnei ’ish; we’aHaritah, darkhei mawet. nefesh ‘ameil ‘amelah lo; ki ’akhaf ‘alaw pihu. ’ish beliya‘al koreh ra‘ah; we‘al sefataw fato, ke’eish zarawet. ’ish tahpukhot yeshalaH madon; wenirgan, mafrid ’aluf. ’ish Hamas yefateh rei‘eihu; weholikho, bederekh lo Tow. ‘ozeh ‘einaw laHshow tahpukhot; qoreiz fataw, kilah ra‘ah. ‘aTeret tif’eret seiwah; bederekh zedaqah, timazei. Tow ’erekh ’apayim migibor; umosheil beruHo, milokheid ‘ir. baHeiq yuTal ’et hagoral; yhoh kal mishpaTo.

17
