we’im leramotani lezaray, belo Hamas bekhapay, yeire ’elohei ’awoteinu weyokhaH. weruaH laweshah, ’et ‘amasay rosh hasheloshim hashalishim lekha dawid we‘imekha wen yishay, shalom shalom lekha, weshalom le‘ocerekha, ki ‘acarekha ’elohekha; wayqabeleim dawid, wayiteneim berashei hagedud. umimenasheh nafelu ‘al dawid, bewo’o ‘im pelishtim ‘al sha’ul lamilHamah welo ‘acarum; ki we‘eizah, shileHuhu sarnei felishtim leimor, berasheinu yipol ’el ’adonaw sha’ul. belekhto ’el ziqelag, nafelu ‘alaw mimenasheh ‘adnaH weyocawad widi‘a’eil umikha’eil weyocawad, we’elihu weziletay; rashei ha’alafim ’asher limnasheh. weheimah, ‘aceru ‘im dawid ‘al hagedud, ki giborei Hayil kulam; wayihyu sarim bazawa. ki le‘et yom beyom, yawo’u ‘al dawid le‘acero; ‘ad lemaHaneh gadol kemaHaneih ’elohim. we’eileh misperei rashei heHaluz lazawa, ba’u ‘al dawid Hewronah; lehaseiw malkhut sha’ul ’eilaw kefi yhoh. benei yehudah, nose’ei zinah waromaH; sheishet ’alafim ushemoneh mei’ot Haluzei zawa. min benei shim‘on, giborei Hayil lazawa, shiw‘at ’alafim umei’ah. min benei haleiwi, ’arba‘at ’alafim wesheish mei’ot. wihoyada‘ hanagid le’aharon; we‘imo sheloshet ’alafim ushewa‘ mei’ot. wezadoq na‘ar gibor Hayil; uweit ’awiw sarim ‘esrim ushenayim. umin benei winyamin ’aHei sha’ul sheloshet ’alafim; we‘ad heinah marbitam, shomerim mishmeret beit sha’ul. umin benei ’efrayim, ‘esrim ’elef ushemoneh mei’ot; giborei Hayil, ’anshei sheimot leweit ’awotam. umeiHazi maTeih menasheh, shemonah ‘asar ’alef; ’asher niqewu besheimot, lawo lehamlikh ’et dawid. umibenei yisashkhar, yod‘ei winah la‘itim, lada‘at mah ya‘aseh yisra’eil; rasheihem matayim, wekhal ’aHeihem ‘al pihem. miccewulun yoz’ei zawa, ‘orekhei milHamah bekhal kelei milHamah Hamishim ’alef; wela‘ador belo leiw waleiw. uminaftali sarim ’alef; we‘imahem bezinah waHanit, sheloshim weshiw‘ah ’alef. umin hadani ‘orekhei milHamah, ‘esrim ushemonah ’elef wesheish mei’ot. umei’asheir, yoz’ei zawa la‘arokh milHamah ’arba‘im ’alef. umei‘eiwer layardein min har’uweini wehagadi waHazi sheiweT menasheh, bekhol kelei zewa milHamah, mei’ah we‘esrim ’alef. kal ’eileh ’anshei milHamah ‘oderei ma‘arakhah beleiwaw shaleim ba’u Hewronah, lehamlikh ’et dawid ‘al kal yisra’eil; wegam kal sheirit yisra’eil leiw ’eHad lehamlikh ’et dawid. wayihyu sham ‘im dawid yamim sheloshah, ’okhelim weshotim; ki heikhinu lahem ’aHeihem. wegam haqerowim ’aleihem ‘ad yisashkhar ucewulun wenaftali, mewi’im leHem baHamorim uwagemalim uwaperadim uwabaqar ma’akhal qemaH deweilim wezimuqim weyayin weshemen uwaqar wezon larow; ki simHah beyisra’eil.

13

 wayiwwa‘az dawid, ‘im sarei ha’alafim wehamei’ot lekhal nagid. wayomer dawid lekhol qehal yisra’eil, ’im ‘aleikhem Tow umin yhoh ’eloheinu, nifrezah nishleHah ‘al ’aHeinu hanish’arim, bekhol ’arzot yisra’eil, we‘imahem hakohanim wehalwiyim be‘arei migresheihem; weyiqawezu ’eileinu. wenaseibah ’et ’aron ’eloheinu ’eileinu; ki lo derashnuhu bimei sha’ul. wayomeru khal haqahal la‘asot kein; ki yashar hadawar be‘einei khal ha‘am. wayaqheil dawid ’et kal yisra’eil, min shiHor mizrayim we‘ad lewo Hamat; lehawi ’et ’aron ha’elohim, miqiryat ye‘arim. waya‘al dawid wekhal yisra’eil ba‘alatah, ’el qiryat ye‘arim ’asher lihudah; leha‘alot misham, ’eit ’aron ha’elohim yhoh yosheiw hakeruwim ’asher niqra sheim. wayarkiwu ’et ’aron ha’elohim ‘al ‘agalah Hadashah, mibeit ’awinadaw; we‘ucca we’aHyo, nohagim ba‘agalah. wedawid wekhal yisra’eil, mesaHaqim lifnei ha’elohim bekhal ‘oc; uweshirim uwekhinorot uwinwalim uwetupim, uwimziltayim uwaHazozerot. wayawo’u ‘ad goren kidon; wayishlaH ‘ucca ’et yado, le’eHoc ’et ha’aron, ki shameTu habaqar. wayiHar ’af yhoh be‘ucca, wayakeihu ‘al ’asher shalaH yado ‘al ha’aron; wayamat sham lifnei ’elohim. wayiHar ledawid, ki faraz yhoh perez be‘ucca; wayiqra lamaqom hahu perez ‘ucca, ‘ad hayom hacceh. wayira dawid ’et ha’elohim, bayom hahu leimor; heikh ’awi ’eilay, ’eit ’aron ha’elohim. welo heisir dawid ’et ha’aron ’eilaw ’el ‘ir dawid; wayaTeihu ’el beit ‘oweid ’edom hagiti. wayeishew ’aron ha’elohim ‘im beit ‘oweid ’edom beweito sheloshah Hodashim; waywarekh yhoh ’et beit ‘oweid ’edom we’et kal ’asher lo.

14

 wayishlaH Hiram Huram melekh zor mal’akhim ’el dawid wa‘azei ’aracim, weHarashei qir, weHarashei ‘eizim; liwnot lo bayit. wayeida‘ dawid, ki hekhino yhoh lemelekh ‘al yisra’eil; ki niseit lema‘lah malkhuto, ba‘awur ‘amo yisra’eil. wayiqaH dawid ‘od nashim birushalim; wayoled dawid ‘od banim uwanot. we’eileh shemot hayludim, ’asher hayu lo birushalim; shamua‘ weshowaw, natan ushelomoh. weyiwHar we’elishua‘ we’elpaleT. wenogah wenefeg weyafia‘. we’elishama‘ uwe‘elyada‘ we’elifaleT. wayishme‘u felishtim, ki nimshaH dawid lemelekh ‘al kal yisra’eil, waya‘alu khal pelishtim lewaqeish ’et dawid; wayishma‘ dawid, wayeizei lifneihem. ufelishtim ba’u; wayifsheTu be‘eimeq refa’im. wayish’al dawid beilohim leimor, ha’e‘eleh ‘al pelishtiyim pelishtim, unetatam beyadi; wayomer lo yhoh ‘aleih, unetatim beyadekha. waya‘alu bewa‘al perazim wayakeim sham dawid wayomer dawid, paraz ha’elohim ’et ’oyway beyadi keferez mayim; ‘al kein, qare’u sheim hamaqom hahu ba‘al perazim. waya‘acwu sham ’et ’eloheihem; wayomer dawid, wayisarefu ba’eish. wayosifu ‘od pelishtim, wayifsheTu ba‘eimeq. wayish’al ‘od dawid beilohim, wayomer lo ha’elohim, lo ta‘aleh ’aHareihem; haseiw mei‘aleihem, uwata lahem mimul habekha’im. wihi keshame‘akha ’et qol haze‘adah berashei habekha’im, ’ac teizei wamilHamah; ki yaza ha’elohim lefanekha, lehakot ’et maHaneih felishtim. waya‘as dawid, ka’asher ziwwahu ha’elohim; wayaku ’et maHaneih felishtim, migiw‘on we‘ad gacerah. wayeizei sheim dawid bekhal ha’arazot; yhoh natan ’et paHdo ‘al kal hagoyim.

15

 waya‘as lo watim be‘ir dawid; wayakhen maqom la’aron ha’elohim, wayeT lo ’ohel. ’ac ’amar dawid, lo laseit ’et ’aron ha’elohim, ki ’im halwiyim; ki wam baHar yhoh laseit ’et ’aron yhoh uleshareto ‘ad ‘olam. wayaqheil dawid ’et kal yisra’eil ’el yerushalim; leha‘alot ’et ’aron yhoh, ’el meqomo ’asher heikhin lo. waye’esof dawid ’et benei ’aharon we’et halwiyim. liwnei qehat; ’uri’eil hasar, we’eHaw mei’ah we‘esrim. liwnei merari; ‘asayah hasar, we’eHaw matayim we‘esrim. liwnei geireshom; yo’eil hasar, we’eHaw mei’ah usheloshim. liwnei ’elizafan; shema‘yah hasar we’eHaw matayim. liwnei Hewron; ’eli’eil hasar we’eHaw shemonim. liwnei ‘ucci’eil; ‘aminadaw hasar, we’eHaw mei’ah usheneim ‘asar. wayiqra dawid, lezadoq ule’ewyatar hakohanim; welalwiyim, le’uri’eil ‘asayah weyo’eil shema‘yah, we’eli’eil we‘aminadaw. wayomer lahem, ’atem rashei ha’awot lalwiyim; hitqadeshu ’atem wa’aHeikhem, weha‘alitem, ’eit ’aron yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil, ’el hakhinoti lo. ki lemabarishonah lo ’atem; paraz yhoh ’eloheinu banu, ki lo derashnuhu kamishpaT. wayitqadeshu, hakohanim wehalwiyim; leha‘alot ’et ’aron yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil. wayis’u wenei halwiyim, ’eit ’aron ha’elohim, ka’asher ziwwah mosheh kidwar yhoh; bikhteifam bamoTot ‘aleihem. wayomer dawid lesarei halwiyim leha‘amid, ’et ’aHeihem hamshorerim, bikhlei shir newalim wekhinorot umeziltayim; mashmi‘im leharim beqol lesimHah. waya‘amidu halwiyim, ’eit heiman ben yo’eil, umin ’eHaw, ’asaf ben berekhyahu; s umin benei merari ’aHeihem, ’eitan ben qushayahu. we‘imahem ’aHeihem hamishnim; cekharyahu bein weya‘aci’eil ushemiramot wiHi’eil we‘uni ’eli’aw uwenayahu uma‘aseiyahu umatityahu we’elifeleihu umiqneiyahu we‘oweid ’edom wi‘i’eil hasho‘arim. wehamshorerim, heiman ’asaf we’eitan; bimziltayim neHoshet lehashmia‘. ucekharyah wa‘aci’eil ushemiramot wiHi’eil we‘uni we’eli’aw, uma‘aseiyahu uwenayahu; binwalim ‘al ‘alamot. umatityahu we’elifeleihu, umiqneiyahu we‘oweid ’edom, wi‘i’eil wa‘acacyahu; bekhinorot ‘al hasheminit lenazeiaH. ukhenanyahu sar halwiyim bemasa; yasor bamasa, ki meiwin hu. uwerekhyah we’elqanah, sho‘arim la’aron. ushewanyahu weyoshafaT unetan’eil wa‘amasay ucekharyahu uwenayahu we’eli‘ecer hakohanim, maHazozerim maHzerim baHazozerot, lifnei ’aron ha’elohim; we‘oweid ’edom wiHiyah, sho‘arim la’aron. wayhi dawid weciqnei yisra’eil wesarei ha’alafim; haholekhim, leha‘alot ’et ’aron berit yhoh min beit ‘oweid ’edom besimHah. wayhi be‘cor ha’elohim, ’et halwiyim, nose’ei ’aron berit yhoh; wayicbeHu shiw‘ah farim weshiw‘ah ’eilim. wedawid mekhurbal bim‘il buz, wekhal halwiyim hanose’im ’et ha’aron, wehamshorerim, ukhenanyah hasar hamasa hamshorerim; we‘al dawid ’eifod bad. wekhal yisra’eil, ma‘alim ’et ’aron berit yhoh, bitru‘ah uweqol shofar, uwaHazozerot uwimziltayim; mashmi‘im binwalim wekhinorot. wayhi, ’aron berit yhoh, ba ‘ad ‘ir dawid; umikhal bat sha’ul nishqefah be‘ad haHalon, wateire ’et hamelekh dawid meraqeid umesaHeiq, watiwec lo belibah.

16

 wayawi’u ’et ’aron ha’elohim, wayazigu ’oto, betokh ha’ohel, ’asher naTah lo dawid; wayaqriwu ‘olot ushelamim lifnei ha’elohim. waykhal dawid, meiha‘alot ha‘olah wehashelamim; waywarekh ’et ha‘am besheim yhoh. wayHaleiq lekhal ’ish yisra’eil, mei’ish we‘ad ’ishah; le’ish kikar leHem, we’eshpar wa’ashishah. wayitein lifnei ’aron yhoh min halwiyim mesharetim; ulehackir ulehodot ulehaleil, yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil. ’asaf harosh umishneihu cekharyah; ye‘i’eil ushemiramot wiHi’eil umatityah we’eli’aw uwenayahu we‘oweid ’edom wi‘i’eil, bikhlei newalim uwekhinorot, we’asaf bamziltayim mashmia‘. uwenayahu weyaHaci’eil hakohanim; baHazozerot tamid, lifnei ’aron berit ha’elohim. bayom hahu, ’ac natan dawid barosh, lehodot yhoh; beyad ’asaf we’eHaw. hodu yhoh qir’u wishmo, hodi‘u wa‘amim ‘alilotaw. shiru lo cameru lo, siHu bekhal nifle’otaw. hithalu besheim qadesho, yismaH leiw mewaqshei yhoh. dirshu yhoh we‘ucco, baqeshu fanaw tamid. cikhru, nifle’otaw ’asher ‘asah, mofetaw umishpeTei fihu. cera‘ yisra’eil ‘awdo, benei ya‘aqow beHiraw. hu yhoh ’eloheinu, bekhal ha’arez mishpaTaw. cikhru le‘olam berito, dawar ziwwah le’elef dor. ’asher karat ’et ’awraham, ushewu‘ato leyizHaq. waya‘amideha leya‘aqow leHoq, leyisra’eil berit ‘olam. leimor, lekha ’etein ’erez kena‘an, Hewel naHalatkhem. bihyotkhem metei mispar, kim‘aT wegarim bah. wayithalekhu migo ’el go, umimamlakhah ’el ‘am ’aHeir. lo hiniaH le’ish le‘asheqam, wayokhaH ‘aleihem melakhim. ’al tige‘u bimshiHay, uwinwi’ay ’al tarei‘u. shiru yhoh kal ha’arez, baseru miyom ’el yom yeshu‘ato. saperu wagoyim ’et kewodo, bekhal ha‘amim nifle’otaw. ki gadol yhoh umehulal me’od, wenora hu ‘al kal ’elohim. ki kal ’elohei ha‘amim ’elilim, yhoh shamayim ‘asah. hod wehadar lefanaw, ‘oc weHedwah bimqomo. hawu yhoh mishpeHot ‘amim, hawu yhoh kawod wa‘oc. hawu yhoh kewod shemo; se’u minHah uwo’u lefanaw, hishtaHawu yhoh behadrat qodesh. Hilu milefanaw kal ha’arez, ’af tikon teiweil bal timoT. yismeHu hashamayim wetageil ha’arez, weyomeru wagoyim yhoh malakh. yir‘am hayam umelo’o, ya‘aloz hasadeh wekhal ’asher bo. ’ac yeranenu ‘azei haya‘ar; milifnei yhoh, ki wa lishpoT ’et ha’arez. hodu yhoh ki Tow, ki le‘olam Hasdo. we’imru hoshi‘einu ’elohei yish‘einu, weqabezeinu wehazileinu min hagoyim; lehodot lesheim qadshekha lehishtabeiaH bithilatekha. barukh yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil, min ha‘olam we‘ad ha‘olam; wayomeru khal ha‘am ’amein, wehaleil yhoh. waya‘acaw sham, lifnei ’aron berit yhoh, le’asaf ule’eHaw; leshareit lifnei ha’aron tamid lidwar yom beyomo. we‘oweid ’edom wa’aHeihem shishim ushemonah; we‘oweid ’edom ben yeditun weHosah lesho‘arim. we’eit zadoq hakohein, we’eHaw hakohanim, lifnei mishkan yhoh; babamah ’asher begiw‘on. leha‘alot ‘olot yhoh ‘al micbaH ha‘olah tamid laboqer wela‘arew; ulekhal hakatuw betorat yhoh, ’asher ziwwah ‘al yisra’eil. we‘imahem heiman widutun, ushe’ar haberurim, ’asher niqewu besheimot; lehodot yhoh, ki le‘olam Hasdo. we‘imahem heiman widutun Hazozerot umeziltayim lemashmi‘im, ukhelei shir ha’elohim; uwenei yedutun lasha‘ar. wayeilekhu khal ha‘am ’ish leweito; wayissow dawid lewareikh ’et beito.

17

 wayhi ka’asher yashaw dawid beweito; wayomer dawid ’el natan hanawi, hineih ’anokhi yosheiw beweit ha’aracim, wa’aron berit yhoh taHat yeri‘ot. wayomer natan ’el dawid, kol ’asher bilwawekha ‘aseih; ki ha’elohim ‘imakh. wayhi balaylah hahu; wayhi dewar ’elohim, ’el natan leimor. leikh we’amarta ’el dawid ‘awdi, koh ’amar yhoh; lo ’atah tiwneh li habayit lashawet. ki lo yashawti bewayit, min hayom, ’asher he‘eleiti ’et yisra’eil, ‘ad hayom hacceh; wa’ehyeh mei’ohel ’el ’ohel umimishkan. bekhol ’asher hithalakhti bekhal yisra’eil hadawar dibarti, ’et ’aHad shofeTei yisra’eil, ’asher ziwwiti lir‘ot ’et ‘ami leimor; lamah lo wenitem li beit ’aracim. we‘atah koh tomar le‘awdi ledawid, s koh ’amar yhoh zewa’ot, ’ani leqaHtikha min hanaweh, min ’aHarei hazon; lihyot nagid, ‘al ‘ami yisra’eil. wa’ehyeh ‘imekha, bekhol ’asher halakhta, wa’akhrit ’et kal ’oywekha mipanekha; we‘asiti lekha sheim, kesheim hagedolim ’asher ba’arez. wesamti maqom le‘ami yisra’eil uneTa‘tihu weshakhan taHtaw, welo yirgac ‘od; welo yosifu wenei ‘awlah lewaloto, ka’asher barishonah. ulemiyamim, ’asher ziwwiti shofeTim ‘al ‘ami yisra’eil, wehikhna‘ti ’et kal ’oywekha; wa’agid lakh, uwayit yiwneh lekha yhoh. wehayah, ki male’u yamekha lalekhet ‘im ’awotekha, wahaqimoti ’et car‘akha ’aHarekha, ’asher yihyeh mibanekha; wahakhinoti ’et malkhuto. hu yiwneh li bayit; wekhonanti ’et kis’o ‘ad ‘olam. ’ani ’ehyeh lo le’aw, wehu yihyeh li lewein; weHasdi lo ’asir mei‘imo, ka’asher hasiroti, mei’asher hayah lefanekha. weha‘amadtihu beweiti uwemalkhuti ‘ad ha‘olam; wekhis’o yihyeh nakhon ‘ad ‘olam. kekhol hadewarim ha’eileh, ukhekhol heHacon hacceh; kein diber natan ’el dawid. wayawo hamelekh dawid, wayeishew lifnei yhoh; wayomer, mi ’ani yhoh ’elohim umi weiti, ki hawi’otani ‘ad halom. watiqTan cot be‘einekha ’elohim, watedabeir ‘al beit ‘awdekha lemeiraHoq; ure’itani, ketor ha’adam hama‘alah yhoh ’elohim. mah yosif ‘od dawid ’eilekha lekhawod ’et ‘awdekha; we’atah ’et ‘awdekha yada‘eta. yhoh ba‘awur ‘awdekha ukhelibekha, ‘asita ’eit kal hagedulah haccot; lehodia‘ ’et kal hagedulot. yhoh ’ein kamokha, we’ein ’elohim culatekha; bekhol ’asher shama‘nu be’aceneinu. umi ke‘amekha yisra’eil, go ’eHad ba’arez; ’asher halakh ha’elohim lifdot lo ‘am, lasum lekha m gedulot wenora’ot, legareish, mipenei ‘amekha ’asher padita mimizrayim goyim. watitein ’et ‘amekha yisra’eil lekha le‘am ‘ad ‘olam; we’atah yhoh, hayita lahem leilohim. we‘atah yhoh, hadawar, ’asher dibarta ‘al ‘awdekha we‘al beito, yei’amein ‘ad ‘olam; wa‘aseih ka’asher dibarta. weyei’amein weyigdal shimkha ‘ad ‘olam leimor, yhoh zewa’ot ’elohei yisra’eil, ’elohim leyisra’eil; uweit dawid ‘awdekha nakhon lefanekha. ki ’atah ’elohay, galita ’et ’ocen ‘awdekha, liwnot lo bayit; ‘al kein maza ‘awdekha, lehitpaleil lefanekha. we‘atah yhoh, ’atah hu ha’elohim; watedabeir ‘al ‘awdekha, haTowah haccot. we‘atah, ho’alta lewareikh ’et beit ‘awdekha, lihyot le‘olam lefanekha; ki ’atah yhoh beirakhta, umeworakh le‘olam.

18

 wayhi ’aHarei khein, wayakh dawid ’et pelishtim wayakhni‘eim; wayiqaH ’et gat uwenoteha miyad pelishtim. wayakh ’et mo’aw; wayihyu mo’aw ‘awadim ledawid, nose’ei minHah. wayakh dawid ’et hadad‘ecer melekh zowah Hamatah; belekhto lehaziw yado binhar perat. wayilkod dawid mimenu ’elef rekhew, weshiw‘at ’alafim parashim, we‘esrim ’elef ’ish ragli; way‘aqeir dawid ’et kal harekhew, wayoteir mimenu mei’ah rakhew. wayawo ’aram darmeseq, la‘cor lahadad‘ecer melekh zowah; wayakh dawid ba’aram, ‘esrim ushenayim ’elef ’ish. wayasem dawid ba’aram darmeseq, wayhi ’aram ledawid, ‘awadim nose’ei minHah; wayosha‘ yhoh ledawid, bekhol ’asher halakh. wayiqaH dawid, ’eit shilTei haccahaw, ’asher hayu, ‘al ‘awdei hadad‘acer; waywi’eim yerushalim. umiTiwHat umikun ‘arei hadad‘ecer, laqaH dawid neHoshet rabah me’od; bah ‘asah shelomoh, ’et yam haneHoshet we’et ha‘amudim, we’eit kelei haneHoshet. wayishma‘ to‘u melekh Hamat; ki hikah dawid, ’et kal Heil hadad‘ecer melekh zowah. wayishlaH ’et hadoram beno ’el hamelekh dawid lish’ol lish’al lo leshalom ulewarakho, ‘al ’asher nilHam bahadad‘ecer wayakeihu, ki ’ish milHamot to‘u hayah hadad‘acer; wekhol, kelei cahaw wakhesef uneHoshet. gam ’otam, hiqdish hamelekh dawid yhoh, ‘im hakesef wehaccahaw, ’asher nasa mikal hagoyim; mei’edom umimo’aw umibenei ‘amon, umipelishtim umei‘amaleiq. we’awshay ben zeruyah, hikah ’et ’edom begei hamelaH, shemonah ‘asar ’alef. wayasem be’edom neziwim, wayihyu khal ’edom ‘awadim ledawid; wayosha‘ yhoh ’et dawid, bekhol ’asher halakh. wayimlokh dawid ‘al kal yisra’eil; wayhi, ‘oseh mishpaT uzedaqah lekhal ‘amo. weyo’aw ben zeruyah ‘al hazawa; wihoshafaT ben ’aHilud mackir. wezadoq ben ’aHiTuw wa’awimelekh ben ’ewyatar kohanim; weshawsha sofeir. uwenayahu ben yehoyada‘, ‘al hakereiti wehapeleiti; uwenei dawid harishonim leyad hamelekh.

19

 wayhi ’aHarei khein, wayamat naHash melekh benei ‘amon; wayimlokh beno taHtaw. wayomer dawid ’e‘eseh Hesed ‘im Hanun ben naHash, ki ‘asah ’awiw ‘imi Hesed, wayishlaH dawid mal’akhim lenaHamo ‘al ’awiw; wayawo’u ‘awdei dawid ’el ’erez benei ‘amon ’el Hanun lenaHamo. wayomeru sarei wenei ‘amon leHanun, hamkhabeid dawid ’et ’awikha be‘einekha, ki shalaH lekha menaHamim; halo ba‘awur laHqor welahafokh ulerageil ha’arez, ba’u ‘awadaw ’eilekha. wayiqaH Hanun ’et ‘awdei dawid waygaleHeim, wayikhrot ’et madweihem baHeizi ‘ad hamifsa‘ah; wayshaleHeim. wayeilekhu wayagidu ledawid ‘al ha’anashim wayishlaH liqratam, ki hayu ha’anashim nikhlamim me’od; wayomer hamelekh shewu wireiHo, ‘ad ’asher yezamaH ceqankhem weshawtem. wayir’u benei ‘amon, ki hitba’ashu ‘im dawid; wayishlaH Hanun uwenei ‘amon ’elef kikar kesef, liskor lahem min ’aram naharayim umin ’aram ma‘akhah umizowah, rekhew ufarashim. wayiskeru lahem shenayim usheloshim ’elef rekhew, we’et melekh ma‘akhah we’et ‘amo, wayawo’u wayaHanu lifnei meidewa; uwenei ‘amon, ne’esfu mei‘areihem, wayawo’u lamilHamah wayishma‘ dawid; wayishlaH ’et yo’aw, we’eit kal zawa hagiborim. wayeize’u benei ‘amon, waya‘arkhu milHamah petaH ha‘ir; wehamelakhim ’asher ba’u, lewadam basadeh. wayar yo’aw, ki hayetah fenei hamilHamah ’eilaw panim we’aHor; wayiwHar, mikal baHur beyisra’eil, waya‘arokh liqrat ’aram. we’eit yeter ha‘am, natan beyad ’awshay ’aHiw; waya‘arkhu, liqrat benei ‘amon. wayomer, ’im teHecaq mimeni ’aram, wehayita li litshu‘ah; s we’im benei ‘amon yeHecqu mimekha wehosha‘tikha. Hacaq wenitHacceqah be‘ad ‘ameinu, uwe‘ad ‘arei ’eloheinu; yhoh, haTow be‘einaw ya‘aseh. wayigash yo’aw weha‘am ’asher ‘imo lifnei ’aram lamilHamah; wayanusu mipanaw. uwenei ‘amon ra’u ki nas ’aram, wayanusu gam heim, mipenei ’awshay ’aHiw, wayawo’u ha‘irah; wayawo yo’aw yerushalim. wayar ’aram, ki nigefu lifnei yisra’eil wayishleHu mal’akhim, wayozi’u ’et ’aram, ’asher mei‘eiwer hanahar; weshofakh sar zewa hadad‘ecer lifneihem. wayugad ledawid, waye’esof ’et kal yisra’eil waya‘awor hayardein, wayawo ’aleihem, waya‘arokh ’aleihem; waya‘arokh dawid liqrat ’aram milHamah, wayilaHamu ‘imo. wayanas ’aram milifnei yisra’eil wayaharog dawid mei’aram, shiw‘at ’alafim rekhew, we’arba‘im ’elef ’ish ragli; we’eit shofakh sar hazawa heimit. wayir’u ‘awdei hadad‘ecer, ki nigefu lifnei yisra’eil, wayashlimu ‘im dawid waya‘awduhu; welo ’awah ’aram, lehoshia‘ ’et benei ‘amon ‘od.

20

 wayhi le‘eit teshuwat hashanah le‘eit zeit hamelakhim, wayinhag yo’aw ’et Heil hazawa wayashHeit ’et ’erez benei ‘amon, wayawo wayazar ’et rabah, wedawid yosheiw birushalim; wayakh yo’aw ’et rabah wayeherseha. wayiqaH dawid ’et ‘aTeret malkam mei‘al rosho wayimza’ah mishqal kikar cahaw, uwah ’ewen yeqarah, watehi ‘al rosh dawid; ushelal ha‘ir hozi harbeih me’od. we’et ha‘am ’asher bah hozi, wayasar bamegeirah uwaHarizei habarcel uwamegeirot, wekhein ya‘aseh dawid, lekhol ‘arei wenei ‘amon; wayashaw dawid wekhal ha‘am yerushalim. wayhi ’aHareikhein, wata‘amod milHamah begecer ‘im pelishtim; ’ac hikah sibekhay haHushati, ’et sipay milidei harefa’im wayikanei‘u. watehi ‘od milHamah ’et pelishtim; wayakh ’elHanan ben ya‘ur ya‘ir, ’et laHmi ’aHi galeyat hagiti, we‘eiz Hanito, kimnor ’oregim. watehi ‘od milHamah begat; wayhi ’ish midah, we’ezbe‘otaw sheish washeish ‘esrim we’arba‘, wegam hu nolad leharafa. wayHareif ’et yisra’eil; wayakeihu yehonatan, ben shim‘a ’aHi dawid. ’eil nuledu leharafa begat; wayipelu weyad dawid uweyad ‘awadaw.

21

 waya‘amod saTan ‘al yisra’eil; wayaset ’et dawid, limnot ’et yisra’eil. wayomer dawid ’el yo’aw we’el sarei ha‘am, lekhu, sifru ’et yisra’eil, mibe’eir shewa‘ we‘ad dan; wehawi’u ’eilay, we’eide‘ah ’et misparam. wayomer yo’aw, yoseif yhoh ‘al ‘amo kaheim mei’ah fe‘amim, halo ’adoni hamelekh, kulam ladoni la‘awadim; lamah yewaqeish cot ’adoni, lamah yihyeh le’ashmah leyisra’eil. udewar hamelekh Hacaq ‘al yo’aw; wayeizei yo’aw, wayithaleikh bekhal yisra’eil, wayawo yerushalim. wayitein yo’aw ’et mispar mifqad ha‘am ’el dawid; wayhi khal yisra’eil ’elef ’alafim umei’ah ’elef ’ish sholeif Herew, wihudah ’arba‘ mei’ot weshiw‘im ’elef ’ish sholeif Harew. weleiwi uwinyamin, lo faqad betokham; ki nit‘aw dewar hamelekh ’et yo’aw. wayeira‘ be‘einei ha’elohim, ‘al hadawar hacceh; wayakh ’et yisra’eil. wayomer dawid ’el ha’elohim, HaTati me’od, ’asher ‘asiti ’et hadawar hacceh; we‘atah, ha‘awer na ’et ‘awon ‘awdekha, ki niskalti me’od. waydabeir yhoh ’el gad, Hoceih dawid leimor. leikh wedibarta ’el dawid leimor, koh ’amar yhoh, shalosh ’ani noTeh ‘alekha; beHar lekha ’aHat meiheinah we’e‘eseh lakh. wayawo gad ’el dawid; wayomer lo koh ’amar yhoh qabel lakh. ’im shalosh shanim ra‘aw, we’im sheloshah Hodashim nispeh mipenei zarekha weHerew ’oywekha lemaseget we’im sheloshet yamim Herew yhoh wedewer ba’arez, umal’akh yhoh, mashHit bekhal gewul yisra’eil; we‘atah re’eih, mah ’ashiw ’et sholeHi dawar. wayomer dawid ’el gad zar li me’od; ’epelah na weyad yhoh ki rabim raHamaw me’od, uweyad ’adam ’al ’epol. wayitein yhoh dewer beyisra’eil; wayipol miyisra’eil, shiw‘im ’elef ’ish. wayishlaH ha’elohim mal’akh lirushalim lehashHitah ukhehashHit, ra’ah yhoh wayinaHem ‘al hara‘ah, wayomer lamal’akh hamashHit raw, ‘atah heref yadekha; umal’akh yhoh ‘omeid, ‘im goren ’arenan haywusi. wayisa dawid ’et ‘einaw, wayar ’et mal’akh yhoh ‘omeid, bein ha’arez uwein hashamayim, weHarbo shelufah beyado, neTuyah ‘al yerushalim; wayipol dawid wehacceqeinim mekhussim basaqim ‘al peneihem. wayomer dawid ’el ha’elohim halo ’ani ’amarti limnot ba‘am, wa’ani hu ’asher HaTati wehareia‘ harei‘oti, we’eileh hazon meh ‘asu; yhoh ’elohay, tehi na yadekha bi uweweit ’awi, uwe‘amekha lo lemageifah. umal’akh yhoh ’amar ’el gad leimor ledawid; ki ya‘aleh dawid, lehaqim micbeiaH yhoh, begoren ’arenan haywusi. waya‘al dawid bidwar gad, ’asher diber besheim yhoh. wayashaw ’arenan, wayar ’et hamal’akh, we’arba‘at banaw ‘imo mitHabe’im; we’arenan dash HiTim. wayawo dawid ‘ad ’arenan; wayabeiT ’arenan wayar ’et dawid, wayeizei min hagoren, wayishtaHu ledawid ’apayim ’arezah. wayomer dawid ’el ’arenan, tenah li meqom hagoren, we’ewneh bo micbeiaH yhoh; bekhesef malei teneihu li, wetei‘azar hamageifah mei‘al ha‘am. wayomer ’arenan ’el dawid qaH lakh, weya‘as ’adoni hamelekh haTow be‘einaw; re’eih natati habaqar la‘olot, wehamorigim la‘eizim wehaHiTim laminHah hakol natati. wayomer hamelekh dawid le’arenan, lo ki qanoh ’eqneh bekhesef malei; ki lo ’esa ’asher lekha yhoh, weha‘alot ‘olah Hinam. wayitein dawid le’arenan bamaqom; shiqlei cahaw, mishqal sheish mei’ot. wayiwen sham dawid micbeiaH yhoh, waya‘al ‘olot ushelamim; wayiqra ’el yhoh, waya‘aneihu wa’eish min hashamayim, ‘al micbaH ha‘olah. wayomer yhoh lamal’akh, wayashew Harbo ’el nedanah. ba‘eit hahi, bir’ot dawid ki ‘anahu yhoh, begoren ’arenan haywusi; wayicbaH sham. umishkan yhoh ’asher ‘asah mosheh wamidbar umicbaH ha‘olah ba‘eit hahi; babamah begiw‘on. welo yakhol dawid lalekhet lefanaw lidrosh ’elohim; ki niw‘at, mipenei Herew mal’akh yhoh.

22

 wayomer dawid, ceh hu, beit yhoh ha’elohim; weceh micbeiaH le‘olah leyisra’eil. wayomer dawid, likhnos ’et hageirim, ’asher be’erez yisra’eil; waya‘ameid Hozewim, laHzow ’awnei gacit, liwnot beit ha’elohim. uwarcel larow lamismerim ledaltot hashe‘arim welamHaberot heikhin dawid; uneHoshet larow ’ein mishqal. wa‘azei ’aracim le’ein mispar; ki heiwi’u hazidonim wehazorim ‘azei ’aracim larow ledawid. wayomer dawid, shelomoh weni na‘ar warakh wehabayit liwnot yhoh lehagdil lema‘lah lesheim uletif’eret lekhal ha’arazot, ’akhinah na lo; wayakhen dawid larow lifnei moto. wayiqra lishlomoh weno; wayzawweihu liwnot bayit, yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil. wayomer dawid lishlomoh; beno beni ’ani hayah ‘im lewawi, liwnot bayit, lesheim yhoh ’elohay. wayhi ‘alay dewar yhoh leimor, dam larow shafakhta, umilHamot gedolot ‘asita; lo tiwneh wayit lishmi, ki damim rabim, shafakhta ’arzah lefanay. hineih wein nolad lakh, hu yihyeh ’ish menuHah, wahaniHoti lo mikal ’oywaw missawiw; ki shelomoh yihyeh shemo, weshalom washeqeT ’etein ‘al yisra’eil beyamaw. hu yiwneh wayit lishmi, wehu yihyeh li lewein, wa’ani lo le’aw; wahakhinoti kissei malkhuto ‘al yisra’eil ‘ad ‘olam. ‘atah weni, yehi yhoh ‘imakh; wehizlaHta, uwanita beit yhoh ’elohekha, ka’asher diber ‘alekha. ’akh yiten lekha yhoh seikhel uwinah, wizawwekha ‘al yisra’eil; welishmor ’et torat yhoh ’elohekha. ’ac tazliaH, ’im tishmor, la‘asot ’et haHuqim we’et hamishpaTim, ’asher ziwwah yhoh ’et mosheh ‘al yisra’eil; Hacaq we’emaz, ’al tira we’al teiHat. wehineih we‘aneyi hakhinoti leweit yhoh cahaw kikarim mei’ah ’elef wekhesef, ’elef ’alafim kikarim, welaneHoshet welabarcel ’ein mishqal, ki larow hayah; we‘eizim wa’awanim hakhinoti, wa‘aleihem tosif. we‘imekha larow ‘osei melakhah, Hozewim weHarashei ’ewen wa‘eiz; wekhal Hakham bekhal melakhah. laccahaw lakesef welaneHoshet welabarcel ’ein mispar; qum wa‘aseih, wihi yhoh ‘imakh. wayzaw dawid lekhal sarei yisra’eil, la‘cor lishlomoh weno. halo yhoh ’eloheikhem ‘imakhem, weheiniaH lakhem missawiw; ki natan beyadi, ’eit yoshewei ha’arez, wenikhbeshah ha’arez lifnei yhoh welifnei ‘amo. ‘atah, tenu lewawkhem wenafshekhem, lidrosh yhoh ’eloheikhem; wequmu, uwenu ’et miqdash yhoh ha’elohim, lehawi ’et ’aron berit yhoh ukhelei qodesh ha’elohim, labayit haniwneh lesheim yhoh.

23

 wedawid caqein wesawa‘ yamim; wayamleikh ’et shelomoh weno ‘al yisra’eil. waye’esof ’et kal sarei yisra’eil, wehakohanim wehalwiyim. wayissaferu halwiyim, miben sheloshim shanah wama‘elah; wayhi misparam legulgelotam ligwarim, sheloshim ushemonah ’alef. mei’eileh, lenazeiaH ‘al melekhet beit yhoh, ‘esrim we’arba‘ah ’alef; weshoTerim weshofeTim sheishet ’alafim. we’arba‘at ’alafim sho‘arim; we’arba‘at ’alafim mehalim yhoh, bakeilim ’asher ‘asiti lehaleil. wayeHaleqeim dawid maHleqot; s liwnei leiwi, legeireshon qehat umerari. lageireshuni la‘dan weshim‘i. benei la‘dan, harosh yeHi’eil weceitam weyo’eil sheloshah. benei shim‘i, shelomot shelomit waHaci’eil weharan sheloshah; ’eileh rashei ha’awot lela‘dan. uwenei shim‘i, yaHat cina, wi‘ush uweri‘ah; ’eileh wenei shim‘i ’arba‘ah. wayhi yaHat harosh, wecicah hasheini; wi‘ush uweri‘ah lo hirbu wanim, wayihyu leweit ’aw, lifqudah ’eHat. benei qehat, ‘amram yizhar Hewron we‘ucci’eil ’arba‘ah. benei ‘amram ’aharon umosheh; wayibadeil ’aharon lehaqdisho qodesh qadashim hu uwanaw ‘ad ‘olam, lehaqTir lifnei yhoh leshareto ulewareikh bishmo ‘ad ‘olam. umosheh ’ish ha’elohim; banaw yiqare’u ‘al sheiweT haleiwi. benei mosheh, geireshom we’eli‘ecer. benei geireshom shewu’eil harosh. wayihyu wenei ’eli‘ecer reHawyah harosh; welo hayah le’eli‘ecer banim ’aHeirim, uwenei reHawyah rawu lema‘elah. benei yizhar shelomit harosh. benei Hewron; yeriyahu harosh ’amaryah hasheini, yaHaci’eil hashelishi, wiqam‘am harewi‘i. benei ‘ucci’eil; mikhah harosh, weyishiyah hasheini. benei merari maHli umushi, benei maHli ’el‘acar weqish. wayamat ’el‘acar, welo hayu lo banim ki ’im banot; wayisa’um benei qish ’aHeihem. benei mushi, maHli we‘eider wireimot sheloshah. ’eileh wenei leiwi leweit ’awoteihem rashei ha’awot lifqudeihem, bemispar sheimot legulgelotam, ‘oseih hamelakhah, la‘awodat beit yhoh; miben ‘esrim shanah wama‘elah. ki ’amar dawid, heiniaH yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil le‘amo; wayishkon birushalim ‘ad le‘olam. wegam lalwiyim; ’ein laseit ’et hamishkan we’et kal keilaw la‘awodato. ki wediwrei dawid ha’aHaronim, heimah mispar benei leiwi; miben ‘esrim shanah ulema‘elah. ki ma‘amadam leyad benei ’aharon, la‘awodat beit yhoh, ‘al haHazeirot we‘al haleshakhot, we‘al Tahorat lekhal qodesh; uma‘aseih, ‘awodat beit ha’elohim. uleleHem hama‘arekhet ulesolet leminHah welirqiqei hamazot, welamaHawat welamurbakhet; ulekhal mesurah umidah. wela‘amod baboqer baboqer, lehodot ulehaleil yhoh; wekhein la‘arew. ulekhol ha‘alot ‘olot yhoh, lashabatot, leHodashim welamo‘adim; bemispar kemishpaT ‘aleihem tamid lifnei yhoh. weshameru ’et mishmeret ’ohel mo‘eid, we’eit mishmeret haqodesh, umishmeret benei ’aharon ’aHeihem; la‘awodat beit yhoh.

24

 weliwnei ’aharon maHleqotam; benei ’aharon, nadaw wa’awihu, ’el‘acar we’itamar. wayamat nadaw wa’awihu lifnei ’awihem, uwanim lo hayu lahem; waykhahanu, ’el‘acar we’itamar. wayeHaleqeim dawid, wezadoq min benei ’el‘acar, wa’aHimelekh min benei ’itamar; lifqudatam ba‘awodatam. wayimaze’u wenei ’el‘acar rabim lerashei hagewarim min benei ’itamar wayaHlequm; liwnei ’el‘acar rashim leweit ’awot shishah ‘asar, weliwnei ’itamar leweit ’awotam shemonah. wayaHlequm begoralot ’eileh ‘im ’eileh; ki hayu sarei qodesh wesarei ha’elohim, mibenei ’el‘acar uwiwnei ’itamar. wayikhteweim shema‘yah wen netan’eil hassofeir min haleiwi, lifnei hamelekh wehasarim wezadoq hakohein, wa’aHimelekh ben ’ewyatar, werashei ha’awot, lakohanim welalwiyim; beit ’aw ’eHad, ’aHuc le’el‘acar, we’aHuc ’aHuc le’itamar. wayeizei hagoral harishon lihoyariw, lida‘yah hasheini. leHarim hashelishi, lis‘orim harewi‘i. lemalkiyah haHamishi, lemiyamin hashishi. lehaqoz hashewi‘i, la’awiyah hashemini. leyeishua‘ hateshi‘i, lishkhanyahu ha‘asiri. le’elyashiw ‘ashtei ‘asar, leyaqim sheneim ‘asar. leHupah sheloshah ‘asar, leyeshew’aw ’arba‘ah ‘asar. lewilgah Hamishah ‘asar, le’imeir shishah ‘asar. leHeicir shiw‘ah ‘asar, lehapizeiz shemonah ‘asar. liftaHyah tish‘ah ‘asar, liHecqeil ha‘esrim. leyakhin ’eHad we‘esrim, legamul shenayim we‘esrim. lidlayahu sheloshah we‘esrim, lema‘acyahu ’arba‘ah we‘esrim. ’eileh fequdatam la‘awodatam, lawo leweit yhoh kemishpaTam, beyad ’aharon ’awihem; ka’asher ziwwahu, yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil. weliwnei leiwi hanotarim; liwnei ‘amram shuwa’eil, liwnei shuwa’eil yeHdeyahu. lirHawyahu; liwnei reHawyahu, harosh yishiyah. layizhari shelomot, liwnei shelomot yaHat. uwenay yeriyahu; ’amaryahu hasheini, yaHaci’eil hashelishi, yeqam‘am harewi‘i. benei ‘ucci’eil mikhah, liwnei mikhah shamur shamir. ’aHi mikhah yishiyah, liwnei yishiyah cekharyahu. benei merari maHli umushi, benei ya‘aciyahu weno. benei merari; leya‘aciyahu weno, weshoham wecakur we‘iwri. lemaHli ’el‘acar, welo hayah lo banim. leqish benei qish yeraHme’eil. uwenei mushi, maHli we‘eider wirimot; ’eileh benei halwiyim leweit ’awoteihem. wayapilu gam heim goralot le‘umat ’aHeihem benei ’aharon, lifnei dawid hamelekh wezadoq wa’aHimelekh, werashei ha’awot, lakohanim welalwiyim; ’awot harosh, le‘umat ’aHiw haqaTan.

25

 wayawdeil dawid wesarei hazawa la‘awodah, liwnei ’asaf weheiman widutun, hanebi’im hanibe’im bekhinorot binwalim uwimziltayim; wayhi misparam, ’anshei melakhah la‘awodatam. liwnei ’asaf, cakur weyoseif unetanyah wa’asar’eilah benei ’asaf; ‘al yad ’asaf, haniba ‘al yedei hamelekh. lidutun; benei yedutun gedalyahu uzeri wisha‘yahu Hashawyahu umatityahu shishah, ‘al yedei ’awihem yedutun bakinor, haniba ‘al hodot wehaleil yhoh. leheiman; benei heiman buqiyahu matanyahu ‘ucci’eil shewu’eil wirimot Hananyah Hanani, ’eli’atah gidalti weromamti ‘ecer, yashebeqashah maloti, hotir maHaci’ot. kal ’eileh wanim leheiman, Hoceih hamelekh bediwrei ha’elohim leharim qaren; wayitein ha’elohim leheiman, banim ’arba‘ah ‘asar uwanot shalosh. kal ’eileh ‘al yedei ’awihem bashir beit yhoh bimziltayim newalim wekhinorot, la‘awodat beit ha’elohim; ‘al yedei hamelekh, s ’asaf widutun weheiman. wayhi misparam ‘im ’aHeihem, melumedei shir yhoh; kal hameiwin, matayim shemonim ushemonah. wayapilu goralot mishmeret, le‘umat kaqaTon kagadol, meiwin ‘im talmid. wayeizei hagoral harishon le’asaf leyoseif; gedalyahu hasheini, hu we’eHaw uwanaw sheneim ‘asar. hashelishi cakur, banaw we’eHaw sheneim ‘asar. harewi‘i layizri, banaw we’eHaw sheneim ‘asar. haHamishi netanyahu, banaw we’eHaw sheneim ‘asar. hashishi wuqiyahu, banaw we’eHaw sheneim ‘asar. hashewi‘i yesar’eilah, banaw we’eHaw sheneim ‘asar. hashemini yesha‘yahu, banaw we’eHaw sheneim ‘asar. hateshi‘i matanyahu, banaw we’eHaw sheneim ‘asar. ha‘asiri shim‘i, banaw we’eHaw sheneim ‘asar. ‘ashtei ‘asar ‘acar’eil, banaw we’eHaw sheneim ‘asar. hasheneim ‘asar laHashawyah, banaw we’eHaw sheneim ‘asar. lishloshah ‘asar shuwa’eil, banaw we’eHaw sheneim ‘asar. le’arba‘ah ‘asar matityahu, banaw we’eHaw sheneim ‘asar. laHamishah ‘asar lireimot, banaw we’eHaw sheneim ‘asar. leshishah ‘asar laHananyahu, banaw we’eHaw sheneim ‘asar. leshiw‘ah ‘asar leyashebeqashah, banaw we’eHaw sheneim ‘asar. lishmonah ‘asar laHanani, banaw we’eHaw sheneim ‘asar. letish‘ah ‘asar lemaloti, banaw we’eHaw sheneim ‘asar. le‘esrim le’eliyatah, banaw we’eHaw sheneim ‘asar. le’eHad we‘esrim lehotir, banaw we’eHaw sheneim ‘asar. lishnayim we‘esrim legidalti, banaw we’eHaw sheneim ‘asar. lishloshah we‘esrim lemaHaci’ot, banaw we’eHaw sheneim ‘asar. le’arba‘ah we‘esrim leromamti ‘acer, banaw we’eHaw sheneim ‘asar.

26

 lemaHleqot lesho‘arim; laqareHim meshelemyahu wen qorei min benei ’asaf. welimshelemyahu banim; cekharyahu habekhor yedi‘a’eil hasheini, cewadyahu hashelishi, yatni’eil harewi‘i. ‘eilam haHamishi yehoHanan hashishi, ’elyeho‘einay hashewi‘i. ule‘oweid ’edom banim; shema‘yah habekhor yehocawad hasheini, yo’aH hashelishi wesakhar harewi‘i, unetan’eil haHamishi. ‘ami’eil hashishi yisashkhar hashewi‘i, pe‘uletay hashemini; ki weirakho ’elohim. welishma‘yah weno nolad banim, hamimshalim leweit ’awihem; ki giborei Hayil heimah. benei shema‘yah, ‘ateni urefa’eil we‘oweid ’elcawad ’eHaw benei Hayil; ’elihu usemakhyahu. kal ’eileh mibenei ‘oweid ’edom, heimah uweneihem wa’aHeihem, ’ish Hayil bakoaH la‘awodah; shishim ushenayim le‘oweid ’edom. welimshelemyahu, banim we’aHim benei Hayil shemonah ‘asar. uleHosah min benei merari banim; shimri harosh ki lo hayah wekhor, waysimeihu ’awihu lerosh. Hilqiyahu hasheini Tewalyahu hashelishi, cekharyahu harewi‘i; kal banim we’aHim leHosah sheloshah ‘asar. le’eileh maHleqot hasho‘arim lerashei hagewarim mishmarot le‘umat ’aHeihem; leshareit beweit yhoh. wayapilu goralot kaqaTon kagadol leweit ’awotam lesha‘ar washa‘ar. wayipol hagoral micraHah leshelemyahu; ucekharyahu weno yo‘eiz besekhel, hipilu goralot, wayeizei goralo zafonah. le‘oweid ’edom negbah; ulewanaw beit ha’asupim. leshupim uleHosah lama‘araw, ‘im sha‘ar shalekhet, bamsilah ha‘olah; mishmar le‘umat mishmar. lamicraH halwiyim shishah lazafonah layom ’arba‘ah, lanegbah layom ’arba‘ah; wela’asupim shenayim shenayim. laparbar lama‘araw; ’arba‘ah lamsilah, shenayim laparbar. ’eileh, maHleqot hasho‘arim, liwnei haqareHi weliwnei merari. wehalwiyim; ’aHiyah, ‘al ’ozrot beit ha’elohim, ule’ozerot haqodashim. benei la‘dan benei hageireshuni lela‘dan, rashei ha’awot lela‘dan hageireshuni yeHi’eili. benei yeHi’eili; ceitam weyo’eil ’aHiw, ‘al ’ozerot beit yhoh. la‘amrami layizhari, laHewroni la‘acci’eili. ushewu’eil ben geireshom ben mosheh, nagid ‘al ha’ozarot. we’eHaw le’eli‘ecer; reHawyahu weno wisha‘yahu weno weyoram beno, wecikhri weno ushelomot ushelomit beno. hu shelomot we’eHaw, ‘al kal ’ozerot haqodashim ’asher hiqdish dawid hamelekh, werashei ha’awot lesarei ha’alafim wehamei’ot wesarei hazawa. min hamilHamot umin hashalal hiqdishu; leHacceiq leweit yhoh. wekhol hahiqdish shemu’eil haro’eh wesha’ul ben qish, we’awneir ben neir, weyo’aw ben zeruyah; kol hamaqdish, ‘al yad shelomit we’eHaw. layizhari kenanyahu uwanaw, lamelakhah haHizonah ‘al yisra’eil, leshoTerim uleshofeTim. laHewroni Hashawyahu we’eHaw benei Hayil ’elef ushewa‘ mei’ot, ‘al pequdat yisra’eil, mei‘eiwer layardein ma‘rawah; lekhol melekhet yhoh, wela‘awodat hamelekh. laHewroni yeriyah harosh, laHewroni letoledotaw le’awot; bishnat ha’arba‘im lemalkhut dawid nidrashu, wayimazei wahem giborei Hayil beya‘ceir gil‘ad. we’eHaw benei Hayil, ’alpayim ushewa‘ mei’ot rashei ha’awot; wayafqideim dawid hamelekh, ‘al har’uweini wehagadi waHazi sheiweT hamnashi, lekhal dewar ha’elohim udewar hamelekh.

27

 uwenei yisra’eil lemisparam rashei ha’awot wesarei ha’alafim wehamei’ot weshoTereihem hamsharetim ’et hamelekh lekhol dewar hamaHleqot, haba’ah wehayozeit Hodesh beHodesh, lekhol Hadeshei hashanah; hamaHaloqet ha’aHat, ‘esrim we’arba‘ah ’alef. ‘al hamaHaloqet harishonah laHodesh harishon, yashawe‘am ben cawdi’eil; we‘al maHaluqto, ‘esrim we’arba‘ah ’alef. min benei ferez, harosh lekhal sarei hazewa’ot laHodesh harishon. we‘al maHaloqet haHodesh hasheini, doday ha’aHoHi umaHaluqto, umiqlot hanagid; we‘al maHaluqto, ‘esrim we’arba‘ah ’alef. sar hazawa hashelishi laHodesh hashelishi, benayahu wen yehoyada‘ hakohein rosh; we‘al maHaluqto, ‘esrim we’arba‘ah ’alef. hu wenayahu gibor hasheloshim we‘al hasheloshim; umaHaluqto, ‘amicawad beno. harewi‘i laHodesh harewi‘i, ‘asah ’eil ’aHi yo’aw, ucewadyah weno ’aHaraw; we‘al maHaluqto, ‘esrim we’arba‘ah ’alef. haHamishi laHodesh haHamishi, hasar shamhut hayicraH; we‘al maHaluqto, ‘esrim we’arba‘ah ’alef. hashishi laHodesh hashishi, ‘ira wen ‘iqeish hateqo‘i; we‘al maHaluqto, ‘esrim we’arba‘ah ’alef. hashewi‘i laHodesh hashewi‘i, Helez hapeloni min benei ’efrayim; we‘al maHaluqto, ‘esrim we’arba‘ah ’alef. hashemini laHodesh hashemini, sibekhay haHushati laccarHi; we‘al maHaluqto, ‘esrim we’arba‘ah ’alef. hateshi‘i laHodesh hateshi‘i, ’awi‘ecer ha‘anetoti labenyemini labein yemini; we‘al maHaluqto, ‘esrim we’arba‘ah ’alef. ha‘asiri laHodesh ha‘asiri, mahray haneTofati laccarHi; we‘al maHaluqto, ‘esrim we’arba‘ah ’alef. ‘ashtei ‘asar le‘ashtei ‘asar haHodesh, benayah hapir‘atoni min benei ’efrayim; we‘al maHaluqto, ‘esrim we’arba‘ah ’alef. hasheneim ‘asar lishneim ‘asar haHodesh, Helday haneTofati le‘ateni’eil; we‘al maHaluqto, ‘esrim we’arba‘ah ’alef. we‘al shiwTei yisra’eil, lar’uweini nagid, ’eli‘ecer ben cikhri; s lashim‘oni, shefaTyahu ben ma‘akhah. leleiwi Hashawyah wen qemu’eil le’aharon zadoq. lihudah ’elihu mei’aHei dawid; leyisashkhar, ‘ameri ben mikha’eil. licwulun yishma‘yahu ben ‘owadyahu; lenaftali, yerimot ben ‘acri’eil. liwnei ’efrayim, hosheia‘ ben ‘acacyahu; laHazi sheiweT menasheh, yo’eil ben pedayahu. laHazi hamnasheh gil‘adah, yido ben cekharyahu; s lewinyamin, ya‘asi’eil ben ’awneir. ledan ‘acar’eil ben yeroHam; ’eileh sarei shiwTei yisra’eil. welo nasa dawid misparam, lemiben ‘esrim shanah ulemaTah; ki ’amar yhoh, leharbot ’et yisra’eil kekhokhwei hashamayim. yo’aw ben zeruyah heiHeil limnot welo khilah, wayhi wacot qezef ‘al yisra’eil; welo ‘alah hamispar, bemispar diwrei hayamim lamelekh dawid. we‘al ’ozerot hamelekh, ‘acmawet ben ‘adi’eil; s we‘al ha’ozarot basadeh be‘arim uwakefarim uwamigdalot, yehonatan ben ‘ucciyahu. we‘al, ‘osei melekhet hasadeh, la‘awodat ha’adamah; ‘ecri ben keluw. we‘al hakeramim, shim‘i haramati; we‘al shebakeramim le’ozerot hayayin, cawdi hashifmi. we‘al hacceitim wehashiqmim ’asher bashefeilah, ba‘al Hanan hagedeiri; s we‘al ’ozerot hashemen yo‘ash. we‘al habaqar haro‘im basharon, shiTray shirTay hasharoni; we‘al habaqar ba‘amaqim, shafaT ben ‘adlay. we‘al hagemalim, ’owil hayishme‘eili; we‘al ha’atonot, yeHdeyahu hameironoti. we‘al hazon yacic hahagri; kal ’eileh sarei harekhush, ’asher lamelekh dawid. wihonatan dod dawid yo‘eiz, ’ish meiwin wesofeir hu; wiHi’eil ben Hakhmoni ‘im benei hamelekh. wa’aHitofel yo‘eiz lamelekh; s weHushay ha’arki reia‘ hamelekh. we’aHarei ’aHitofel, yehoyada‘ ben benayahu we’ewyatar, wesar zawa lamelekh yo’aw.

28

 wayaqheil dawid ’et kal sarei yisra’eil sarei hashewaTim wesarei hamaHleqot hamsharetim ’et hamelekh wesarei ha’alafim wesarei hamei’ot wesarei khal rekhush umiqneh lamelekh ulewanaw ‘im hassarisim wehagiborim ulekhal gibor Hayil ’el yerushalim. wayaqam dawid hamelekh ‘al raglaw, wayomer shema‘uni ’aHay we‘ami; ’ani ‘im lewawi liwnot beit menuHah la’aron berit yhoh welahadom raglei ’eloheinu, wahakhinoti liwnot. weha’elohim ’amar li, lo tiwneh wayit lishmi; ki ’ish milHamot ’atah wedamim shafakheta. wayiwHar yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil bi mikol beit ’awi, lihyot lemelekh ‘al yisra’eil le‘olam, ki wihudah baHar lenagid, uweweit yehudah beit ’awi; uwiwnei ’awi, bi razah, lehamlikh ‘al kal yisra’eil. umikal banay, ki rabim banim, natan li yhoh; wayiwHar bishlomoh weni, lashewet, ‘al kissei malkhut yhoh ‘al yisra’eil. wayomer li, shelomoh winkha, hu yiwneh weiti waHazeirotay; ki waHarti wo li lewein, wa’ani ’ehyeh lo le’aw. wahakhinoti ’et malkhuto ‘ad le‘olam; ’im yeHecaq, la‘asot mizwotay umishpaTay kayom hacceh. we‘atah le‘einei khal yisra’eil qehal yhoh uwe’acenei ’eloheinu, shimru wedirshu, kal mizwot yhoh ’eloheikhem; lema‘an tireshu ’et ha’arez haTowah, wehinHaltem liwneikhem ’aHareikhem ‘ad ‘olam. we’atah shelomoh weni da‘ ’et ’elohei ’awikha we‘awedeihu, beleiw shaleim uwenefesh Hafeizah, ki khal lewawot doreish yhoh, wekhal yeizer maHashawot meiwin; ’im tidreshenu yimazei lakh, we’im ta‘acwenu yacniHakha la‘ad. re’eih ‘atah, ki yhoh baHar bekha liwnot bayit lamiqdash Hacaq wa‘aseih. wayitein dawid lishlomoh weno ’et tawnit ha’ulam we’et bataw wegancakaw wa‘aliyotaw waHadaraw hapenimim uweit hakaporet. wetawnit, kol ’asher hayah waruaH ‘imo, leHazrot beit yhoh ulekhal haleshakhot sawiw; le’ozerot beit ha’elohim, ule’ozerot haqodashim. ulemaHleqot hakohanim wehalwiyim, ulekhal melekhet ‘awodat beit yhoh; ulekhal kelei ‘awodat beit yhoh. laccahaw bamishqal laccahaw, lekhal kelei ‘awodah wa‘awodah; lekhol kelei hakesef bemishqal, lekhal kelei ‘awodah wa‘awodah. umishqal limnorot haccahaw, weneiroteihem cahaw, bemishqal menorah umenorah weneiroteha; welimnorot hakesef bemishqal limnorah weneiroteha, ka‘awodat menorah umenorah. we’et haccahaw mishqal leshulHanot hama‘arekhet leshulHan weshulHan; wekhesef leshulHanot hakasef. wehamiclagot wehamicraqot wehaqesawot cahaw Tahor; welikhforei haccahaw bemishqal likhfor ukhefor, welikhforei hakesef bemishqal likhfor ukhefor. ulemicbaH haqeToret cahaw mecuqaq bamishqal; uletawnit hamerkawah, hakeruwim cahaw leforesim, wesokhekhim ‘al ’aron berit yhoh. hakol bikhtaw miyad yhoh ‘alay hiskil; kol mal’akhot hatawnit. wayomer dawid lishlomoh weno, Hacaq we’emaz wa‘aseih, ’al tira we’al teiHat; ki yhoh ’elohim ’elohay ‘imakh, lo yarpekha welo ya‘acweka, ‘ad likhlot kal melekhet ‘awodat beit yhoh. wehineih, maHleqot hakohanim wehalwiyim, lekhal ‘awodat beit ha’elohim; we‘imekha wekhal melakhah lekhal nadiw baHakhemah lekhal ‘awodah, wehasarim wekhal ha‘am lekhal dewarekha.

29

 wayomer dawid hamelekh lekhal haqahal, shelomoh weni ’eHad baHar bo ’elohim na‘ar warakh; wehamelakhah gedolah, ki lo le’adam habirah, ki yhoh ’elohim. ukhekhal koHi hakhinoti leweit ’elohay, haccahaw laccahaw wehakesef lakesef wehaneHoshet laneHoshet, habarcel labarcel, weha‘eizim la‘eizim; ’awnei shoham umilu’im ’awnei fukh weriqmah, wekhol ’ewen yeqarah we’awnei shayish larow. we‘od, birzoti beweit ’elohay, yesh li segulah cahaw wakhasef; natati leweit ’elohay lema‘lah, mikal hakhinoti leweit haqodesh. sheloshet ’alafim kikerei cahaw miccehaw ’ofir; weshiw‘at ’alafim kikar kesef mecuqaq, laTuaH qirot habatim. laccahaw laccahaw welakesef lakesef, ulekhal melakhah beyad Harashim; umi mitnadeiw, lemalot yado hayom yhoh. wayitnadewu sarei ha’awot wesarei shiwTei yisra’eil, wesarei ha’alafim wehamei’ot, ulesarei melekhet hamelekh. wayitenu la‘awodat beit ha’elohim, cahaw kikarim Hameishet ’alafim wa’adarkhonim ribo wekhesef, kikarim ‘aseret ’alafim, uneHoshet ribo ushemonat ’alafim kikarim; uwarcel mei’ah ’elef kikarim. wehanimza ’ito ’awanim, natenu le’ozar beit yhoh; ‘al yad yeHi’eil hageireshuni. wayismeHu ha‘am ‘al hitnadewam, ki beleiw shaleim, hitnadewu yhoh; wegam dawid hamelekh, samaH simHah gedolah. waywarekh dawid ’et yhoh, le‘einei kal haqahal; wayomer dawid, barukh ’atah yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil ’awinu, mei‘olam we‘ad ‘olam. lekha yhoh hagedulah wehagewurah wehatif’eret wehaneizaH wehahod, ki khol bashamayim uwa’arez; lekha yhoh hamamlakhah, wehamitnasei lekhol lerosh. weha‘osher wehakawod milefanekha, we’atah mosheil bakol, uweyadekha koaH ugewurah; uweyadekha, legadeil uleHacceiq lakol. we‘atah ’eloheinu, modim ’anaHnu lakh; umehalim lesheim tif’artekha. wekhi mi ’ani umi ‘ami, ki na‘zor koaH, lehitnadeiw kacot; ki mimekha hakol, umiyadekha natanu lakh. ki geirim ’anaHnu lefanekha wetoshawim kekhal ’awoteinu; kazeil yameinu ‘al ha’arez we’ein miqweh. yhoh ’eloheinu, khol hehamon hacceh ’asher hakhinonu, liwnot lekha wayit lesheim qadshekha miyadekha hi hu ulekha hakol. weyada‘ti ’elohay, ki ’atah boHein leiwaw, umeisharim tirzeh; ’ani, beyosher lewawi hitnadawti khal ’eileh, we‘atah, ‘amekha hanimze’u foh, ra’iti wesimHah lehitnadew lakh. yhoh ’elohei ’awraham yizHaq weyisra’eil ’awoteinu, shomrah cot le‘olam, leyeizer maHshewot lewaw ‘amekha; wehakhein lewawam ’eilekha. welishlomoh weni, tein leiwaw shaleim, lishmor mizwotekha, ‘eidewotekha weHuqekha; wela‘asot hakol, weliwnot habirah ’asher hakhinoti. wayomer dawid lekhal haqahal, barekhu na ’et yhoh ’eloheikhem; waywarakhu khal haqahal, yhoh ’elohei ’awoteihem, wayiqedu wayishtaHawu yhoh welamelekh. wayicbeHu yhoh cewaHim waya‘alu ‘olot yhoh lemaHorat hayom hahu parim ’elef ’eilim ’elef kewasim ’elef weniskeihem; ucewaHim larow lekhal yisra’eil. wayokhelu wayishtu lifnei yhoh bayom hahu besimHah gedolah; wayamlikhu sheinit lishlomoh wen dawid, wayimsheHu yhoh lenagid ulezadoq lekhohein. wayeishew lomoh ‘al kissei yhoh lemelekh taHat dawid ’awiw wayazlaH; wayishme‘u ’eilaw kal yisra’eil. wekhal hasarim wehagiborim, wegam kal benei hamelekh dawid; natenu yad, taHat shelomoh hamelekh. waygadeil yhoh ’et shelomoh lema‘lah, le‘einei kal yisra’eil; wayitein ‘alaw hod malkhut, ’asher lo hayah ‘al kal melekh lefanaw ‘al yisra’eil. wedawid ben yishay, malakh ‘al kal yisra’eil. wehayamim, ’asher malakh ‘al yisra’eil, ’arba‘im shanah; beHewron malakh shewa‘ shanim, uwirushalim malakh sheloshim weshalosh. wayamat beseiwah Towah, sewa‘ yamim ‘osher wekhawod; wayimlokh shelomoh weno taHtaw. wediwrei dawid hamelekh, harishonim weha’aHronim; hinam ketuwim, ‘al diwrei shemu’eil haro’eh, we‘al diwrei natan hanawi, we‘al diwrei gad haHoceh. ‘im kal malkhuto ugewurato; weha‘itim, ’asher ‘aweru ‘alaw we‘al yisra’eil, we‘al kal mamlekhot ha’arazot.

2_chronicles

1

 wayitHacceiq shelomoh wen dawid ‘al malkhuto; yhoh ’elohaw ‘imo, waygadeleihu lema‘elah. wayomer shelomoh lekhal yisra’eil lesarei ha’alafim wehamei’ot welashofeTim, ulekhol nasi lekhal yisra’eil rashei ha’awot. wayeilekhu, shelomoh wekhal haqahal ‘imo, labamah ’asher begiw‘on; ki sham hayah, ’ohel mo‘eid ha’elohim, ’asher ‘asah mosheh ‘ewed yhoh bamidbar. ’awal, ’aron ha’elohim he‘elah dawid miqiryat ye‘arim, baheikhin lo dawid; ki naTah lo ’ohel birushalim. umicbaH haneHoshet, ’asher ‘asah bezal’eil ben ’uri wen Hur, sam lifnei mishkan yhoh; wayidresheihu shelomoh wehaqahal. waya‘al shelomoh sham ‘al micbaH haneHoshet lifnei yhoh, ’asher le’ohel mo‘eid; waya‘al ‘alaw ‘olot ’alef. balaylah hahu, nir’ah ’elohim lishlomoh; wayomer lo, she’al mah ’eten lakh. wayomer shelomoh leilohim, ’atah, ‘asita ‘im dawid ’awi Hesed gadol; wehimlakhtani taHtaw. ‘atah yhoh ’elohim, yei’amein dewarekha, ‘im dawid ’awi; ki ’atah himlakhtani, ‘al ‘am raw ka‘afar ha’arez. ‘atah, Hakhmah umada‘ ten li, we’eize’ah lifnei ha‘am hacceh we’awo’ah; ki mi yishpoT, ’et ‘amekha hacceh hagadol. wayomer ’elohim lishlomoh ya‘an ’asher hayetah cot ‘im lewawekha, welosha ’alta ‘osher nekhasim wekhawod we’eit nefesh sone’ekha, wegam yamim rabim lo sha’aleta; watish’al lekha Hakhmah umada‘, ’asher tishpoT ’et ‘ami, ’asher himlakhtikha ‘alaw. haHakhemah wehamada‘ natun lakh; we‘osher unekhasim wekhawod ’eten lakh, ’asher lo hayah khein, lamelakhim ’asher lefanekha, we’aHarekha lo yihyeh kein. wayawo shelomoh labamah ’asher begiw‘on yerushalim, milifnei ’ohel mo‘eid; wayimlokh ‘al yisra’eil. waye’esof shelomoh rekhew ufarashim wayhi lo, ’elef we’arba‘ mei’ot rekhew, usheneim ‘asar ’elef parashim; wayaniHeim be‘arei harekhew, we‘im hamelekh birushalim. wayitein hamelekh ’et hakesef we’et haccahaw birushalim ka’awanim; we’eit ha’aracim, natan kashiqmim ’asher bashefeilah larow. umoza hassusim ’asher lishlomoh mimizrayim; umiqwei soHarei hamelekh, miqwei yiqHu bimHir. waya‘alu wayozi’u mimizrayim merkawah besheish mei’ot kesef, wesus baHamishim umei’ah; wekhein lekhal malkhei haHitim umalkhei ’aram beyadam yozi’u.

2

 wayomer shelomoh, liwnot bayit lesheim yhoh, uwayit lemalkhuto. wayispor shelomoh shiw‘im ’elef ’ish sabal, ushemonim ’elef ’ish Hozeiw bahar; umenazeHim ‘aleihem, sheloshet ’alafim wesheish mei’ot. wayishlaH shelomoh, ’el Huram melekh zor leimor; ka’asher ‘asita ‘im dawid ’awi, watishlaH lo ’aracim, liwnot lo wayit lashewet bo. hineih ’ani woneh bayit lesheim yhoh ’elohay, lehaqdish lo lehaqTir lefanaw qeToret samim uma‘arekhet tamid we‘olot laboqer wela‘erew, lashabatot weleHodashim, ulemo‘adei yhoh ’eloheinu; le‘olam cot ‘al yisra’eil. wehabayit ’asher ’ani woneh gadol; ki gadol ’eloheinu mikal ha’elohim. umi ya‘azar koaH liwnot lo wayit, ki hashamayim ushemei hashamayim lo yekhalkeluhu; umi ’ani ’asher ’ewneh lo wayit, ki ’im lehaqTir lefanaw. we‘atah shelaH li ’ish Hakham la‘asot baccahaw uwakesef uwaneHoshet uwabarcel, uwa’argewan wekharmil utekheilet, weyodeia‘ lefateiaH pituHim; ‘im haHakhamim, ’asher ‘imi bihudah uwirushalim, ’asher heikhin dawid ’awi. ushelaH li ‘azei ’aracim beroshim we’algumim meihalewanon ki ’ani yada‘ti, ’asher ‘awadekha yod‘im, likhrot ‘azei lewanon; wehineih ‘awaday ‘im ‘awadekha. ulehakhin li ‘eizim larow; ki habayit ’asher ’ani woneh gadol wehaflei. wehineih laHoTewim lekhoretei ha‘eizim natati HiTim makot la‘awadekha, korim ‘esrim ’elef, use‘orim korim ‘esrim ’alef; weyayin, batim ‘esrim ’elef, weshemen batim ‘esrim ’alef. wayomer Huram melekh zor bikhtaw, wayishlaH ’el shelomoh; be’ahawat yhoh ’et ‘amo, netanekha ‘aleihem melekh. wayomer Huram barukh yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil, ’asher ‘asah, ’et hashamayim we’et ha’arez; ’asher natan ledawid hamelekh bein Hakham, yodeia‘ seikhel uwinah, ’asher yiwneh bayit yhoh, uwayit lemalkhuto. we‘atah, shalaHti ’ish Hakham yodeia‘ binah leHuram ’awi. ben ’ishah min benot dan, we’awiw ’ish zori yodeia‘ la‘asot baccahaw uwakesef baneHoshet babarcel ba’awanim uwa‘eizim, ba’argaman batekheilet uwabuz uwakarmil, ulefateiaH kal pituaH, welaHshow kal maHashawet; ’asher yinaten lo ‘im Hakhamekha, weHakhmei, ’adoni dawid ’awikha. we‘atah haHiTim wehase‘orim hashemen wehayayin ’asher ’amar ’adoni, yishlaH la‘awadaw. wa’anaHnu nikhrot ‘eizim min halewanon kekhal zarekekha, unewi’eim lekha rafsodot ‘al yam yafo; we’atah ta‘aleh ’otam yerushalim. wayispor shelomoh, kal ha’anashim hageirim ’asher be’erez yisra’eil, ’aHarei hassefar, ’asher sefaram dawid ’awiw; wayimaze’u, mei’ah waHamishim ’elef, usheloshet ’alafim wesheish mei’ot. waya‘as meihem shiw‘im ’elef sabal, ushemonim ’elef Hozeiw bahar; usheloshet ’alafim wesheish mei’ot, menazeHim leha‘awid ’et ha‘am.

3

 wayaHel shelomoh, liwnot ’et beit yhoh birushalim, behar hamoriyah, ’asher nir’ah ledawid ’awihu; ’asher heikhin bimqom dawid, begoren ’arenan haywusi. wayaHel liwnot baHodesh hasheini basheini, bishnat ’arba‘ lemalkhuto. we’eileh husad shelomoh, liwnot ’et beit ha’elohim; ha’orekh ’amot bamidah harishonah ’amot shishim, weroHaw ’amot ‘esrim. weha’ulam ’asher ‘al penei ha’orekh ‘al penei roHaw habayit ’amot ‘esrim, wehagowah mei’ah we‘esrim; wayzapeihu mipenimah cahaw Tahor. we’eit habayit hagadol, Hipah ‘eiz beroshim, wayHapeihu cahaw Tow; waya‘al ‘alaw timorim wesharsherot. wayzaf ’et habayit ’ewen yeqarah letif’aret; wehaccahaw cehaw parwayim. wayHaf ’et habayit haqorot hassipim weqirotaw wedaltotaw cahaw; ufitaH keruwim ‘al haqirot. waya‘as ’et beit qodesh haqodashim, ’areko ‘al penei roHaw habayit ’amot ‘esrim, weraHebo ’amot ‘esrim; wayHapeihu cahaw Tow, lekhikarim sheish mei’ot. umishqal lemismerot lishqalim Hamishim cahaw; weha‘aliyot Hipah cahaw. waya‘as beweit qodesh haqodashim keruwim shenayim, ma‘aseih za‘azu‘im; wayzapu ’otam cahaw. wekhanfei hakeruwim, ’arekam ’amot ‘esrim; kenaf ha’eHad le’amot Hameish, maga‘at leqir habayit, wehakanaf ha’aHeret ’amot Hameish, magia‘ likhnaf hakeruw ha’aHeir. ukhenaf hakeruw ha’eHad ’amot Hameish, magia‘ leqir habayit; wehakanaf ha’aHeret ’amot Hameish, deweiqah likhnaf hakeruw ha’aHeir. kanfei hakeruwim ha’eileh, poresim ’amot ‘esrim; weheim ‘omedim ‘al ragleihem ufeneihem labayit. waya‘as ’et haparokhet, tekheilet we’argaman wekharmil uwuz; waya‘al ‘alaw keruwim. waya‘as lifnei habayit ‘amudim shenayim, ’amot sheloshim weHameish ’orekh; wehazefet ’asher ‘al rosho ’amot Hameish. waya‘as sharsherot badewir, wayitein ‘al rosh ha‘amudim; waya‘as rimonim mei’ah, wayitein basharsherot. wayaqem ’et ha‘amudim ‘al penei haheikhal, ’eHad miyamin we’eHad meihasemol; wayiqra sheim haymini haymani yakhin, wesheim hasemali bo‘ac.

4

 waya‘as micbaH neHoshet, ‘esrim ’amah ’areko, we‘esrim ’amah raHebo; we‘eser ’amot qomato. waya‘as ’et hayam muzaq; ‘eser ba’amah misefato ’el sefato ‘agol sawiw, weHameish ba’amah qomato, weqaw sheloshim ba’amah, yasow ’oto sawiw. udemut beqarim taHat lo sawiw sawiw sowwim ’oto, ‘eser ba’amah, maqifim ’et hayam sawiw; shenayim Turim habaqar, yezuqim bemuzaqto. ‘omeid ‘al sheneim ‘asar baqar, sheloshah fonim zafonah usheloshah fonim yamah usheloshah ponim negbah, usheloshah ponim micraHah, wehayam ‘aleihem milma‘elah; wekhal ’aHoreihem bayetah. we‘aweyo TefaH, usefato kema‘aseih sefat kos, peraH shoshanah; maHaciq batim, sheloshet ’alafim yakhil. waya‘as kiyorim ‘asarah wayitein Hamishah miyamin waHamishah misemol leraHezah wahem, ’et ma‘aseih ha‘olah yadiHu wam; wehayam leraHezah lakohanim bo. waya‘as ’et menorot haccahaw ‘eser kemishpaTam; wayitein baheikhal, Hameish miyamin weHameish misemol. waya‘as shulHanot ‘asarah wayanaH baheikhal, Hamishah miyamin waHamishah misemol; waya‘as micreqei cahaw mei’ah. waya‘as Hazar hakohanim, weha‘acarah hagedolah; udelatot la‘acarah wedaltoteihem zipah neHoshet. we’et hayam, natan miketef haymanit qeidemah mimul negbah. waya‘as Huram, ’et hassirot, we’et haya‘im we’et hamicraqot; s waykhal Hyram Huram, la‘asot ’et hamelakhah, ’asher ‘asah lamelekh shelomoh beweit ha’elohim. ‘amudim shenayim, wehagulot wehakotarot ‘al rosh ha‘amudim shetayim; wehasewakhot shetayim, lekhassot, ’et shetei gulot hakotarot, ’asher ‘al rosh ha‘amudim. we’et harimonim ’arba‘ mei’ot lishtei hasewakhot; shenayim Turim rimonim lasewakhah ha’eHat, lekhassot, ’et shetei gulot hakotarot, ’asher ‘al penei ha‘amudim. we’et hamekhonot ‘asah; we’et hakiyorot ‘asah ‘al hamekhonot. ’et hayam ’eHad; we’et habaqar sheneim ‘asar taHtaw. we’et hassirot we’et haya‘im we’et hamiclagot we’et kal keleihem, ‘asah Huram ’awiw lamelekh shelomoh leweit yhoh; neHoshet maruq. bekhikar hayardein yezaqam hamelekh, ba‘awi ha’adamah; bein sukot uwein zereidatah. waya‘as shelomoh kal hakeilim ha’eileh larow me’od; ki lo neHqar mishqal haneHoshet. waya‘as shelomoh, ’eit kal hakeilim, ’asher beit ha’elohim; we’eit micbaH haccahaw, we’et hashulHanot, wa‘aleihem leHem hapanim. we’et hamenorot weneiroteihem, lewa‘aram kamishpaT lifnei hadewir cahaw sagur. wehaperaH wehaneirot wehamelqaHayim cahaw; hu mikhlot cahaw. wehamcamerot wehamicraqot wehakapot wehamaHtot cahaw sagur; ufetaH habayit daltotaw hapenimiyot leqodesh haqodashim, wedaltei habayit laheikhal cahaw.

5

 watishlam kal hamelakhah, ’asher ‘asah shelomoh leweit yhoh; s wayawei shelomoh ’et qadeshei dawid ’awiw, we’et hakesef we’et haccahaw we’et kal hakeilim, natan be’ozerot beit ha’elohim. ’ac yaqheil shelomoh ’et ciqnei yisra’eil, we’et kal rashei hamaTot nesi’ei ha’awot liwnei yisra’eil ’el yerushalim; leha‘alot ’et ’aron berit yhoh mei‘ir dawid hi ziyon. wayiqahalu ’el hamelekh kal ’ish yisra’eil beHag; hu haHodesh hashewi‘i. wayawo’u kol ciqnei yisra’eil; wayis’u halwiyim ’et ha’aron. waya‘alu ’et ha’aron we’et ’ohel mo‘eid, we’et kal kelei haqodesh ’asher ba’ohel; he‘elu ’otam, hakohanim halwiyim. wehamelekh shelomoh, wekhal ‘adat yisra’eil hano‘adim ‘alaw lifnei ha’aron; mecabeHim zon uwaqar, ’asher lo yissaferu welo yimanu meirow. wayawi’u hakohanim ’et ’aron berit yhoh ’el meqomo ’el dewir habayit ’el qodesh haqedashim; ’el taHat kanfei hakeruwim. wayihyu hakeruwim poresim kenafayim, ‘al meqom ha’aron; waykhassu hakeruwim ‘al ha’aron we‘al badaw milma‘elah. waya’arikhu habadim wayeira’u rashei habadim min ha’aron ‘al penei hadewir, welo yeira’u haHuzah; wayhi sham, ‘ad hayom hacceh. ’ein ba’aron, raq shenei haluHot, ’asher natan mosheh beHoreiw; ’asher karat yhoh ‘im benei yisra’eil, bezeitam mimizrayim. wayhi bezeit hakohanim min haqodesh; ki kal hakohanim hanimze’im hitqadashu, ’ein lishmor lemaHleqot. wehalwiyim hamshorarim lekhulam le’asaf leheiman lidutun weliwneihem wela’aHeihem melubashim buz, bimziltayim uwinwalim wekhinorot, ‘omedim micraH lamicbeiaH; we‘imahem kohanim lemei’ah we‘esrim, maHzeririm maHzerim baHazozerot. wayhi khe’eHad lamaHazozerim lamHazerim welamshorarim lehashmia‘ qol ’eHad, lehaleil ulehodot yhoh ukheharim qol baHazozerot uwimziltayim uwikhlei hashir, uwehaleil yhoh ki Tow, ki le‘olam Hasdo; wehabayit malei ‘anan beit yhoh. welo yakhelu hakohanim la‘amod leshareit mipenei he‘anan; ki malei khewod yhoh ’et beit ha’elohim.

6

 ’ac ’amar shelomoh; yhoh ’amar, lishkon ba‘arafel. wa’ani baniti weit cewul lakh; umakhon leshiwtekha ‘olamim. wayasseiw hamelekh ’et panaw, waywarekh ’eit kal qehal yisra’eil; wekhal qehal yisra’eil ‘omeid. wayomer, barukh yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil, ’asher diber befiw, ’eit dawid ’awi; uweyadaw milei leimor. min hayom, ’asher hozeiti ’et ‘ami mei’erez mizrayim lo waHarti we‘ir, mikol shiwTei yisra’eil, liwnot bayit, lihyot shemi sham; welo waHarti we’ish, lihyot nagid ‘al ‘ami yisra’eil. wa’ewHar birushalim, lihyot shemi sham; wa’ewHar bedawid, lihyot ‘al ‘ami yisra’eil. wayhi ‘im lewaw dawid ’awi; liwnot bayit, lesheim yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil. wayomer yhoh ’el dawid ’awi, ya‘an, ’asher hayah ‘im lewawekha, liwnot bayit lishmi; heTiwota, ki hayah ‘im lewawekha. raq ’atah, lo tiwneh habayit; ki winkha hayozei meiHalazekha, hu yiwneh habayit lishmi. wayaqem yhoh, ’et dewaro ’asher dibeir; wa’aqum taHat dawid ’awi wa’eisheiw ‘al kissei yisra’eil, ka’asher diber yhoh, wa’ewneh habayit, lesheim yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil. wa’asim sham ’et ha’aron, ’asher sham berit yhoh; ’asher karat ‘im benei yisra’eil. waya‘amod, lifnei micbaH yhoh, neged kal qehal yisra’eil; wayifros kapaw. ki ‘asah shelomoh kiyor neHoshet, wayiteneihu betokh ha‘acarah Hameish ’amot ’areko, weHameish ’amot raHebo, we’amot shalosh qomato; waya‘amod ‘alaw, wayiwrakh ‘al birkaw neged kal qehal yisra’eil, wayifros kapaw hashamayemah. wayomar, yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil ’ein kamokha ’elohim, bashamayim uwa’arez; shomeir haberit wehaHesed, la‘awadekha haholekhim lefanekha bekhal libam. ’asher shamarta, le‘awdekha dawid ’awi, ’eit ’asher dibarta lo; watedabeir befikha uweyadekha mileita kayom hacceh. we‘atah yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil, mor le‘awdekha dawid ’awi ’eit ’asher dibarta lo leimor, lo yikareit lekha ’ish milefanay, yosheiw ‘al kissei yisra’eil; raq ’im yishmeru wanekha ’et darkam, lalekhet betorati, ka’asher halakhta lefanay. we‘atah yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil; yei’amein dewarekha, ’asher dibarta le‘awdekha ledawid. ki ha’umnam, yeisheiw ’elohim ’et ha’adam ‘al ha’arez; hineih shamayim ushemei hashamayim lo yekhalkelukha, ’af ki habayit hacceh ’asher baniti. ufanita ’el tefilat ‘awdekha we’el teHinato yhoh ’elohay; lishmoa‘ ’el harinah we’el hatefilah, ’asher ‘awdekha mitpaleil lefanekha. lihyot ‘einekha fetuHot ’el habayit hacceh yomam walaylah, ’el hamaqom, ’asher ’amarta, lasum shimkha sham; lishmoa‘ ’el hatefilah, ’asher yitpaleil ‘awdekha, ’el hamaqom hacceh. weshama‘ta ’el taHanunei ‘awdekha we‘amekha yisra’eil, ’asher yitpalu ’el hamaqom hacceh; we’atah tishma‘ mimeqom shiwtekha min hashamayim, weshama‘ta wesalaHeta. ’im yeHeTa ’ish lerei‘eihu, wenasha wo ’alah leha’aloto; uwa, ’alah lifnei micbaHakha babayit hacceh. we’atah tishma‘ min hashamayim, we‘asita weshafaTta ’et ‘awadekha, lehashiw lerasha‘, lateit darko berosho; ulehazdiq zadiq, latet lo kezidqato. we’im yinageif ‘amekha yisra’eil lifnei ’oyeiw ki yeHeT’u lakh; weshawu wehodu ’et shemekha, wehitpalu wehitHanenu lefanekha babayit hacceh. we’atah tishma‘ min hashamayim, wesalaHta, leHaTat ‘amekha yisra’eil; wahasheiwotam ’el ha’adamah, ’asher natatah lahem wela’awoteihem. behei‘azeir hashamayim welo yihyeh maTar ki yeHeT’u lakh; wehitpalu ’el hamaqom hacceh wehodu ’et shemekha, meiHaTatam yeshuwun ki ta‘aneim. we’atah tishma‘ hashamayim, wesalaHta leHaTat ‘awadekha we‘amekha yisra’eil, ki toreim ’el haderekh haTowah ’asher yeilekhu wah; wenatatah maTar ‘al ’arzekha, ’asher natatah le‘amekha lenaHalah. ra‘aw ki yihyeh wa’arez, dewer ki yihyeh shidafon weyeiraqon ’arbeh weHasil ki yihyeh, ki yazar lo ’oywaw be’erez she‘araw; kal nega‘ wekhal maHalah. kal tefilah khal teHinah, ’asher yihyeh lekhal ha’adam, ulekhol ‘amekha yisra’eil; ’asher yeide‘u, ’ish nig‘o umakh’owo, ufaras kapaw ’el habayit hacceh. we’atah tishma‘ min hashamayim mekhon shiwtekha wesalaHta, wenatatah la’ish kekhal derakhaw, ’asher teida‘ ’et lewawo; ki ’atah lewadekha yada‘ta, ’et lewaw benei ha’adam. lema‘an yira’ukha, lalekhet bidrakhekha, kal hayamim, ’asher heim Hayim ‘al penei ha’adamah; ’asher natatah la’awoteinu. wegam ’el hanakheri, ’asher lo mei‘amekha yisra’eil hu uwa mei’erez reHoqah, lema‘an shimkha hagadol weyadekha haHacaqah, ucero‘akha haneTuyah; uwa’u wehitpalu ’el habayit hacceh. we’atah tishma‘ min hashamayim mimekhon shiwtekha, we‘asita kekhol ’asher yiqra ’eilekha hanakheri; lema‘an yeide‘u khal ‘amei ha’arez ’et shemekha, uleyir’ah ’otekha ke‘amekha yisra’eil, welada‘at ki shimkha niqra, ‘al habayit hacceh ’asher baniti. ki yeizei ‘amekha lamilHamah ‘al ’oywaw, baderekh ’asher tishlaHeim; wehitpalu ’eilekha, derekh ha‘ir haccot ’asher baHarta bah, wehabayit ’asher baniti lishmekha. weshama‘ta min hashamayim, ’et tefilatam we’et teHinatam; we‘asita mishpaTam. ki yeHeT’u lakh, ki ’ein ’adam ’asher lo yeHeTa, we’anafta wam, unetatam lifnei ’oyeiw; weshawum showeihem ’el ’erez reHoqah ’o qerowah. weheishiwu ’el lewawam, ba’arez ’asher nishbu sham; weshawu wehitHanenu ’eilekha, be’erez shiwyam leimor, HaTanu he‘ewinu werasha‘enu. weshawu ’eilekha, bekhal libam uwekhal nafsham, be’erez shiwyam ’asher shawu ’otam; wehitpalu, derekh ’arzam ’asher natatah la’awotam, weha‘ir ’asher baHarta, welabayit ’asher baniti lishmekha. weshama‘ta min hashamayim mimekhon shiwtekha, ’et tefilatam we’et teHinoteihem, we‘asita mishpaTam; wesalaHta le‘amekha ’asher HaTe’u lakh. ‘atah ’elohay, yihyu na ‘einekha petuHot, we’acenekha qashuwot; litfilat hamaqom hacceh. we‘atah, qumah yhoh ’elohim lenuHekha, ’atah wa’aron ‘uccekha; kohanekha yhoh ’elohim yilbeshu teshu‘ah, waHasidekha yismeHu waTow. yhoh ’elohim, ’al tasheiw penei meshiHekha; cakherah leHasdei dawid ‘awdekha.

7

 ukhekhalot shelomoh lehitpaleil, weha’eish, yaredah meihashamayim, watokhal ha‘olah wehaccewaHim; ukhewod yhoh malei ’et habayit. welo yakhelu hakohanim, lawo ’el beit yhoh; ki malei khewod yhoh ’et beit yhoh. wekhol benei yisra’eil, ro’im beredet ha’eish, ukhewod yhoh ‘al habayit; wayikhre‘u ’apayim ’arzah ‘al harizfah wayishtaHawu, wehodot yhoh ki Tow, ki le‘olam Hasdo. wehamelekh wekhal ha‘am; coweHim cewaH lifnei yhoh. wayicbaH hamelekh shelomoh ’et cewaH habaqar, ‘esrim ushenayim ’elef, wezon mei’ah we‘esrim ’alef; wayaHnekhu ’et beit ha’elohim, hamelekh wekhal ha‘am. wehakohanim ‘al mishmerotam ‘omedim, wehalwiyim bikhlei shir yhoh ’asher ‘asah dawid hamelekh, lehodot yhoh ki le‘olam Hasdo, behaleil dawid beyadam; wehakohanim maHazozerim maHzerim negdam, wekhal yisra’eil ‘omedim. wayqadeish shelomoh, ’et tokh heHazeir ’asher lifnei weit yhoh, ki ‘asah sham ha‘olot, we’eit Helwei hashelamim; ki micbaH haneHoshet ’asher ‘asah shelomoh, lo yakhol, lehakhil ’et ha‘olah we’et haminHah we’et haHalawim. waya‘as shelomoh ’et heHag ba‘eit hahi shiw‘at yamim wekhal yisra’eil ‘imo, qahal gadol me’od; milewo Hamat ‘ad naHal mizrayim. waya‘asu bayom hashemini ‘azaret; ki Hanukat hamicbeiaH, ‘asu shiw‘at yamim, weheHag shiw‘at yamim. uweyom ‘esrim usheloshah laHodesh hashewi‘i, shilaH ’et ha‘am le’aholeihem; semeiHim weTowei leiw, ‘al haTowah, ’asher ‘asah yhoh ledawid welishlomoh, uleyisra’eil ‘amo. waykhal shelomoh ’et beit yhoh we’et beit hamelekh; we’eit kal haba ‘al leiw shelomoh, la‘asot beweit yhoh uweweito hizliaH. wayeira yhoh ’el shelomoh balayelah; wayomer lo, shama‘ti ’et tefilatekha, uwaHarti bamaqom hacceh li leweit cawaH. hein ’e‘ezor hashamayim welo yihyeh maTar, wehein ’azawweh ‘al Hagaw le’ekhol ha’arez; we’im ’ashalaH dewer be‘ami. weyikane‘u ‘ami ’asher niqra shemi ‘aleihem, weyitpalu wiwaqshu fanay, weyashuwu midarkheihem hara‘im; wa’ani ’eshma‘ min hashamayim, we’eslaH leHaTatam, we’erpa ’et ’arzam. ‘atah, ‘einay yihyu fetuHot, we’acenay qashuwot; litfilat hamaqom hacceh. we‘atah, baHarti wehiqdashti ’et habayit hacceh, lihyot shemi sham ‘ad ‘olam; wehayu ‘einay welibi sham kal hayamim. we’atah ’im teileikh lefanay, ka’asher halakh dawid ’awikha, wela‘asot kekhol ’asher ziwwitikha; weHuqay umishpaTay tishmor. wahaqimoti, ’eit kissei malkhutekha; ka’asher karati, ledawid ’awikha leimor, lo yikareit lekha ’ish, mosheil beyisra’eil. we’im teshuwun ’atem, wa‘acawtem Huqotay umizwotay, ’asher natati lifneikhem; wahalakhtem, wa‘awadtem ’elohim ’aHeirim, wehishtaHawitem lahem. unetashtim, mei‘al ’admati ’asher natati lahem, we’et habayit hacceh ’asher hiqdashti lishmi, ’ashlikh mei‘al panay; we’etenenu lemashal welishninah bekhal ha‘amim. wehabayit hacceh ’asher hayah ‘elyon, lekhal ‘oweir ‘alaw yishom; we’amar, bameh ‘asah yhoh kakhah, la’arez haccot welabayit hacceh. we’ameru, ‘al ’asher ‘acewu ’et yhoh ’elohei ’awoteihem, ’asher hozi’am mei’erez mizrayim wayaHaciqu beilohim ’aHeirim, wayishtaHawu lahem waya‘awdum; ‘al kein heiwi ‘aleihem, ’eit kal hara‘ah haccot.

8

 wayhi miqeiz ‘esrim shanah, ’asher banah shelomoh ’et beit yhoh we’et beito. wehe‘arim, ’asher natan Huram lishlomoh, banah shelomoh ’otam; wayoshew sham ’et benei yisra’eil. wayeilekh shelomoh Hamat zowah, wayeHecaq ‘aleha. wayiwen ’et tadmor bamidbar; we’eit kal ‘arei hamiskenot, ’asher banah baHamat. wayiwen ’et beit Horon ha‘elyon, we’et beit Horon hataHton; ‘arei mazor, Homot delatayim uweriaH. we’et ba‘alat, we’eit kal ‘arei hamiskenot ’asher hayu lishlomoh, we’eit kal ‘arei harekhew, we’eit ‘arei haparashim; we’eit kal Heisheq shelomoh, ’asher Hashaq liwnot birushalim uwalewanon, uwekhol ’erez memshalto. kal ha‘am hanotar min haHiti weha’emori wehapericci wehaHiwwi wehaywusi, ’asher lo miyisra’eil heimah. min beneihem, ’asher notru ’aHareihem ba’arez, ’asher lo khilum benei yisra’eil; waya‘aleim shelomoh lemas, ‘ad hayom hacceh. umin benei yisra’eil, ’asher lo natan shelomoh la‘awadim limlakhto; ki heimah ’anshei milHamah wesarei shalishaw, wesarei rikhbo ufarashaw. we’eileh sarei haneziwim hanizawim ’asher lamelekh shelomoh Hamishim umatayim; harodim ba‘am. we’et bat par‘oh, he‘elah shelomoh mei‘ir dawid, labayit ’asher banah lah; ki ’amar, lo teisheiw ’ishah li beweit dawid melekh yisra’eil, ki qodesh heimah, ’asher ba’ah ’aleihem ’aron yhoh. ’ac he‘elah shelomoh ‘olot yhoh; ‘al micbaH yhoh, ’asher banah lifnei ha’ulam. uwidwar yom beyom, leha‘alot kemizwat mosheh, lashabatot weleHodashim, welamo‘adot, shalosh pe‘amim bashanah; beHag hamazot uweHag hashawu‘ot uweHag hassukot. waya‘ameid kemishpaT dawid ’awiw ’et maHleqot hakohanim ‘al ‘awodatam, wehalwiyim ‘al mishmerotam lehaleil uleshareit neged hakohanim lidwar yom beyomo, wehasho‘arim bemaHleqotam lesha‘ar washa‘ar; ki khein, mizwat dawid ’ish ha’elohim. welo saru mizwat hamelekh ‘al hakohanim wehalwiyim lekhal dawar wela’ozarot. watikon kal melekhet shelomoh, ‘ad hayom musad beit yhoh we‘ad keloto; shaleim beit yhoh. ’ac halakh shelomoh le‘ezyon gewer we’el ’eilot ‘al sefat hayam be’erez ’edom. wayishlaH lo Huram beyad ‘awadaw ’oniyot ’oniyot, wa‘awadim yod‘ei yam wayawo’u ‘im ‘awdei shelomoh ’ofirah, wayiqHu misham, ’arba‘ mei’ot waHamishim kikar cahaw; wayawi’u ’el hamelekh shelomoh.

9

 umalkat shewa, shame‘ah ’et sheima‘ shelomoh watawo lenassot ’et shelomoh weHidot birushalim, beHayil kaweid me’od ugemalim nose’im besamim wecahaw larow we’ewen yeqarah; watawo ’el shelomoh, watedabeir ‘imo, ’eit kal ’asher hayah ‘im lewawah. wayaged lah shelomoh ’et kal dewareha; welo ne‘lam dawar mishelomoh, ’asher lo higid lah. wateire malkat shewa, ’eit Hakhemat shelomoh; wehabayit ’asher banah. uma’akhal shulHano umoshaw ‘awadaw uma‘amad mesharetaw umalbusheihem, umashqaw umalbusheihem, wa‘aliyato, ’asher ya‘aleh beit yhoh; welo hayah ‘od bah ruaH. watomer ’el hamelekh, ’emet hadawar, ’asher shama‘ti be’arzi; ‘al dewarekha we‘al Hakhematekha. welo he’emanti lediwreihem, ‘ad ’asher bati watir’enah ‘einay, wehineih lo hugad li, Hazi marbit Hakhematekha; yasafta ‘al hashemu‘ah ’asher shama‘eti. ’ashrei ’anashekha, we’ashrei ‘awadekha ’eileh; ha‘omedim lefanekha tamid, weshome‘im ’et Hakhematekha. yehi yhoh ’elohekha barukh, ’asher Hafeiz bekha, letitekha ‘al kis’o lemelekh, yhoh ’elohekha; be’ahawat ’elohekha ’et yisra’eil leha‘amido le‘olam, wayitenkha ‘aleihem lemelekh, la‘asot mishpaT uzedaqah. watitein lamelekh mei’ah we‘esrim kikar cahaw, uwesamim larow me’od we’ewen yeqarah; welo hayah kabosem hahu, ’asher natenah malkat shewa lamelekh shelomoh. wegam ‘awdei Hiram Huram we‘awdei shelomoh, ’asher heiwi’u cahaw mei’ofir; heiwi’u ‘azei ’algumim we’ewen yeqarah. waya‘as hamelekh ’et ‘azei ha’algumim mesilot leweit yhoh uleweit hamelekh, wekhinorot unewalim lasharim; welo nir’u khaheim lefanim be’erez yehudah. wehamelekh shelomoh natan lemalkat shewa, ’et kal Hefzah ’asher sha’alah, milewad ’asher heiwi’ah ’el hamelekh; watahafokh wateilekh le’arzah hi wa‘awadeha. wayhi mishqal haccahaw, ’asher ba lishlomoh beshanah ’eHat; sheish mei’ot weshishim washeish kikerei cahaw. lewad mei’anshei hatarim wehassoHarim mewi’im; wekhal malkhei ‘araw ufaHot ha’arez, mewi’im cahaw wakhesef lishlomoh. waya‘as hamelekh shelomoh matayim zinah cahaw shaHuT; sheish mei’ot cahaw shaHuT, ya‘aleh ‘al hazinah ha’eHat. ushelosh mei’ot maginim cahaw shaHuT, shelosh mei’ot cahaw, ya‘aleh ‘al hamagein ha’eHat; wayiteneim hamelekh, beweit ya‘ar halewanon. waya‘as hamelekh kissei shein gadol; wayzapeihu cahaw Tahor. wesheish ma‘alot lakissei wekhewesh baccahaw lakissei ma’oHacim, weyadot micceh umicceh ‘al meqom hashawet; ushenayim ’arayot, ‘omedim ’eizel hayadot. usheneim ‘asar ’arayot, ‘omedim sham ‘al sheish hama‘alot micceh umicceh; lo na‘asah khein lekhal mamlakhah. wekhol kelei mashqeih hamelekh shelomoh cahaw, wekhol, kelei beit ya‘ar halewanon cahaw sagur; ’ein kesef, neHshaw bimei shelomoh lim’umah. ki ’oniyot lamelekh holekhot tarshish, ‘im ‘awdei Huram; ’aHat leshalosh shanim tawonah ’oniyot tarshish, nose’ot cahaw wakhesef, shenhabim weqofim wetukiyim. wayigdal hamelekh shelomoh, mikol malkhei ha’arez; le‘osher weHakhemah. wekhol malkhei ha’arez, mewaqshim ’et penei shelomoh; lishmoa‘ ’et Hakhemato, ’asher natan ha’elohim belibo. weheim mewi’im ’ish minHato kelei khesef ukhelei cahaw uselamot neisheq uwesamim, susim uferadim; dewar shanah beshanah. wayhi lishlomoh ’arba‘at ’alafim ’uryot susim umarkawot, usheneim ‘asar ’elef parashim; wayaniHeim be‘arei harekhew, we‘im hamelekh birushalim. wayhi mosheil bekhal hamelakhim; min hanahar we‘ad ’erez pelishtim, we‘ad gewul mizrayim. wayitein hamelekh ’et hakesef birushalim ka’awanim; we’eit ha’aracim, natan kashiqmim ’asher bashefeilah larow. umozi’im susim mimizrayim lishlomoh umikal ha’arazot. ushe’ar diwrei shelomoh, harishonim weha’aHaronim; halo heim ketuwim, ‘al diwrei natan hanawi, we‘al newu’at ’aHiyah hashiloni, uwaHacot ye‘di ye‘do haHoceh, ‘al yarawe‘am ben newaT. wayimlokh shelomoh wirushalim ‘al kal yisra’eil ’arba‘im shanah. wayishkaw shelomoh ‘im ’awotaw, wayiqberuhu, be‘ir dawid ’awiw; wayimlokh reHaw‘am beno taHtaw.

10

 wayeilekh reHaw‘am shekhemah; ki shekhem ba’u khal yisra’eil lehamlikh ’oto. wayhi kishmoa‘ yarawe‘am ben newaT wehu wemizrayim, ’asher baraH, mipenei shelomoh hamelekh; wayashaw yarawe‘am mimizrayim. wayishleHu wayiqre’u lo, wayawo yarawe‘am wekhal yisra’eil; waydaberu, ’el reHaw‘am leimor. ’awikha hiqshah ’et ‘uleinu; we‘atah haqeil mei‘awodat ’awikha haqashah, umei‘ulo hakaweid ’asher natan ‘aleinu wena‘awdeka. wayomer ’aleihem, ‘od sheloshet yamim weshuwu ’eilay; wayeilekh ha‘am. wayiwwa‘az hamelekh reHaw‘am, ’et hacceqeinim ’asher hayu ‘omedim, lifnei shelomoh ’awiw, bihyoto Hay leimor; ’eikh ’atem no‘azim, lehashiw la‘am hacceh dawar. waydaberu ’eilaw leimor, ’im tihyeh leTow leha‘am hacceh urezitam, wedibarta ’aleihem dewarim Towim; wehayu lekha ‘awadim kal hayamim. waya‘acow ’et ‘azat hacceqeinim ’asher ye‘azuhu; wayiwwa‘az, ’et hayladim ’asher gadelu ’ito, ha‘omedim lefanaw. wayomer ’aleihem, mah ’atem no‘azim, wenashiw dawar ’et ha‘am hacceh; ’asher diberu ’eilay leimor, haqeil min ha‘ol, ’asher natan ’awikha ‘aleinu. waydaberu ’ito, hayladim ’asher gadelu ’ito leimor koh tomar la‘am ’asher diberu ’eilekha leimor, ’awikha hikhbid ’et ‘uleinu, we’atah haqeil mei‘aleinu; koh tomar ’aleihem, qaTani ‘awah mimatenei ’awi. we‘atah, ’awi he‘mis ‘aleikhem ‘ol kaweid, wa’ani ’osif ‘al ‘ulekhem; ’awi, yissar ’etkhem bashoTim, wa’ani ba‘aqrabim. wayawo yarawe‘am wekhal ha‘am ’el reHaw‘am bayom hashelishi; ka’asher diber hamelekh leimor, shuwu ’eilay bayom hashelishi. waya‘aneim hamelekh qashah; waya‘acow hamelekh reHaw‘am, ’eit ‘azat hacceqeinim. waydabeir ’aleihem, ka‘azat hayladim leimor, ’akhbid ’et ‘ulekhem, wa’ani ’osif ‘alaw; ’awi, yissar ’etkhem bashoTim, wa’ani ba‘aqrabim. welo shama‘ hamelekh ’el ha‘am; ki hayetah nesibah mei‘im ha’elohim, lema‘an haqim yhoh ’et dewaro, ’asher diber beyad ’aHiyahu hashiloni, ’el yarawe‘am ben newaT. wekhal yisra’eil, ki lo shama‘ hamelekh lahem wayashiwu ha‘am ’et hamelekh leimor mah lanu Heileq bedawid welo naHalah bewen yishay, ’ish le’ohalekha yisra’eil, ‘atah re’eih weitekha dawid; wayeilekh kal yisra’eil le’ohalaw. uwenei yisra’eil, hayoshewim be‘arei yehudah; wayimlokh ‘aleihem reHaw‘am. wayishlaH hamelekh reHaw‘am, ’et hadoram ’asher ‘al hamas, wayirgemu wo wenei yisra’eil ’ewen wayamot; wehamelekh reHaw‘am, hit’ameiz la‘alot bamerkawah, lanus yerushalim. wayifshe‘u yisra’eil beweit dawid, ‘ad hayom hacceh.

11

 wayawo reHaw‘am yerushalim wayaqheil ’et beit yehudah uwinyamin, mei’ah ushemonim ’elef baHur ‘oseih milHamah; lehilaHeim ‘im yisra’eil, lehashiw ’et hamamlakhah lirHaw‘am. wayhi dewar yhoh, ’el shema‘yahu ’ish ha’elohim leimor. ’emor ’el reHaw‘am ben shelomoh melekh yehudah; we’el kal yisra’eil, bihudah uwinyamin leimor. koh ’amar yhoh lo ta‘alu welo tilaHamu ‘im ’aHeikhem, uwu ’ish leweito, ki mei’iti nihyah hadawar hacceh; wayishme‘u ’et diwrei yhoh, wayashuwu milekhet ’el yarawe‘am. wayeishew reHaw‘am birushalim; wayiwen ‘arim lemazor bihudah. wayiwen ’et beit leHem we’et ‘eiTam we’et teqoa‘. we’et beit zur we’et sokho we’et ‘adulam. we’et gat we’et mareishah we’et cif. we’et ’adorayim we’et lakhish we’et ‘aceiqah. we’et zare‘ah we’et ’ayalon, we’et Hewron, ’asher bihudah uwewinyamin; ‘arei mezurot. wayHacceiq ’et hamezurot; wayitein bahem negidim, we’ozerot ma’akhal weshemen wayayin. uwekhal ‘ir wa‘ir zinot uremaHim, wayHacceqeim leharbeih me’od; wayhi lo yehudah uwinyamin. wehakohanim wehalwiyim, ’asher bekhal yisra’eil; hityazewu ‘alaw mikal gewulam. ki ‘acewu halwiyim, ’et migresheihem wa’aHuccatam, wayeilekhu lihudah welirushalim; ki hicniHam yarawe‘am uwanaw, mikahein yhoh. waya‘amed lo kohanim, labamot welase‘irim; wela‘agalim ’asher ‘asah. we’aHareihem, mikol shiwTei yisra’eil, hanotenim ’et lewawam, lewaqeish ’et yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil; ba’u yerushalim, licboaH yhoh ’elohei ’awoteihem. wayHaccequ ’et malkhut yehudah, way’amezu ’et reHaw‘am ben shelomoh leshanim shalosh; ki halekhu, bederekh dawid ushelomoh leshanim shalosh. wayiqaH lo reHaw‘am ’ishah, ’et maHalat, ben bat yerimot ben dawid; ’awihayil bat ’eli’aw ben yishay. wateiled lo banim; ’et ye‘ush we’et shemaryah we’et caham. we’aHareha laqaH, ’et ma‘akhah bat ’awshalom; wateiled lo, ’et ’awiyah we’et ‘atay, we’et cica we’et shelomit. waye’ehaw reHaw‘am ’et ma‘akhah wat ’awshalom, mikal nashaw ufilagshaw, ki nashim shemoneh ‘esreih nasa, ufilagshim shishim; wayoled, ‘esrim ushemonah banim weshishim banot. waya‘ameid larosh reHaw‘am ’et ’awiyah wen ma‘akhah lenagid be’eHaw; ki lehamlikho. wayawen wayifroz mikal banaw lekhal ’arzot yehudah uwinyamin, lekhol ‘arei hamezurot, wayitein lahem hamacon larow; wayish’al hamon nashim.

12

 wayhi, kehakhin malkhut reHaw‘am ukheHecqato, ‘acaw ’et torat yhoh; wekhal yisra’eil ‘imo. wayhi bashanah haHamishit lamelekh reHaw‘am, ‘alah shishaq melekh mizrayim ‘al yerushalim; ki ma‘alu yhoh. be’elef umatayim rekhew, uweshishim ’elef parashim; we’ein mispar, la‘am ’asher ba’u ‘imo mimizrayim, luwim sukiyim wekhushim. wayilkod ’et ‘arei hamezurot ’asher lihudah; wayawo ‘ad yerushalim. ushema‘yah hanawi ba ’el reHaw‘am, wesarei yehudah, ’asher ne’esfu ’el yerushalim mipenei shishaq; wayomer lahem koh ’amar yhoh ’atem ‘acawtem ’oti, we’af ’ani ‘acawti ’etkhem beyad shishaq. wayikane‘u sarei yisra’eil wehamelekh; wayomeru zadiq yhoh. uwir’ot yhoh ki nikhna‘u, hayah dewar yhoh ’el shema‘yah leimor nikhne‘u lo ’ashHiteim; wenatati lahem kim‘aT lifleiTah, welo titakh Hamati birushalim beyad shishaq. ki yihyu lo la‘awadim; weyeide‘u ‘awodati, wa‘awodat mamlekhot ha’arazot. waya‘al shishaq melekh mizrayim ‘al yerushalim wayiqaH ’et ’ozerot beit yhoh we’et ’ozerot beit hamelekh, ’et hakol laqaH; wayiqaH ’et maginei haccahaw, ’asher ‘asah shelomoh. waya‘as hamelekh reHaw‘am taHteihem, maginei neHoshet; wehifqid, ‘al yad sarei harazim, hashomerim, petaH beit hamelekh. wayhi midei wo hamelekh beit yhoh; ba’u harazim unesa’um, weheshiwum ’el ta harazim. uwehikane‘o, shaw mimenu ’af yhoh, welo lehashHit lekhalah; wegam bihudah, hayah dewarim Towim. wayitHacceiq hamelekh reHaw‘am birushalim wayimlokh; ki wen ’arba‘im we’aHat shanah reHaw‘am bemalekho ushawa‘ ‘esreih shanah malakh birushalim, ha‘ir ’asher baHar yhoh lasum ’et shemo sham mikol shiwTei yisra’eil, wesheim ’imo, na‘amah ha‘amonit. waya‘as hara‘; ki lo heikhin libo, lidrosh ’et yhoh. wediwrei reHaw‘am, harishonim weha’aHaronim, halo heim ketuwim bediwrei shema‘yah hanawi we‘ido haHoceh lehityaHeis; umilHamot reHaw‘am weyarawe‘am kal hayamim. wayishkaw reHaw‘am ‘im ’awotaw, wayiqaweir be‘ir dawid; wayimlokh ’awiyah weno taHtaw.

13

 bishnat shemoneh ‘esreih lamelekh yarawe‘am; wayimlokh ’awiyah ‘al yehudah. shalosh shanim, malakh birushalim, wesheim ’imo, mikhayahu wat ’uri’eil min giw‘ah; umilHamah hayetah bein ’awiyah uwein yarawe‘am. waye’sor ’awiyah ’et hamilHamah, beHayil giborei milHamah, ’arba‘ mei’ot ’elef ’ish baHur; s weyarawe‘am, ‘arakh ‘imo milHamah, bishmoneh mei’ot ’elef ’ish baHur gibor Hayil. wayaqam ’awiyah, mei‘al lehar zemarayim, ’asher behar ’efrayim; wayomer shema‘uni yarawe‘am wekhal yisra’eil. halo lakhem lada‘at, ki yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil, natan mamlakhah ledawid ‘al yisra’eil le‘olam; lo ulewanaw berit melaH. wayaqam yarawe‘am ben newaT, ‘ewed shelomoh wen dawid; wayimrod ‘al ’adonaw. wayiqawezu ‘alaw, ’anashim reiqim benei weliya‘al, wayit’amezu ‘al reHaw‘am ben shelomoh; ureHaw‘am, hayah na‘ar werakh leiwaw, welo hitHaccaq lifneihem. we‘atah ’atem ’omerim, lehitHacceiq lifnei mamlekhet yhoh, beyad benei dawid; we’atem hamon raw, we‘imakhem ‘eglei cahaw, ’asher ‘asah lakhem yarawe‘am leilohim. halo hidaHtem ’et kohanei yhoh, ’et benei ’aharon wehalwiyim; wata‘asu lakhem kohanim ke‘amei ha’arazot, kal haba, lemalei yado befar ben baqar we’eilim shiw‘ah, wehayah khohein lelo ’elohim. wa’anaHnu yhoh ’eloheinu welo ‘acawnuhu;
